description.hltext_display: 밀가루, 우유값도 오를텐데…간식거리값 '빨간불'
description.content: 물가를 잡겠다는 정부의 강한 의지에도 불구하고 식품업체들이 늘어나는 적자폭을 "더 이상 두고볼 수 없다"고 나서고 있어 내년도 물가에 빨간불이 커졌다.CJ제일제당은 22일 설탕 값을 평균 9.7% 올린다고 밝혔다. 최근 2년 간 설탕의 원료인 국제 원당가가 200% 넘게 올라 적자폭이 커졌고 내년에는 수급난이 벌어질 가능성까지 있어 가격인상이 불가피하다는 것이다. 특히 당초 인상률을 15%로 추진했지만 정부의 완강한 반대에 부딪혀 한 자리수 대로 인상률을 못박았다고 밝혔다.하지만 이 같은 인상률 최소화 주장에도 설탕을 주 원료로 하는 제과, 제빵 업계는 이익률 하락 요인이 또 하나 생겼다며 울상이다. 안그래도 구제역 파동으로 내년도 우유 수급에 차질에 빚어지고 유가 상승으로 물류비 지출도 높아질 것으로 예상하고 있었다는 것이다.여기에 국제 곡물가격 상승에 따른 밀가루 가격 인상 가능성도 적지 않다. 한 제빵업계 관계자는 "내년 우유 생산량이 20% 줄거라는 소식이 들리고 유가도 사상 최고치로 올라간다고 하니 걱정"이라면서 "나름대로 자구노력을 하고 있지만 어렵다"고 하소연했다. 제과업계 관계자 역시 "원자재 상승 건을 두고 대책회의를 여러차례 하고 있다"면서 "변수가 많아 내년 계획을 세우기 어려운 상황"이라고 말했다. 당장 빵과 과자 등 간식거리 가격이 오르지는 않을 전망이지만 원가 압력이 계속 이 상태를 유지하면 업체들로써도 가격 인상을 피하기 어려워질 수 있다. 업계 관계자는 "전반적으로 물가가 오르는 상황에서 정부가 몇 개 상품군을 정해놓고 가격을 유지하라고 하고 있다"면서 "당장 내년 초 시장상황을 예측하기가 어렵다"고 말했다.

description.hltext_display: نگاهی به مطبوعات روسیه، اول دی
description.content:
خوانندگان گرامی!
شما می توانید نظرات خود درباره این مطلب را برای ما ارسال کنید، بهترین و جالب ترین نظرات همه روزه در بخش منتشر می شوند. برای نوشتن نظرات خود اینجا کلیک کنید محتوای مطالب منتشره می تواند مغایر با مواضع «ریا نووستی» باشد
استفاده از مطالب خبرگزاری «ریا نووستی» تنها با ذکر منبع مجاز است
* روزنامه "نزاویسیمایا گازیتا" در شماره امروزخود می نویسد، فرودگاه "ماناس" دوباره در مرکز جنجال و افتضاح قرار گرفته است. دیروز گزارش کنگره آمریکا در واشنگتن ارائه شد که در آن ادعا می شود آمریکا حداقل طی 4 سال روسیه را در رابطه با مسئله تامین نیازهای این تاسیسات فریب داده است. طبق اطلاعات نمایندگان کنگره، یکی از بخش های شرکت "گازپروم" روسیه، میلیاردها دلار سوخت برای جنگ افغانستان تحویل داده است. گویا این کار بر اساس اسناد جعلی انجام شده است. در مسکو تایید کردند که مساله وجود دارد.
* روزنامه "ایزوستیا" مطلبی درباره وضع هوا دراروپا به چاپ رسانده است. فرانسه، آلمان، بریتانیا، بلژیک، سوییس، ایتالیا، دانمارک و هلند بخاطر بارش بی سابقه برف و سرمای شدید فلج شده اند. اهالی اروپای غربی تا آخر این هفته در این وضع دشوار به سر خواهند برد.
فرودگاه های "هیترو" لندن، "اورلی" پاریس و همچنین "فرانکفورت بر ماین" و آمستردام کمافی السابق تعطیل هستند. بارش برف در آستانه جشن های میلاد حضرت مسیح برنامه اروپایی ها و شهروندان روسیه را به هم زده و تعداد زیادی مسافر در بخش ترانزیت فرودگاه ها سرگردان شده اند.
* روزنامه "نوویه ایزوستیا" مطلب خود را به اوضاع قرقیزستان اختصاص داده است. روز دوشنبه اولین روز کار کابینه ائتلافی نوین این کشور به رهبری "المازبیک آتامبایف" رییس حزب سوسیال دموکرات بود. "رزا اوتونبایوا" رییس جمهور قرقیزستان اختیارات نخست وزیر را که در "دوره انتقالی" بر دوش داشت، به آتامبایف تحویل داد. ضمنا "کارشناسانی" که در زمان حکومت " کورمان بیک باکییف" رییس جمهور سرنگون شده سمت های پر مسئولیتی را بر عهده داشتند، به عضویت دولت تازه در آمده اند. منظور "اوچکون تاشبایف"، وزیر تنظیم اقتصادی و "نورلان شاکییف" وزیر فرهنگ و اطلاع رسانی ( دبیر مطبوعاتی سابق کورمان بیک باکییف) است.
* روزنامه "کامرسانت" گزارش می دهد روز دوشنبه پلیس بریتانیا 12 نفر را به اتهام تدارک عملیات تروریستی در مراکز تجاری و هتل های لندن دستگیر کرد. آنها که جوانان 17 تا 28 ساله هستند، صبح زود در چند شهر بریتانیا از جمله لندن، بیرمنگام، کاردیف و "استوک ـ اون ـ ترکت" بازداشت شدند. تمام دستگیر شدگان شهروندان بنگلادشی تبار بریتانیا هستند.
خبرگزاری «ریانووستی» روسیه، اول دی

description.hltext_display: کره جنوبی دور بعدی رزمایش را در دریای ژاپن آغاز کرد
description.content:
مسکو، 1 دی، خبرگزاری «ریا نووستی»/ نظامیان کره جنوبی روز چهارشنبه رزمایش سه روزه خود در دریای ژاپن در فاصله صد کیلومتری از مرز کره شمالی را آغاز کردند. این مطلب را خبرگزاری"رنخاپ" با نقل از سخنگوی وزارت دفاع کره جنوبی گزارش داد.
در نظر است حداقل 6 ناو و بالگرد ضد زیردریایی در رزمایش شرکت کند.
طبق گزارش رنخاپ نظامیان کره جنوبی با برگزاری رزمایش در یک سمت دیگر شبه جزیره کره قصد دارند نشان دهند که برای روبرو شدن با "هر حرکت غیر منتظره کره شمالی در جاهای غیر قابل پیش بینی" آماده هستند.
علاوه بر این پیشتر نظامیان کره جنوبی اعلام کردند قصد دارند روز پنج شنبه بزرگترین رزمایش تاریخ این کشور با استفاده از توپخانه و نیروی هوایی را در فاصله نزدیک از مرز غیر نظامی شده با کره شمالی برگزار کنند.
روز دوشنبه گذشته نظامیان کره جنوبی با وجود فراخوان روسیه به امتناع از برگزاری رزمایش، در ناحیه جزیره "یون پیونگ دونگ" آتشباری های رزمی آموزشی انجام دادند. طوری که دیرتر خبرگزاری رسمی کره شمالی خبر داد مقامات این کشور"واکنش نشان دادن به تحریکات نظامی در هر بار" را لازم ندانسته اند.
یادآوری می شود که اوضاع در شبه جزیره کره پس از آن رو به وخامت گرایید که روز 23 نوامبر(2 آذر) گسترده ترین درگیری نظامی پنجاه سال اخیر در این ناحیه رخ داد. کره شمالی جزیره "یون پیونگ دونگ" را هدف شلیک توپخانه خود قرار داده و در اثر اصابت گلوله های توپ دو سرباز کره جنوبی کشته و 17 نفر مجروح شدند. سه غیر نظامی نیز در اثر این درگیری ها زخمی شدند.

description.hltext_display: Joblessness still high in Ohio region
description.author: Staff, news services
description.content:
The four Ohio counties bordering northeast Indiana endured double-digit unemployment in November, a report Tuesday from the Ohio Department of Job & Family Services showed.
Williams County had the highest jobless rate at 11.4 percent, followed by Van Wert, 11 percent; Defiance, 10.6 percent; and Paulding, 10.5 percent. A year ago in November, Williams also had the highest unemployment rate at 14.8 percent, while Van Wert had 14 percent; Defiance, 12.9 percent; and Paulding, 12.8 percent.
In October of this year, Williams had a jobless rate of 11.7 percent; Van Wert, 11.1 percent; Defiance, 10.7 percent; and Paulding, 10.6 percent.
County unemployment rates for Indiana counties were released last week. South Korean automakers Hyundai and Kia and German car maker Volkswagen lead the insurance industry�s annual list of the safest new vehicles, used by safety-minded consumers looking to buy a new car.
The Insurance Institute for Highway Safety recognized 66 vehicles Wednesday with its �top safety pick award� for the 2011 model year, the most ever awarded by the Virginia-based group. The number was more than double the 27 vehicles selected last year.
Hyundai Motor Corp. and its affiliate Kia Motors Corp., and Volkswagen AG and its Audi brand received the most awards with nine, followed by eight awards apiece by General Motors Co., Ford Motor Co. and Toyota Motor Corp.
The awards, used in advertising to attract car buyers, bolster Hyundai and Volkswagen as they attempt to find a larger foothold in the United States. Deutsche Bank admitted criminal wrongdoing and agreed to pay more than $550 million in connection with its participation in tax shelters that enabled the rich to temporarily avoid paying hundreds of millions of dollars in U.S. taxes, authorities announced Tuesday.
Federal prosecutors and the Justice Department�s tax division announced the deal, saying the bank must continue cooperating and must submit to the appointment of an independent expert who will review its compliance measures and ensure it does not help people dodge taxes in the future.
Authorities said the $533,633,153 payment by the bank will include that amount of taxes and interest that the Internal Revenue Service was unable to collect from taxpayers from 1996 to 2002 because of the misconduct. It also includes a civil penalty of more than $149 million. A credit and debit card processor has announced plans to expand its operations in southern Indiana and hire up to 140 more workers by next summer.
Heartland Payment Systems said Tuesday it will spend more than $6.2 million to expand its Jeffersonville service center, where it now has some 650 workers.
Princeton, N.J.-based Heartland says it will be hiring customer service and management personnel early next year as construction and renovations begin.
Heartland president Bob Baldwin says the Jeffersonville center was a natural site for the company to consolidate processing operations from an acquisition it made in 2008.

event_or_fact.property: the Jeffersonville center was a natural site for the company to consolidate processing operations from an acquisition it made in 2008

description.hltext_display: ستره محکمه افغانستان طی دو هفته در باره انتخابات فیصله صادرخواهد کرد
description.content:
(قابل توجه خوانندگان: اخبار افغانستان به زبان دری منتشر می شود)
کابل،1 جدی ، خبرگزاری « ریا نووستی» / ستره محکمه جمهوری اسلامی افغانستان در جریان دو هفته در باره انتخابات مورخ 18 سپتمبر حکم نهایی خود را صادر خواهد کرد، در این باره رادیوی محلی "سلام وطندار" به نقل قول از عبدالملک کاموی نماینده ستره محکمه خبر داده است.
قرار معلومات رادیوی مذکور، در حدود دو هفته قبل لوی سارنوالی به ستره محکمه بیش از 400 صفحه اسناد اتهامی به ارتباط دغل بازی ها و جعل نمودن اوراق رایدهی در جریان انتخابات ارسال داشته است.
لوی سارنوالی از ستره محکمه در باره لغو نتائیج انتخابات و اعلان نمودن غیرقانونی نتائیج ان درخواست نموده است.
ولسی جرگه منتخب نو شورای ملی افغانستان تا به حال تشکیل جلسه نه نموده و منتظر حکم ستره محکمه می باشد که شاید پیروزی عده نامزدان را جعلی بخواند. برعلاوه این، رئیس جمهور باید به تعداد تقریباً یک سوم سناتوران مشرانو جرگه را تعین کند که موعد خدمت شان پایان یافته است. بعد از این هردو مجلس همزمان شروع به کار خواهند کرد.
تا به حال کمیسیون مستقل انتخابات افغانستان و کمیسیون سمع شکایات و اعتراضات با لوی سارنوالی که تحقیقات مستقلانه خود را انجام داده، موافقه نکرده است و نمایندگان انها عقیده دارند که هیچکس، حتی ستره محکمه، نمی تواند در نتائیج انتخابات و پروسه شمارش اراء مداخله کند.
رئیس جمهور حامد کرزی اعلام میدارد که حق مداخله در پروسه شمارش اراء و جریان قضایی را ندارد و در عین حال میگوید که وظیفه او نظارت بر رعایت قانون اساسی و قوانین دیگر می باشد.

description.hltext_display: Airport Gift Shops Across the U.S. Arm Travelers with GermBullet
description.content:
New nasal inhaler, from Flu & Cold Defense, LLC, adds immediate protection from cold and flu virus germs that other passengers carry on board
Boca Raton, FL (PRWEB) December 21, 2010
Thanks to re-circulated air, airplane passengers may be over 100 times more likely to catch a cold in flight than in their daily routines, and that is sending them straight to gift shop counters pre-flight to snap up GermBullet from Flu & Cold Defense, LLC. TSA-friendly GermBullet, a non-liquid, pharmacist-recommended essential oil inhaler, provides fast-acting germ-fighting protection from cold and flu. Airport gift shops from Los Angeles to Chicago to New York are stocking GermBullet during the busy holiday travel season, and reordering to prepare for winter travelers carrying germs from coast to coast.
GermBullet is a nasal inhaler that contains a proprietary blend of 11 essential oils that provide a natural and highly-effective shield against cold and flu germs. GermBullet inhalation blend is safe, easy to use and ultra-portable, delivering protection against airborne germs. Users simply inhale it before, during or after exposure in crowded germ filled environments like airplanes, buses, cruise ships, trains, subways and taxis; or, when a cold is first suspected, but before symptoms occur.
“Travelers know the health risks involved with taking a plane trip. They can get on perfectly healthy and leave the plane with the makings of a cold,” said Jim Whidden for Flu & Cold Defense, LLC. “Being sick is hard enough to deal with in a normal situation, but when away from home, having a cold or flu can be downright miserable. Offering GermBullet in every airport is a way to help protect passengers from travel-related illness and help travelers breathe a little easier.”
The new vapor inhaler is available at airport gift shops nationwide. Proven effective in laboratory tests, GermBullet killed cold and flu viruses, including seasonal viruses, as well as illness-causing bacteria, harmful fungus and mold.
For more information about GermBullet, please visit http://www.germbullet.com .
About GermBullet Created by Geraldine Whidden, an entrepreneur in Boca Raton, Fla., GermBullet’s blend of 11 essential oils have been scientifically proven to kill germs that cause colds and flu. Demand for Ms. Whidden’s GermBullet has increased dramatically in recent years and the product is now available at thousands of pharmacies, health food stores, convenience stores, airports and other travel terminals. GermBullet is a product of Flu & Cold Defense, LLC of Boca Ration.
###
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prweb2010/12/prweb4918604.htm

event_or_fact.property: They can get on perfectly healthy and leave the plane with the makings of a cold,?

description.hltext_display: Karunanidhi targets Jayalalithaa, defends Raja
description.author: Tihar inmates paid to make CWG 'supari' claim
description.content:
Video
Chennai: DMK chief and Tamil Nadu Chief Minister M Karunanidhi has defended his party colleague and former telecom minister A Raja.In a statement in his party mouthpiece Murasoli on Wednesday, Karunanidhi pointed out that AIADMK leader J Jayalalithaa had challenged CAG reports that went against her governmet in the pastHe said that during AIADMK rule in 2003-04 the CAG had cited a "loss of over Rs 1000 because of short levy of taxes". He asked the party workers to reach out to people and take on Jayalalithaa
"It's not enough if only you know the truth, I urge you all and the senior party members to reveal all about the scams of the opposition in every meeting they address. The people should also know," Karunanidhi said in his statement.
CAG, in its report on the 2G spectrum issue, had mentioned a presumptive loss of Rs 1.76 lakh crore while it had quantified Rs 1,033 crore loss in its audit report in 2003-04 as a result of short levy of taxes, Karunanidhi claimed.
The statement also claimed that a section of media, referring to various sections from the then CAG report, had said thousands of crores of rupees had been lost in various departments, including frequent changing of ministers.

description.hltext_display: Sensex trades flat; Cipla, Wipro, Hero Honda drop
description.content:
Source: IRIS (22-DEC-10)
Comments | Post Comment
The Sensex continues to trade on a flat note due to lack of direction in the market. Midcap and Smallcap index outperformed. Realty, metal and PSU witnessed some buying interest, while consumer durables, capital goods and auto marginally dipped.
At 1.12 p.m., the Sensex was trading up 15.58 points or 0.08% at 20,075.90 with 17 components gaining. Meanwhile, the Nifty was trading higher by 4.95 points or 0.08% at 6,005.60 with 26 components gaining.
The 30-share benchmark index, BSE Sensex opened with a gain of 58.50 points or 0.29% at 20,118.82, while the broad based NSE Nifty started with a rise of 18.35 points or 0.31%, at 6,019.00.
Sensex Movers
Bharti Airtel contributed rise of 13.86 points in the Sensex. It was followed by Infosys Technologies (12.1 points), Sterlite Industries (India) (6.46 points), State Bank Of India (5.71 points) and Mahindra & Mahindra (3.97 points).
However, I C I C I Bank contributed fall of 8.41 points in the Sensex. It was followed by Tata Consultancy Services (6.9 points), Wipro (5.53 points), Reliance Industries (5.52 points) and Hero Honda Motors (3.15 points).
Biggest gainers in the 30-share index were Bharti Airtel (2.39%), Sterlite Industries (India) (1.76%), Jindal Steel & Power (1.33%), Reliance Communications (1.22%), Mahindra & Mahindra (0.96%), and Infosys Technologies (0.59%).
On the other hand, Cipla (1.74%), Wipro (1.51%), Hero Honda Motors (1.48%), Maruti Suzuki India (1.19%), Reliance Energy (0.87%), and Tata Consultancy Services (0.81%) were the major losers in the Sensex.
Mid & Small-cap Space
The BSE Mid and small caps outperformed their larger counterparts gaining 0.36% and 0.55% respectively.
The major gainers in the BSE Midcap were Core Projects and Technologies (3.62%), Aban Offshore (1.85%), Amara Raja Batteries (1.43%), Ackruti City (0.83%) and Alfa-Laval (India) (0.12%).
The major gainers in the BSE Smallcap were A B G Shipyard (1.84%), A B G Infralogistics (1.28%), INEOS ABS (India) (1.26%), Aarti Industries (0.75%) and Reliance MediaWorks (0.25%).
Sectors in Limelight
The Realty index was at 2,795.31, up by 27.31 points or by 0.99%. The major gainers were D B Realty (1.77%), Indiabulls Real Estate (1.36%), Ackruti City (0.83%), Mahindra Lifespace Developers (0.82%) and D L F (0.42%).
The Metal index was at 17,214.94, up by 117.89 points or by 0.69%. The major gainers were Hindustan Zinc (2.25%), Jindal Steel & Power (1.33%), NMDC (0.97%), Hindalco Industries (0.45%) and Bhushan Steel (0.1%).
The IPO index was at 1,907.80, up by 12.04 points or by 0.64%. The major gainers were Aster Silicates (1.99%), Aqua Logistics (0.87%), ARSS Infrastructure Projects (0.71%), Adani Power (0.24%) and Ashoka Buildcon (0.05%).
On the other hand, the Consumer Durables index was at 6,082.37, down by 11.55 points or by 0.19%. The major losers were Gitanjali Gems (3.5%), Videocon Industries (0.6%), Titan Industries (0.43%) and Rajesh Exports (0.04%).
Market Breadth
Market breadth was positive with 1,683 advances against 1,166 declines.
Value and Volume Toppers
Moil topped the value chart on the BSE with a turnover of Rs. 3,160.11 million. It was followed by Mahindra & Mahindra Financial Services (Rs. 1,055.35 million), State Bank Of India (Rs. 715.60 million) and City Union Bank (Rs. 579.90 million).
The volume chart was led by Cals Refineries with trades of over 20.63 million shares. It was followed by Ispat Industries (15.59 million), City Union Bank (11.30 million) and Birla Power Solutions (8.00 million).

description.hltext_display: Carrefour indeniza idosa por escorregão em alface
description.content:
Supermercado não se pronunciou sobre eventual recurso
Um tribunal francês condenou o grupo Carrefour a pagar uma indenização de 20 mil euros (R$ 44,5 mil) a uma septuagenária que escorregou em uma folha de alface no chão de um supermercado e fraturou a perna.
Segundo a imprensa francesa, essa decisão, anunciada na segunda-feira, é algo inédito no país e poderá criar jurisprudência.
Em 2008, uma cliente de um fast-food em Reims que havia escorregado em uma batata frita no chão do restaurante e sofrido rompimento dos ligamentos do joelho não obteve a indenização pleiteada na Justiça.
No caso atual, o Tribunal Correcional de Montpellier, no sul da França, estimou que o hipermercado foi responsável pela queda da cliente, já que o piso &apos;escorregadio de maneira anormal&apos; da loja provocou o acidente, ocorrido em 2006.
A idosa, na época com 72 anos, conseguiu provar na Justiça que o chão da seção de frutas e legumes do hipermercado, situado na região de Hérault, no sul da França, estava sujo, repleto de resíduos de comida.
A senhora, citada pela imprensa francesa apenas como Josiane, sofreu uma dupla fratura do fêmur e teve de ser operada duas vezes.
Ela também precisou fazer fisioterapia durante meses e sofreu uma perda da mobilidade da perna. &apos;A gravidade dos ferimentos e a reação do supermercado, que se recusou a efetuar uma indenização, nos levou a recorrer à Justiça&apos;, disse o advogado da septuagenária, Emmanuel Ludot. &apos;O supermercado tem a obrigação de limpar corretamente o chão da loja e assegurar a segurança da clientela&apos;, afirmou.
O grupo Carrefour declarou que ainda aguardava receber a cópia da sentença do tribunal antes de se pronunciar sobre um eventual recurso.
Para mais notícias, visite o site da BBC Brasil

description.hltext_display: Adobe單季營收創記錄突破10億美元 前景看好
description.author: editor2003.tw@cnet.com (ZDNET新聞專區：Sam Diaz
description.content:
Adobe Systems日前宣佈該公司的單季營收首度突破10億美元，讓華爾街的財經專家跌破眼鏡，它的明年第一季營收也相當看好。
Adobe今年第四季的獲利為每股56美分，比起去年同期的每股虧損6美分大幅成長。營收則為10.1億美元，比去年同期的7億5730萬美元成長33%。
華爾街的分析師原本預期它的獲利為每股52美分，營收則是9億8810萬美元。
Adobe今年會計年度的獲利為每股1.93美元，比起去年的1.54美元成長。今年的營收為38億美元，比起去年的29.46億美元成長29%。
該公司總裁兼執行長Shantanu Narayen表示，2010年的營收之所以能創記錄，主要是因為各項主要業務都表現相當傑出。Adobe正轉型成為數位體驗的創造者與提供者，同時它也是全球最多樣化的軟體公司。
展望未來，該公司預測明年第一季的營收介於10億至10.5億美元之間，獲利數字則介於每股54至59美分。
在與投資者的會談上，該公司稱2010年為「傑出的一年」，並表示將會繼續擴大它的客戶群，並且特別提到了今年推出的Creative Suite 5與Flash Player 10.1。
Adobe特別強調了Flash越來越獲重視的趨勢，儘管先前蘋果電腦的Apple的Steve Jobs在今年初的公開信中曾對它加以批評。Narayen指出，Flash依然是網際網路應用程式 ...

description.hltext_display: Bond market slightly weaker in quiet trade
description.content:
The Australian bond market ended the session slightly softer following weaker US Treasuries.
At 1630 AEDT on the ASX 24, the March 10-year bond futures contract was at 94.340 (implying a yield of 5.660 per cent), down from Tuesday's close of 94.370 (5.630 per cent).
The March three-year bond futures contract was at 94.650 (5.350 per cent), down from 94.680 (5.320 per cent).
UBS interest rate strategist Matthew Johnson said the bond market was slightly weaker in quiet trade ahead of Christmas.
"I think the main thing to communicate is not all that much happened.
"There was a late softening in US Treasuries but we didn't quite follow and we opened weak and they sold off a touch down to midday and it basically traded flat since."
Mr Johnson said the focus for the bond market over the Christmas, New Year period will be a series of US government bond auctions by the Federal Reserve.
"I personally think rates may trade a little bit heavy over the next few days as we head up for the auctions next week, the Fed will auction about $US100 billion worth of securities in the period between Christmas and New Year.
"Given that the market is liquidity thin, I expect that dealers will soon want to hedge those issues.
"I think the market will trade a bit heavy on that basis," he said.

description.hltext_display: In Memory of Griffen
description.author: Judi McLeod
description.content:
No one and nothing can take away the heartache when a beloved dog dies.
But it was the irresistible Griffen, with all of his tail-wagging ways, who eased the still grieving heart of Mark Levin after his dog Sprite died. And that?s just one of the countless reasons why Griffen was so loved by his master.
On FaceBook tonight Levin writes, ?If you want to learn about my buddy Griffen, you can read the last chapter of Rescuing Sprite.? ? Levin?, posted on his website, is really a tribute to all dogs. Millions know constitutional expert Mark Levin, the nationally syndicated talk show radio host, always first on the breaking news of the day. Many know him as the author of the brilliant Liberty and Tyranny: A Conservative Manifesto, called the most important philosophical work to be published since Ayn Rand?s 1957 philosophical novel, Atlas Shrugged. (ezinearticles.com)
When it was released in March 2009, Liberty and Tyranny was the number 1 best-selling, non-fiction hard back in the entire U.S.A.
Fewer know that Mark Levin penned the heart-stealing book, Rescuing Sprite.
The range of Mark Levin?s writing is truly remarkable, making him the Mark Twain of his day.
Passionate, personable and knowledgeable, the porch light is always on at the Mark Levin show, 6 p.m, Monday through Friday. He?s the quintessential dog lover that so many dog owners have turned to in their grief and heartbreaking loss. Even as Griffen was gravely ill, Mark Levin always took time to commiserate with those who had lost their dogs. Tonight he?ll be missing the irrepressible Griffen as he will for all nights thereafter.
Other friends may come and go, but there?s something about the tail-wagging members of our family that remains in the human heart forever.
Time, no matter how long, never erases the memories of a loyal dog who makes a house a home.
I like to think that the Good Lord, knowing about the valley of tears called life on Earth knew exactly what He was doing when He made the noble dog, Man?s Best Friend. Meanwhile, there is some comfort in knowing that on some other plane, Griffen now gambols across meadows with the lovable Sprite.

description.hltext_display: Greeks go on strike before austerity budget vote
description.content:
Greek unions called a general strike on Wednesday and Athens was paralysed by a 24-hour public transport stoppage in protest against the government's 2011 budget, set to pass later as part of an EU/IMF bailout. The budget, meant to help stem a debt crisis that has shaken the euro zone, includes further tax hikes and wage cuts in state-run enterprises, especially in public transport.
Fitch said on Tuesday it may cut Greece's credit rating next month to junk as both other major rating agencies have done. "Even though this news was expected, it will go down badly with the markets, there is widespread fear about downgrades coming," said Ioanna Telioudi, analyst at HSBC in Athens. Greece's main public and private sector labour unions have called a 3-hour strike from 10 a.m. to 1 p.m. British time in Athens. Thousands are expected to rally outside parliament.
Athens bus and subway drivers have been holding on and off strikes for two weeks, keeping Christmas shoppers from the city centre, adding to the strain of recession-hit retailers.
The government threatened on Wednesday to break the public transport strikes, invoking emergency legislation it used earlier this year to dissolve labour action by truck drivers and other transport workers. "Everyone has to show responsibility ... the state has all the powers it needs to protect the public interest," government spokesman George Petalotis said in a television interview.
Analysts have warned the additional measures will hurt the economy even more without providing guarantees that the country will avoid a debt restructuring to cope with ballooning debt.
The government has a comfortable majority of 156 seats out of 300 in parliament and the budget is expected to be approved despite growing discontent among the ruling PASOK party ranks. "I am giving the government a last chance," said PASOK deputy Thomas Robopoulos during the budget debate on Tuesday. Since the EU/IMF bailout agreement was signed in May, Prime Minister George Papandreou has expelled four deputies for disagreeing publicly with his austerity policies
The socialists, who revealed a gaping budget deficit after coming to power last year, have braved public discontent and taken draconian measures to meet the bailout terms.
The government has cut public sector wages by about 15 percent, increased the retirement age, frozen pensions, cut public spending but has failed to boost tax collection as much as targeted, despite a hefty VAT increase. Greece's lenders have said that the country was broadly on track with its fiscal program but needed to step up reforms and spending cuts next year.
Partly as a result of the measures, the economy is seen shrinking by 3 percent next year after a 4.2 percent drop in 2010, with unemployment jumping to a record 14.6 percent from an estimated 12.1 percent this year.
Greece targets a deficit of 7.4 percent of GDP next year, from about 9.4 percent this year.
Greek protesters clashed with police last week and set fire to cars and a hotel in central Athens earlier this month, as some 50,000 marched against austerity in the biggest and most violent march since three died in protests in May.

description.hltext_display: Black Swan, True Grit, The Fighter and The Kids Are Alright Won’t Get an Oscar Nomination
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content:
The films Black Swan, True Grit, The Fighter and have been getting plenty of award nominations and are contenders for the Oscars. But there is one category in which they will not be eligible for. And that is Best Original Score.
All four films have been deemed ineligible for the category after the Academy ruled their works were "diluted by the use of tracked themes or other pre-existing music." Two years ago, THE DARK KNIGHT was declared ineligible for Best Original Score only to have the Academy reverse its decision a month later after a public outcry. There has also been some controversy about INCEPTION's score, which features a slowed down version of Edith Piaf's "Non, je ne Regrette Rien." Meanwhile, the same issues that plagued BLACK SWAN - featuring excerpts of existing classical music - doesn't seem to be an issue for THE KING'S SPEECH, which was declared eligible despite featuring excerpts from existing works throughout the film.

description.hltext_display: 陳雲林話別 願盡力協商投保
description.content:
大陸海峽兩岸關係協會會長陳雲林今天在話別時表示，兩會商談還有很多重要課題，在前進的道路上，還會有一些困難和阻礙，但任何阻礙改變不了兩岸和平發展的大趨勢。
陳雲林說，這次商談簽署了兩岸醫藥衛生合作協議，並為另一個重要協議（兩岸投資保障協議）進行階段性總結，達成共識，雙方將盡最大努力，在不久的將來完成協商。
財團法人海峽交流基金會原訂上午11時50分在台北圓山飯店舉行話別談話會，但因班機時間延後，因此談話會延至12時30分舉行。
海基會董事長江丙坤表示，這次兩會簽署的「海峽兩岸醫藥衛生合作協議」，是從人道關懷出發，以兩岸人民的健康福祉為依歸。
他說，今年透過兩岸交流，有超過600萬人次往來兩岸從事觀光、商務等活動，透過疫病的通報、緊急救護制度的建立，對兩岸人民的生命安全提供進一步保障。同時，也有機會透過兩岸合作，優勢互補，在醫藥衛生方面發展新商機，共創雙贏。
江丙坤表示，明年在兩會繼續推動協商交流下，繼續完成未完的許多協議，也將推動兩岸民間交流，希望透過這些交流和協商，讓兩岸民眾共享成果。
他說，海基會將在兩會建構的平台上，繼續推動平等協商，循序漸進，擱置爭議、追求雙贏。
陳雲林表示，第6次兩會商談，我們是帶著希望和期待而來，帶著成果而歸，為能夠讓兩岸和平發展寫下新的歷史而感到高興，為讓兩岸民眾身體健康、生命安全做出努力，感到無限欣慰。
他說，兩會商談未來還有許多重要課題，在前進的道路上，還會有一些困難和阻礙，但任何阻礙只能夠阻止進程的時間，永遠改變不了兩岸和平發展的大趨勢。
陳雲林對圓山飯店的熱情接待，以及負責維安的員警表達感激之意。他說，這次到台北的情況與上次有很大不同，員警的敬業精神，給他留下深刻的印象。
陳雲林表示，兩會簽署的15項協議和達成兩項共識，得到相當多台灣人民的理解和支持。未來將不辜負兩岸人民期待，繼續為兩岸人民謀福祉。
海基會副董事長高孔廉、副秘書長馬紹章，大陸海協會常務副會長鄭立中、執行副會長兼秘書長李亞飛、駐會副會長李炳才、副秘書長張勝林等出席談話會。
陳雲林離開飯店前，現場響起陣陣掌聲，飯店人員熱情歡送，高喊「再見！歡迎再來！」。
海峽交流基金會和大陸海峽兩岸關係協會的制度性協商，由海基會董事長江丙坤和海協會會長陳雲林主談，通稱「江陳會」。

description.hltext_display: Majority Age 25-29 Only Have Cell Phones
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- In a first for any age group, more than half of Americans age 25-29 live in households with cell phones but no traditional landline telephones.
A report on phone use by the federal Centers for Disease Control and Prevention also found that the younger children are, the likelier they are to live in homes that only have wireless phones. That suggests that younger parents are showing increasing comfort relying only on cell phones even as they adjust from being single to a more settled family lifestyle, according to one of the report's authors.
Taken together, the figures released Tuesday provide the latest evidence of how young people are leading the nation's evolution away from landline phones.
"You could say that among that age group, wireless only is the new norm," said Stephen Blumberg, a senior scientist at CDC and an author of the survey.
The shift toward cell phones and away from landlines is having a wide impact, changing not only how people communicate but the telecommunications industry and the work of pollsters and others who collect data.
The survey showed that overall, 27 percent of U.S. households had only cell phones in the first half of this year, up 2 percentage points since the last half of 2009. That number has been growing rapidly - in the first six months of 2007, just 14 percent of households relied only on wireless service, roughly half of current levels.
Among 25- to 29-year-olds, 51 percent lived in homes with only cell phone service in the first half of 2010. That was up 2 percentage points from the previous six-month period.
For both age groups bracketing them - 18- to 24-year olds, and 30- to 34-year-olds - 4 in 10 lived in cell-only households. After age 35, the likelihood that people live in homes with only wireless service falls off, with only 1 in 20 people age 65 and up living in homes that rely solely on cell phones.
The study also found that among children under age 3, nearly 4 in 10 live in wireless-only households. That figure drops to about a third of children age 3 to 5, and less among older children.
Blumberg said this is significant because it counters the perception - backed by previous data - that cell phone-only households are likelier to be comprised of young, unattached people. The latest numbers suggest that as young people used to living only with cell phones have families, they're keeping their wireless-only habits.
"It's a sign that wireless-only is no longer strictly tied to a lifestyle of being young and restless," Blumberg said.
In addition to cell-only households, the survey found another 16 percent of households have landlines, yet get all or nearly all their calls on their cell phones. Their landlines are usually hooked into computers.
Combined with wireless-only homes, this means that to call 43 percent of American households, the only practical way to do it is to dial their cell phones.
The study also found that:
-The households likeliest to rely only on wireless phones consist of adults who are poor, renters, Hispanics or who live with unrelated housemates. Men were slightly more likely than women to live in homes with only cell phones.
-Only 13 percent of households have landlines and no cell phones - down from 24 percent in early 2007.
-Though people age 18-29 are the heaviest cell phone users, they comprise only 40 percent of all wireless-only adults. That's because young adults make up only about one-fifth of the total adult population.
-Only 16 percent of Northeasterners live in cell phone-only homes, the lowest of any region. The highest frequency of wireless-only households is in the South, where 29 percent live that way.
-About 2 percent of households have no phone service at all, a figure that has changed little in recent years.
The data for the study was compiled in the National Health Interview Survey, conducted by CDC's National Center for Health Statistics. It is based on interviews with members of 17,619 households conducted from January through June this year.

event_or_fact.property: You could say that among that age group, wireless only is the new norm
this is significant because it counters the perception - backed by previous data - that cell phone-only households are likelier to be comprised of young, unattached people
It's a sign that wireless-only is no longer strictly tied to a lifestyle of being young and restless

description.hltext_display: when MBT Shoes Clearance they pointed
description.content:
INt our examination of Mr. Tucker s Work on the < Financial Situation of the East India Company/ we confined our observations to that por¬tion of it which treated strictly of the subject of finance; reserving what we had to offer on the subsequent portion of the volume, which re¬lates principally to the sources of revenue, until a future opportunity. That occasion having now arrived, we enter on our task.Among the various sources of revenue in British India, the land-rent taken by its Government ranks as the principal. " From time immemo¬rial says Mr. Tucker, " the land has constituted the chief source of revenue in India; and >MBT Shoes for plain and obvious reasons: the habits of the great body of the MBT people are simple and uniform ; their diet is spare, and confined generally to a few articles of the first necessity,—rice, vege¬tables, fish, and the smaller grains; their clothing is scanty and mean ; their habitations poor and unfurnished; what we term luxuries, are con¬fined to the opulent few. In all this the keen eye of the financier could see nothing to touch; the objects were too minute and worthless, or too widely dispersed, to come fairly within his grasp, and he was compelled to have recourse to the expedient MBT Shoes Clearance of taxing produce in the aggregate. Such is the land-tax." And such are the reasons assigned for taking nine-tenths of the produce of the soil from those whom we still dignify with the name of " proprietors." But we find that the " many" do not, however, escape from being taxed on articles of consumption, particularly that indispensable necessary of life, salt. It is hardly correct to say, that " luxuries "of a taxable nature are confined to the " opulent few," ands therefore, not available ; since the natives of India are generally addicted to the use of spices, tobacco, and other intoxicating drugs; and we, in point of fact, manage to make opium and spirituous liquors yield a con¬siderable income to the state.
Tags: MBT Shoes Clearance MBT Shoes

description.hltext_display: 大陸尋奇/中國滾龍之鄉-寨英 ( 沈冰冰/文並攝影)
description.content:
在寨英人心目中，滾龍是吉祥萬能的象徵，它不僅能祛除各種魔障，確保一方安寧，而且能行雲布雨，贏得五穀豐收，是寨英人祥和安寧、足食豐衣的保障，因而，想方設法得使這條滾龍永久長駐。於是，此後每年新春佳節，都要舞滾龍，代代沿襲，流傳至今。
滾龍是寨英特有的民間藝術，經過幾百年的演變，寨英滾龍在傳統的編紮技術上加以創新，使其雄奇威武，栩栩如生，無論動或靜，都有一種活力與靈性，舞動時嚴謹有序，簡煉明快，一氣呵成。無論白天晚上，滾龍的場面均極其狀觀，白天人們可以仔細看到各種表演招式和龍身上的各種圖案跟色彩對比藝術，晚上人們則可以觀賞到百多尺長的龍體通明透亮，壯麗輝煌，並放射出五彩之光，加上焰火，“三跌銃”等各種配器，既有“火樹銀花不夜天”的燦爛意境，又有“山呼海嘯”般磅礴氣勢，感染力達到了極致。
特定的歷史環境必然創造特定的歷史文化。關於舞滾龍習俗的起源，當地民間流傳著這麼一個古老的傳說——很久以前，有一位地理先生為一大戶人家在寨英的磨龍洞前點了一處阻宅寶地，囑咐他家須躲在家中關門七天不出方靈驗。但這大戶人家呆在家裡悶得慌，且老是聽到門外有驚天動地的炸雷聲與鋪天蓋地的暴風雨聲，由於經受不起這些刺激，這戶人家熬到第六天便膽顫心驚地開門出來了。沒想到門外卻是麗日藍天，一片晴和。百思不得其解，便去問地理先生。地理先生惶恐地告訴他家說：糟了，你家巳無緣消受這大福氣了。果然不久，這大戶人家的陰宅寶地在一個雷雨交加的夜晚被雷劈了。由於雷電太猛，震動了地脈龍神，盤踞在磨龍洞裡修練多年的那條滾龍受了驚嚇，不得不出走而另覓新居。但滾龍一步三回頭，非常留戀這片風水寶地。那條彎彎曲曲的磨龍河便是滾龍出走時留下的痕跡。滾龍往前走不多遠，就在如今的猛礦廠處留下來了。
舞動滾龍時，人們還要編紮一條黃龍伴舞。據說滾龍是雄性的，黃龍是雌性的。雄主陽，雌主陰，只有陰陽消長，相生相合，世間萬事萬物方可完美。舞滾龍前，須按傳統的習慣擇定吉日吉時，請有威望的老祭司在寺廟裡舉行發燈儀式。先在寺廟大殿神像前設置香案，其上陳列齋粑豆腐茶食果晶等祭品，接著點上香燭。但見大堂內紅燭高燒，香煙繚繞，老祭司頭戴冠紮帽，身穿紅法衣，揮動綹巾和司刀，腳踏九宮步，口裡高唱祈禱與祝福的歌，還不時“嘟嘟”地吹響牛角號，虔誠地為村民們舉行發燈祭典。接著是請德高望重且技藝精湛的舞龍老手致吉祥詞和宣佈各種注意事項。隨即，嗩呐高奏，鑼鼓齊鳴，鞭炮震天，歡聲動地，燈會會長高聲宣佈，滾龍燈會開始。於是，在廣場上集結待命的舞龍健兒們，立即將自己精湛的舞龍技藝施展開來。
寨英滾龍傳統的演練招式很多，流傳至今大致有：“臥龍猛醒”、“祥龍出洞”、“蛟龍抖威”，“游龍戲水”、“玉龍鬧春”、“蟠龍戲珠”、“滾龍奔海”、“金龍騰飛”等等。上述各種招式均各有各的具體要求，而且有的招式表演時難度較高。“玉龍鬧春”，兩條龍(指滾龍與黃龍)，由相互羡慕，進而追逐、嬉戲，最後發展到“二龍相交”。只見兩條龍頭緊挨著，嘴對著嘴，全身紋絲不動，唯有兩條龍尾巴悠然自得地輕輕扇動著。其伴奏的打擊樂器亦自歡快跳躍到緊鑼密鼓再到嗄然而止。這突然的寂靜，把整個欣賞的韻味推向更高層次。又如“蟠龍戲珠”一招，彩球舞得極靈活，龍頭左旋右轉總也咬不著它，開始尚耐著性子憨態可掬地追咬彩球，後來被逗得性起索性，將長長的龍身一圈一圈盤繞成一堆，龍頭自圈內中心部位向上探出高高地雄視四方，顧盼生威(因彩球突然消失，滾龍仍固執地四處探尋，突然，彩球在稍遠的地方出現了，隨著鑼鼓節奏的變化，盤成幾圈的滾龍瞬間便換成“一字長蛇陣”呼嘯著直撲彩球。這招在表演過程中要求幾十個表演者的動作高度協調，若其中有誰出差錯或體力不支，必定會重重地摔倒而被別人拖著跑，不折胳膊斷腿起碼也要鼻青臉腫。表演“祥龍出洞”、“游龍戲水”，“滾龍奔海”等招式。即使春寒料峭，甚至河水尚浮著冰塊，舞龍健兒們仍會毫不猶豫地將滾龍舞進沙灘，奔向河水裡(當然，這些招式多在白天表演)。“金龍騰飛”，是所有招式中技巧難度最高的，需從平地舞上高高的古城牆，並在寬僅尺許的城牆上(城牆下是碧水茵茵的寨英河)表演各種招式，當繞牆舞了一周後，結束在一招“振翅欲飛”的動作上。此時，龍頭向上高昂、大有淩空翱翔、仰天長嘯之勢，長長的龍身盤旋翻卷，連綿起伏，有如江河裡的波濤洶湧不斷，舞龍健兒或側、伏、臥，或單腿跪地，或換步騰身均矯健異常，亦驚險至極。
舞滾龍的整個過程，全靠打擊樂器伴奏。由鑼、鼓、鈸(分上鈸下鈸)、勾勾鑼、包包鑼等組成的打擊樂隊，時而緊張、激烈、時而輕緩、抒張。無論那長長的滾龍如何翻卷、騰挪，均有其與之相應的節律為之伴奏，其中較有名的傳統曲牌有“大櫻桃”、“小櫻桃”、“雞啄米”等等。最後是“送龍”也稱“倒燈”。—般在正月十五“送龍”、“送龍”也要清祭司舉行儀式。其程式是“法事”過後，將龍身扛來盤成一堆在寺廟前或河灘上燒掉，全村男女老少聚餐致賀。滾龍翩躚，百村空巷
這是600年煙雨中的歷史原色。為迎接新年的到來，寨英鎮在節前家家戶戶又掛起了紅燈籠。這緋色的光透過夜色浸潤在古舊的木板和青石板上，光影迷離。
寨英古城和寨英滾龍早就名聲在外，在明永樂、嘉靖、萬曆和清乾隆、嘉慶年間，寨英滾龍多次應召晉京表演。新中國成立後，寨英人還舉辦過多次規模盛大的滾龍燈會，他們向湘、川、黔許多有名的集鎮廣發了以龍會友的“英雄帖”，在每的次燈會上，大家公認寨英滾龍最神俊，令寨英人民驕傲不已。
圖為：貴州滾龍之鄉-松桃寨英的人們在舞滾龍時的精彩時刻。
(沈冰冰/文並攝影)

description.hltext_display: 10:11 Kaçak işçi cezası aldılar
description.content:
Hırvatistan’ın en çok izlenen özel kanalı RTL’de 22 Ağustos’tan itibaren izleyiciyle buluşan "Binbir Gece" dizisinin başrol oyuncuları Bergüzar Korel ve Halit Ergenç’in canlandırdıkları "Şehrazat" (Şeherzada) ve "Onur"un aşk hikayesi, bu ülkede büyük bir heyecanla takip ediliyor.
Hırvatistan ve Bosna-Hersek’in en büyük marketler zinciri "Konzum", reklam filmi için bu iki ünlü ismi seçti.
Ancak reklam filminin yayınlanmaya başlamasının ardından Hırvatistan Devlet Müfettişliği, çekimler için bir inceleme başlattı. Buna göre; Konzum marketler zincirinin dahil olduğu Unex grubuna, "yabancı ülkenin vatandaşlarını Hırvatistan’da gereken izinleri almadan çalıştırdığı" gerekçesiyle 10 bin Euro ceza kesildi.
Hırvatistan Devlet Müfettişliği'nden yapılan açıklamada; organizatör Unex grubunun, oyunculara gerekli belgeleri sağlamadığı, bu nedenle ülkenin İş Kanununa aykırı davrandığı kaydedildi

description.hltext_display: Sacriwi MBT Shoes of the Romans
description.content:
At sun-set, we lost sight of the Cape; and, on the following morning, approached the straits of Gibraltar, the far-famed Pillars of Hercules. By standing to the northward during the night, we were well over with the Spanish land in the morning, and closed in with the portion of alarge fleet that^ JgJipw coming up under a press of sail. At noon, the breeze freshen^J^^fc the westward, we opened the Rock of Gibraltar, and stood in fd^|W5ay. Our passing close to Tariffa gave us a fine opportunity of observing that island, on which we saw a MBT new light-house, lately erected by the Spaniards for the direction of vessels entering the Straits. As the Commodore of the fleet passed Europa Point, an ex¬change of salutes took place, which had a fine appearance, and the loud echo of the rock increased its effect. Several of the vessels also scaled their guns at the same time, which, added to the entrance of the fleet into the Bay under a crowd of canvass, formed a most interesting ma¬ritime scene.As I cast my eyes upon the cloud-capped mountains that bounded our southern view, I could scarcely admit the evidence of my senses— when MBT Shoes Clearance they pointed me to another quarter of this divided globe—when they told me that, though but a few days since I mingled in the dearest circle of polished Europe, I now looked upon the sterile ridges of bar¬barous Africa! A wide expanse of ocean rolled between myself and MBT Shoes those I had left behind, and many suns would rise and set before even what I could address them would meet their eyes; yet, long and tedious as were the leagues that we had traversed since dear England faded from my view, I could with truth address it in the language of Goldsmith's Traveller:Where'er I roam, whatever realms I see, My heart untravelVd, fondly turns to thee; Still ever homeward turns, with ceaseless pain, And drags at each remove a lengthened chain.Aye, gaze upon that brow, That brow which towers an intellectual Alp, DiademM with a pale eternityOf thoughts' untrodden snow—round which high dreams,Like Alpine eagles, seem to float amidInviolate solitude and sunshine ! SeeMen unborn will wish To have drawn the breath of time with yhim,—as if It were to inhale his immortality I Credit on.
Tags: MBT Shoes Clearance MBT Shoes

description.hltext_display: 環宇繽紛/在日本“地獄”享受“天堂”滋味 (梁子/文並攝影)
description.content:
別府的地熱頗負盛名，朝霧中看別府，有一種特別的朦朧美。據瞭解，在別府市區14公里的範圍內，有2849處泉口，一日湧出量逼近13萬公升，排名世界第二，僅次於美國黃石國家公園。由於地熱發達，小城內有多達200個各具特色的公共浴場，供當地人及遊客使用。目前全球共有11個溫泉品種，而別府就擁有其中的10種。別府人將眾多的“地獄”溫泉包裝成觀光景點向遊人開放，並將火山泉水熱氣積澱出的礦物質“泉花”採集出來變成特別商品，來自各地的遊人們帶上幾包，回家後就可以在自家浴盆內享受泡日本火山溫泉的美妙感覺了。儘管這些別府“泉花”價格昂貴又份量不輕，但還是頗受遊人歡迎，銷量相當可觀。
溫泉地熱已經成為別府人生活的一部分。由於溫泉資源豐富，當地還有許多索價不到100日元的廉價公共澡堂也在奢侈地使用火山溫泉沐浴。此外，不少人家擁有私人溫泉，即使家裡沒有溫泉口，也可以通過管道引來溫泉水，在家享受泡湯之樂。
別府的地熱，除了當作現成的暖氣、溫泉，還可用來發電、種植蔬菜、培植蘭花或大鬼蓮等熱帶植物；此外，就連養殖熱帶觀賞魚，甚至日本雪猴、鱷魚、河馬、紅鶴也來享受溫泉給它們帶來的好處。泉水中富含的礦物質，往往具有療效；別府“血之池地獄”所出產的“血池軟膏”，便具有治療皮膚病之效。
最近我應邀參加別府溫泉推廣活動，雖則短短三天的行程，卻充分領略到了別府溫泉不僅量多而且奇妙無比。象許多初到日本別府的人一樣，我對別府霧氣繚繞的景象印象也是尤為深刻。乍看之下，那一簇簇升騰的煙霧以為是來自工廠的煙囪，後來才知道這霧氣繚繞竟也是別府獨特的一景，其實這些煙霧皆來自遍佈鎮上的溫泉之家。認識日本溫泉便是從這霧氣蒸騰的輕煙開始，繼而便是別府到處可見的“地獄”兩字。或許是因為我們中國對“地獄”兩字的注釋較為敏感，所以一到日本別府便從熟悉的有限文字中隨處見到“地獄”兩字，總有些彆扭的感覺。後來的訪問中才瞭解到，“地獄”在日本已有了別樣的含義。
別府在很久以前，就將噴射地底熱氣的溫泉稱為“地獄”，早在上世紀30年代的昭和初期，當地人就將幾個“地獄”溫泉包裝成觀光景點而大受歡迎。即使現在，“別府八地獄”景點，仍是旅遊的熱點。別府最壯觀的噴出物來自“地獄”。我參觀的第一個“地獄”是“龍卷地獄”，“龍卷地獄”是個活躍的間歇泉，噴出壓縮的蒸氣流，每十七分鐘一次。泉水從岩石中潺潺流出，蒸騰出的熱氣給人一種神奇的效果，所有的遊客都為此而震憾，一同應邀前往的韓國年輕記者，興奮都跳了起來，而後來參觀了其它溫泉才知道，它只是別府“地獄”中的小弟。其次到達的“血地獄”又給了我們一份更大的驚歎，“血池地獄”的水給水下氧化生成物染成血紅色，而白色的霧氣依然在常年超過100℃的血紅色的池面上環繞，刹是壯觀。而最大的是西元1200年前的一次爆發形成的“海地獄”。“海地獄”的沉積物呈現天空的色彩。環繞在綠水青山中的“海地獄”風景秀麗，長年保持98℃高溫的“海地獄”時而嫋嫋輕煙飄忽、時而濃霧繚繞，遊人們能清晰地看見富含硫磺鐵的泉水，在陽光折射下，閃耀著琉璃般的湛藍。別府有著獨具一格的泥浴與沙浴，為享有“溫泉王國”的別府又增添了豐富多彩的一筆。
這確實是一處特別的所在，在這裡你可以看到、聞到硫磺溶液形成的水流、池塘以及不斷往外冒的硫磺蒸汽。在狹窄的峽谷裡竟然湧出11種溫泉，可治療多種疾病。日本的賓館以溫泉賓館為最高檔，住賓館可以免費洗溫泉。據說過去可以男女共浴，現在沒有了，不過，晚上十點男女浴室互換，這跟我國的溫泉度假村是完全不同的，導遊說這是為了滿足人們的好奇心，也是陰陽調和文化的縮影。
只有在日本，你才能體驗到什麼叫“泡”溫泉，因為這裡的溫泉最講究，從浴衣穿著到泡溫泉規則，很多規矩都充分體現了日本人做事的精和細。在日本泡溫泉必須全裸，當然是男女分開。如果室內溫泉不能完全滿足你，那麼露天溫泉一定會讓你大開眼界，躺在溫泉池的石頭上，身邊霧氣騰騰，微風吹散濃霧，仰望天上繁星，宛如仙境般。
一般來日本的遊人都不會放過多泡幾次溫泉的機會，一天三泡，一定要過足溫泉癮。第二天早上，當其他人還在睡夢中時，我又悄悄地爬起來走出賓館，感受一下的早晨泡溫泉的感覺。
後來我才知道，為什麼古代日本人把溫泉叫做地獄呢？地獄本是佛教中的用語，象徵著苦難的世界。經過火山噴發後的地帶，硫磺漫山，煙霧騰騰，高溫氣體把岩石都化成了粘土，方圓數公里都寸草不生，成為不毛之地。日本人看到這種荒涼的景色，不由產生恐懼之心，不敢輕易靠近。聯想起佛教中描繪的地獄場景，就把這些地方叫做“地獄地帶”，而形成的一個個“熱水池子”，便叫做“地獄”了。像日本箱根地區的大湧穀、小湧穀，古代就叫做大地獄和小地獄，連其周邊的地名也相配叫做閻魔台、地獄澤。一直到1873年明治天皇外出巡遊時，當地人覺得讓天皇“下地獄”有點不吉利，才改了名。
圖為：日本九州別府“地獄”溫泉。

description.hltext_display: Cost of Ethel Austin administration tops £1m
description.author: James Graham
description.content:
THE accountancy fee for handling the administration of retailer Ethel Austin has topped 1m. Manchester-based accountancy firm MCR was appointed to the company in February.
In a new creditors' report marking the company's move to liquidation, the firm said its final bill stands at 1.09m.

description.hltext_display: Крэйг Смит выбыл из строя на две недели из-за травмы спины
description.content: Форвард "Лос-Анджелес Клипперс" Крэйг Смит пропустит как минимум две недели из-за смещения позвоночного диска, сообщает AP. Баскетболисту была сделана анестезия в среду. В январе Смит пройдёт повторное медицинское обследование. Средняя результативность Смита в сезоне-2010/11 составляет 5,8 очка и 2,9 подбора в 24 матчах за "Клипперс". В данный момент команда играет без центрового Камана, повредившего левую лодыжку, а также без резервного форварда Брайана Кука, потянувшего правую стопу.

description.hltext_display: China urged to end 'one-child' policy
description.content:
A leading Chinese rights group has demanded the abolition of Beijing's draconian "one-child" population control policy, citing numerous cases of abuse against women as well as uneven implementation.In a new report entitled "I Don't Have a Choice over My Own Body", the Hong Kong-based Chinese Human Rights Defenders detail forced abortions, sterilisations, insertions of intrauterine devices (IUDs) and coerced testing for pregnancy.
"The policy is enforced in ways that encourage the use of violence against women," CHRD's international director Renee Xia said in a statement.
"There is little evidence that local officials are being held accountable for the abuses they perpetrate as they strive to meet (family planning) quotas."
China formally implemented the policy in 1980 to control its population - currently over 1.3 billion people - by largely limiting urban couples to one child. Rural families are allowed to have two children if the first is a girl.
"It doesn't matter if a couple is allowed to have one or two children, the fact is that the government continues to use coercion to dictate not only the number of children a couple may have but also the birth control methods they must use," said Xia.
"The policy, which affects hundreds of millions of Chinese men and women, is a serious violation of Chinese people's reproductive rights."
According to the report, issued Tuesday, implementation of the policy has been uneven, with some localities offering officials incentives to control births, while other areas become dependent on fines levied for violations.
Forced abortions, many in late-term pregnancies, remain widespread, especially for unmarried women or for couples under the legal marrying age of 22 for men and 20 for women, the report said.
The report cites the case of Liu Dan, who died in February 2009 in Liuyang city in central China's Hunan province while undergoing a forced abortion a week before her due date. Liu was not of legal marrying age, the report said.
Women in some areas have been forced to abort a second son, while others were required only to pay a fine, it said.
Men and women found to have violated the policy have been beaten, detained or fined. Others have lost their jobs, or been denied household registration permits for their children, CHRD alleged.
"Changes to the policy are long overdue," the group said, calling for its abolition and an end to "all forms of violence and detention" connected with its implementation.
"The family planning policy has distorted China's demographics so much that there is now a serious imbalance between the two sexes as well as a rapidly aging population."
On Monday, the day before the report was released, the director of Beijing's National Population and Family Commission, Li Bin, said the policy would remain in place and "largely the same" for the next five years, state media reported.

description.hltext_display: 'That '70s Show'-actrice dronken achter het stuur
description.content:
De Amerikaanse actrice Lisa Robin Kelly, beter bekend als Laurie uit de populaire televisiereeks 'That '70s Show', is veroordeeld voor het rijden onder invloed.
'Het zusje van Eric Forman' werd in augustus in de deelstaat North Carolina dronken achter het stuur betrapt. Vorige maand legde de rechter haar een voorwaardelijke straf van twaalf maanden op. Kelly moest eveneens een geldboete betalen.
De actrice (40) was in vijftig afleveringen van de reeks te zien. Na het vijfde seizoen werd ze plots vervangen. Nadien werd het erg stil rond haar. Bovendien is ze nu nog duidelijk een schim van de vrouw die ze destijds was. Beeld: Popeater

description.hltext_display: FC Köln pestasi Bayernin entisen maalivahdin
description.content:
Saksan Bundesliigassa pelaava FC Köln on pestannut Bayern Münchenin entisen maalivahdin Michael Rensingin. 26-vuotias Rensing liittyy kölniläisjoukkueeseen loppukauden kestävällä sopimuksella.
Rensingin sopimus Bayernin kanssa päättyi viime kauteen. Suurseura ei kuitenkaan uusinut Rensingin sopimusta, ja siksi hän on ollut ilman seuraa kesästä lähtien.
Kölnissä Rensing korvaa Faryd Mondragonin, joka siirtyi Pohjois-Amerikan MLS-liigan Phildelphia Unioniin.

description.hltext_display: Kakuta jatkaa Chelseassa
description.content:
Chelsea tiedotti tiistaina tehneensä 4,5 -vuotisen jatkosopimuksen hyökkääjä Gael Kakutan kanssa. Kakuta, 19, tuli Chelseaan jo kolme vuotta sitten ja on saanut peliaikaa lähinnä Chelsean reservijoukkueessa. Chelsean ykkösjoukkueessa hän on esiintynyt neljässä ottelussa.
Ranskan maajoukkueessa Kakuta on pelannut nuorten tasolla. Hänestä toivotaan kotimaassaan A-maajoukkueen uutta supertähteä.

description.hltext_display: Barcelona jäi maaleitta
description.content:
Espanjan jalkapallocupissa Copa del Reyssa nähtiin tiistaina yllätys, kun La Ligassa viime aikoina vain murskavoittoja saavuttanut FC Barcelona jäi Athletic Bilbaoa vastaan maalittomaan tasapeliin. Barcelona peluutti ottelussa lähes kaikkia tähtiään, mutta Athletic puolusti hyvin ja ansaitsi tasapelinsä. Toiseen neljännesvälierien osaotteluun kotikentälleen Athletic suuntaa jopa henkisessä etulyöntiasemassa.
Myös Cordoban ja Deportivo La Corunan ottelussa nähtiin yllätys alasarjajoukkue Cordoban taisteltua 1-1 -tasapelin. Riki maalasi Deportivon rankkarista johtoon, mutta Pepe Diaz tasoitti toisella puoliajalla.

description.hltext_display: Eremenkon Kilmarnock pakotti Celticin tasuriin
description.content:
Skotlannin jalkapallon mahtijoukkue Celtic joutui tiistain kotiottelussaan tyytymään 1-1 -tasapeliin Kilmarnockia vastaan. Conor Sammon maalasi Kilmarnockin johtoon 53. minuutilla, mutta Celticin uurastus tuotti tulosta, kun norjalaispelaaja Thomas Rogne tasoitti 84. minuutilla 1-1. Kilmarnockin puolustus sai ottaa vastuun tapahtuneesta.
Alexei Eremenko jr oli Kilmarnockin avauksessa ja pelasi koko ottelun. Celtic on sarjataulukossa toisena ja Kilmarnock viidentenä.

description.hltext_display: Verizon明年推出摩托羅拉4G手機
description.content:
Verizon Communications Inc (威瑞森通訊) ((US-VZ)) 和 Vodafone Group PLC (沃達豐) (VOD) 的合資公司Verizon Wireless (威瑞森無線) 營運長 John Stratto 周二受訪時表示，威瑞森明年將銷售一款運用其新型 4G 網路的 Motorola Inc(摩托羅拉) ((US-MOT)) 智慧型手機。
此為威瑞森首次表明 4G 手機的製造廠商，也代表對摩托羅拉的信心，此款新手機可能將與 Apple (蘋果) ((US-AAPL)) 的新手機正面對決。
威瑞森無線本月推出運用 LTE 技術的高速第 4 代通訊網路，但一直沒有宣布哪一款手機將使用此 4G 網路。
摩托羅拉先前曾表示明年將製造搭載 LTE 網路的手機，但周二時拒絕說明更確切的時間，也不願透露該款手機銷售通路。目前尚不確定此款新手機的發表時間和售價。
威瑞森通訊總裁 Lowell McAdam 在 10 月份的一場無線科技會議上曾表示，1 月份的 CES 大會上將出現一些搭載 LTE 技術的智慧型手機和平板電腦，且明年上半年零售商就會開始販售這些設備。

description.hltext_display: MBT Shoes Clearance gained
description.content:
on Cape St. Vincent, were these : Three years before the reduction of Ceuta, the DukeofViseo had sent a vessel to^®tore the coasts of Africa,* which was the first voyage of discovery am^Kken by the Por¬tuguese. This attempt, rude as it now appears, was then pregnant with a series of alarms, particularly adapted to depress the resolution of sea¬men, who are always well versed in legendary horrors. Africa, from time immemorial, has been the land of wonders or fairy illusion, and though the industry of the 19th century may have removed many of the plausible theories that darkened the beginning of the 15th, we still have little more than a knowledge of its coasts; and our ignorance even of that, however studiously it may be concealed, disgraces the charts of the first, maritime power on the globe. The philosophic ideas of Cicero, wTho collected whatever had been approved by the ancients, were now become the errors of the vulgar; and certainly the arguments that were capable of convincing the reason of so great a natural historian as Pliny, may be allowed to have had some weight on the minds of Portuguese seamen. They believed, therefore, that the middle regions of the earth, in the torrid zone, teemed with scorching vapours, and that the interior of Africa, as well as its coasts, were uninhabitable from intense heat. They are described, however, to have completed their voyage to Cape Bojador, and their success led them to more extensive projects. The systems which the narrow faculties of man frame in every age, and sub¬stitute for the sublime truths of nature, would here probably have repressed, at least for many years, the daring exploits of navigation, if the unprejudiced and clear mind of the Portuguese Prince had not dared to question the validity of the ancient sages, the most enlightened philosophers, and the most accurate geographers wluch Greece or Rome had produced. With a judgment matured b}r the conversation of various scientific men, whom his patronage had attracted in Africa, and with a mind enlarged by the perusal of every work which illustrated the dis¬coveries he had in view, the Conqueror of Ceuta returned to Portugal. The high land of MBT Cape St. Vincent, as he approached the coast, dis¬played the extensive command of an ocean hitherto unexplored ; and probably, a view of its cliffs, at a time when his mind glowed with future projects of discovery, might suggest the first idea of constructing his romantic town of Sagres on the Promontorium Sacriwi MBT Shoes of the Romans. At Sagres, his arsenals and dock-yards were built, while his presence stimulated their industry and skill. Under his auspices, the mariner's compass was brought into use, and the means of ascertaining the latitude and longitude partially understood. The sea ast?*olabe, a nautical in¬strument which derived its name from the armillary sphere invented by Hipparchus at Alexandria, was improved and introduced into the Portu¬guese sendee. Skilful mariners from all countries were encouraged to settle at Sagres, and a public school and observatory was established there by the Duke. It was impossible to pass a scene of so much interest without feeling a sort of veneration and regard for those whose names are associated with its history, and without rejoicing in the presence of a companion to participate in them.
Tags: MBT Shoes Clearance MBT Shoes

description.hltext_display: Aps forte chuva, moradores contabilizam prejuzos
description.content:
Prefeitura realizou durante toda a manhã de ontem intervenções nos principais pontos de alagamento da cidade
Na manhã de ontem, equipes da prefeitura trabalhavam na desobstrução dos bueiros no intuito de evitar futuros problemas com as chuvas e ainda remover o lixo trazido pela enxurrada, entupindo a rede hidráulica e impedindo o escoamento da água.
Segundo informações dos técnicos da Secretaria Municipal de Serviços Urbanos, um dos pontos mais críticos foi próximo ao Mercado do Bosque, que ficou intrafegável durante a precipitação da última segunda. Há informações de que essa tenha sido a maior chuva, já ocorrida esse ano, em valores pluviométricos.
Na periferia da capital os prejuízos da forte chuva fez que os próprios moradores atuassem na desobstrução de bueiros e córregos. É o caso do aposentado Sebastião das Chagas, morador do bairro Placas há 28 anos, segundo ele a água invadiu a casa, danificando móveis e eletrodomésticos.
"Na hora que vi a casa alagada, até liguei para os bombeiros, mas o que ele poderia fazer por mim? Apenas ajudar a levantar os móveis. A cama nova foi perdida, motor da geladeira foi danificado. A bueira que colocaram aí para fazer a rua não tem capacidade para escoar toda a água, quando chove ela represa e sofremos com alagamento", lamenta.
De acordo com o morador que alega manter o pagamento dos IPTU em dia, o mínimo que deve ser oferecido é uma solução para o problema. "Não quero que eles venham aqui e me deem uma cama nova ou uma casa, nada disso, apenas que eles desfaçam o serviço mal feito e construam algo que evite com que novos alagamentos ocorram. Não estou pedindo nada de graça eu pago por isso", argumenta.

description.hltext_display: Chamtivá samospráva
description.content:
V týchto dňoch by mali zložiť sľub novozvolení šéfovia radníc a noví mestskí či obecní zastupitelia. Nedeje sa tak však všade v každom z 2 800 miest a obcí po celom Slovensku. Niekde opäť nezvolení starostovia či primátori špekulujú a odmietajú zvolať zastupiteľstvá. Spravia tak až po Novom roku. Dôvod je veľmi jednoduchý. Chamtivosť. Veď z obecného či štátneho krv netečie. A im pribudne na konto o jeden mesačný plat na odstupnom viac.
Ilustračné foto
Autor: SHUTTERSTOCK
Hoci je komunálna politika bližšie k občanom, práve v nej sa dejú veci, ktoré často zostávajú skryté v tieni veľkej politiky. A tak nie je výnimkou, že voliči si opakovane na čelo obce zvolia starostu, ktorého súd odsúdil, lebo sa nezákonne staral o vlastné blaho namiesto blaha obyvateľov obce. A tí mu ešte aj zvýšia plat či doprajú odmeny, hoci je v dedine v noci tma pre nedostatok peňazí či obec v zime nečistí chodníky a cesty, lebo nemá na posypový materiál.
Odchádzajúci primátori nechávajú svojim nasledovníkom často nielen vybrakovanú mestskú kasu, nezaplatené miliónové faktúry, ale aj kauzy okolo predaja mestských nehnuteľností či korupčného udeľovania obecných bytov.
Stranícke centrály mlčia a tvária sa, že sa ich prehrešky ich straníckych kolegov na primátorských postoch netýkajú.
Mnohí z tých, čo nastupujú na ich miesta, sa nechcú učiť z chýb svojich predchodcov. Myslia si, že riadiť mestskú časť alebo samotné mesto či obec sa dá ľavou zadnou aj z parlamentu v Bratislave. Tam totiž zostali viacerí po voľbách sedieť na poslaneckých stoličkách, ktorých sa držia ako kliešť.
Voliči sa potom za štyri roky len čudujú, že napriek pekným sľubom sa v meste nič nezmenilo, a keď, tak len k horšiemu. V parlamente sa z mnohých našiel len jediný staronový primátor Liptovského Mikuláša, kto uznal, že riadiť mesto je práca na plný úväzok.
Ďalší deviati supermani a superženy z poslaneckých lavíc tvrdia, že dve funkcie zvládnu. Je otázne, či ich k tomuto tvrdeniu vedie len nereálny pohľad na seba a na to, čo skutočne zvládnu. Alebo sú za tým peniaze, ktoré za dve funkcie dostanú.
Mnohí totiž napriek opakovaným vyhláseniam, že jeden ich plat pôjde na charitu, doteraz na dobročinnosť neprispeli reálne ani jedným centom. Viac im na srdci leží totiž ich vlastné blaho ako spokojnosť tých, čo im dali svoj hlas.

description.hltext_display: FTN: Can PM step out of Sonia's shadow?
description.content: Sagarika Ghose asks a panel whether the Congress plenary underlined more than ever that Sonia Gandhi is the super PM of UPA II?

description.hltext_display: Schalke ja Hoffenheim voittoihin
description.content:
Schalke joutui Saksan jalkapallocupin ottelussa tiistaina koville vieraissa alasarjajoukkue Augsburgia vastaan. Augsburg puolusti hyvin, mutta joutui antautumaan 84. minuutilla. Perulaispelaaja Jefferson Farfanin maali pelasti Schalkelle voiton.
Hoffenheim otti Bundesliigan jumboryhmästä Borussia Mönchengladbachista helpon 2-0 -voiton. Gylfin Sigurdsson ja Demba Ba viimeistelivät Hoffenheimin maalit.

description.hltext_display: Montpellierin laskusuhdanne jatkui
description.content: Ranskan jalkapalloliigassa pelattiin tiistaina yksi ottelu, kun Lorient ja Montpellier kohtasivat aiemmin sääolojen takia siirretyssä ottelussa. Montpellier jatkoi tehottomia otteitaan ja peli päättyi 0-0. Alkukaudesta jopa sarjan kärjessä ollut Montpellier on pudonnut sarjataulukossa kymmenenneksi.

description.hltext_display: We are the champions!
三代傳承 花蓮薯第一品牌「洄瀾薯道」
description.content:
花蓮薯第一品牌「洄瀾薯道」是一家以〝手工、低糖、不含防腐劑〞為經營理念的花蓮薯專賣店。創辦人有感於近年來花蓮名產由糯米麻糬打響了知名度，花蓮最古老的傳統名產─花蓮薯反而沒落了。因此帶領一群三代傳承的老師父，以其逾七十年手工經驗，全力將花蓮薯系列商品再研發。
花蓮薯才是花蓮最古老的傳統名產，「洄瀾薯道」的老師父遵循祖父所留下的手工技藝，以在地特有的蕃薯所精製，做法是先將蕃薯蒸熟、以竹片手工去皮、搗泥手握成型後烘焙而成。為了降低甜度採用日本進口比砂糖貴了七倍以上的天然海藻糖，不再放任何添加物，成為台灣最健康養生的美食名產。難能可貴的是：老師父們的手工技藝日新愈益，包裝方式更是一直有所改良，從最早使用香茅草包裝到改用紙張包裝，更以〝真空脫氧包裝〞延長保存期限達15天以上，並杜絕風吹日曬之小包散裝販賣模式，畢竟衛生、健康、安全才是食品製作最重要的考量。
在92年觀光局美食展中，「洄瀾薯道」果然以花蓮薯、紫心薯，榮獲各家五星級飯店主廚聯合推薦得到花蓮名產首獎。更榮獲：2004年中日國際茶藝大賞最佳茶點、2005年總統府接待外賓用指定禮品、2005全國最高級觀光列車寶島之星唯一指定採用的花蓮名產、2006花蓮縣政府無毒產品認證…等殊榮。
除了早已馳名的花蓮薯、紫心薯、花蓮芋等人氣商品，隨著現代人越來越重視健康養生，「洄瀾薯道」更用心、更創新，例如：將黃金蕃薯作為上層外皮、紫心蕃薯作為下層外皮，將麻糬裹入其中作為內餡，巧妙的將花蓮薯結合麻糬創造了全新的花蓮名產〝花蓮薯糬〞。或有將蕃薯作成外皮裹入芋頭，將花蓮最古早的名產─花蓮薯、花蓮芋結合成為〝芋仔蕃薯〞。
另以法式風味烘焙的〝土製炸彈〞，結合了松子、核桃、腰果、南瓜子、芝麻、杏仁等六種乾果的大地能量。也有以台東最美容養生的洛神花搭配花蓮最佳的黃金蕃薯，製作出令人驚豔的洛神花蓮薯。另有師父們以巧手精製，需冷凍24小時以上後才烘焙的〝和風蕃薯燒〞，呈現了日式和果子的精巧風味。更有專門為年輕人準備的伴手禮，將紫心蕃薯作為原料製作而成的〝紫炫風手工餅干〞。而〝紫金皇朝〞蛋黃酥，更是全國唯一以蕃薯作為主要內餡的蛋黃酥，讓〝紫金皇朝蛋黃酥〞與〝養生蕃薯月餅〞成為中秋佳節送禮的最健康選擇。
「洄瀾薯道」的老師父其實還有許多絕活，其中只作一味的黑糖沙琪瑪風靡眾人，香酥脆卻又能入口即化不粘牙。而MINI黑糖小麻糬與青柚小麻糬的香Q口感更是市面上一般麻糬無法相比的。至於剝皮辣椒則早已是台灣人的最愛了。
為什麼「洄瀾薯道」一直以花蓮的蕃薯作為主要的產品素材？對阿公阿婆級的人來說，在物資缺乏的年輕歲月，吃不起白米只能以曬乾的蕃薯籤充數填肚子，偶而烤蕃薯就是兒時最甜美的營養零食，而原住民早年打獵、捕魚外出時的隨身〝蕃薯糰〞即是花蓮薯的前身，在花蓮一說起蕃薯就很容易想起那段苦澀又溫馨的年代。
知識與經濟的快速發展，民眾對於健康養生與生活品質愈來愈注重，特別是農產業界都知道，在好山好水好空氣所孕育的花蓮蕃薯品質冠全省，只有在花蓮的蕃薯才能被製成花蓮薯。而蕃薯對現代人的身心健康助益，更是超越一般地方名產的功能與價值。
蕃薯的神奇力量是現代人不可不知的……因為蕃薯是一種鹼性食品，富含高纖維素可以整腸助消化，可以中和人體內所累積過多的酸，如吃太多的肉類、蛋、或疲勞引起的酸。此外蕃薯中的膠原及粘液多醣類物質，有預防動脈血管硬化、保持血管彈性與排泄多餘膽固醇的作用。蕃薯甚至可以美化肌膚、緊實肌肉、防止內臟下垂、轉換賀爾蒙，促進兩性幸福。國際預防醫學的網站上，大力推崇蕃薯（Sweet Potato）的營養價值，並讚譽它為「近乎完美的食物」，因為它的熱量低，但是它的蛋白質比雞蛋還要高，蕃薯同時還擁有胡蘿蔔素、銅、維他命C、E以及愈來愈受到重視的高纖維。
現在吃蕃薯最IN。尤其它的防癌功效已經獲得科學界的證實，在所有的食物當中，蕃薯的防癌效果堪稱第一。在學術界的人體實驗中，每天連續吃蕃薯約150公克，達3個月的受實驗者，實驗結果不僅平均可以減輕原體重的12%，令人意外的是高達92%受實驗者反映連情緒都變的更好了。
洄瀾薯道‧地址：花蓮市中華路11號‧電話：03-8338899

description.hltext_display: Sina Says CEO Chao Met With Facebook’s Zuckerberg in Beijing
description.content:
Facebook Inc. founder Mark Zuckerberg visited the Beijing offices of Sina Corp. as the billionaire executive continued his tour of Chinas biggest Internet companies. Zuckerberg had an information exchange on the Chinese Internet market with Sina Chief Executive Officer Charles Chao during their meeting today, Liu Qi, a spokesman at the Chinese company, said by phone. The head of Facebook, the worlds biggest social-networking site, had discussions about Sinas microblog service, Liu said.
The meeting with Sina, owner of Chinas third most-visited website, follows Zuckerbergs tour of the offices of Baidu Inc. earlier this week. Time Magazine last week named Zuckerberg, 26, its Person of the Year for creating a new system of exchanging information. Facebook has been inaccessible in China for more than a year. The Chinese government blocks access to web content that is pornographic, related to gambling and critical of the ruling Communist Party.

description.hltext_display: 10:09 Arena'da ilk rakip Ajax
description.content:
Son Dakika Spor
A A+-
Galatasaray’ın, Türk Telekom Arena’da oynanacak ilk maçtaki rakibi belli oldu.
Galatasaray, 15 Ocak 2011 Cumartesi günü törenle açılacak statta ilk maçında Hollanda’nın dev ekibi Ajax ile karşı karşıya gelecek. Karşılaşma saat 20.00’de başlayacak.
Başbakan Recep Tayyip Erdoğan’ın da katılacağı Türk Telekom Arena açılış töreni ise saat 18.00’de start alacak. Yaklaşık iki saat sürecek, Türkiye’de ilk kez uygulanacak teknolojiyle hazırlanan muhteşem açılış programıyla ilgili ayrıntılı bilgilerin, sarı-kırmızılı kulübün resmi internet sitesinden daha sonra duyurulacağı kaydedildi.

description.hltext_display: LS9 Raises $30 Million to Ready Products for Commercial Production
description.content:
Series D Round Led by BlackRock with Participation by All Previous Investors
South San Francisco, CA (PRWEB) December 21, 2010
LS9 , Inc. today announced that it has received $30 million in its latest round of funding. BlackRock, a prestigious, global-reaching firm with over $3 trillion in assets under management, led the investment round. All previous investors also participated in the round, including; Flagship Ventures, Khosla Ventures, Lightspeed Venture Partners and CTTV Investments LLC, the venture capital arm of Chevron Technology Ventures LLC. The additional funds will be utilized to ready LS9’s lead products for commercial production and support additional development and growth programs.
“We are very proud to welcome a firm with the size, track record, and global reach of BlackRock as a new investor in LS9,” said Noubar Afeyan, Chairman of the LS9 Board of Directors and Managing Partner of Flagship Ventures. “This funding round is a strong endorsement of the quality of LS9’s technology, team, and ability to execute.”
LS9's revolutionary technology uses a one-step fermentation process to convert renewable plant-based materials into a diverse portfolio of fuel and chemical products. LS9 has successfully operated its pilot plant in South San Francisco, California for more than two years and announced the acquisition of a larger-scale production facility in Okeechobee, Florida in January 2010. In June 2010, LS9 won the Presidential Green Chemistry Challenge Award, the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency's (EPA) highest environmental honor.
“We are very pleased that this outstanding group of new and existing investors has demonstrated their commitment to LS9’s mission to bring renewable chemical and fuel products to market,” said Ed Dineen newly appointed President and Chief Executive Officer of LS9. “In particular with BlackRock, the world’s largest asset manager, joining our investor group, and given their increasing focus on renewables, we believe this will benefit LS9 in a number of ways. With this new round of funding, LS9 will be able to accelerate implementation of our plans to commercialize our technology and grow our product portfolio.”
About LS9 LS9, Inc. is a privately-held industrial biotechnology company pursuing the commercial development of renewable fuels and chemicals. LS9 is applying synthetic biology to produce proprietary biofuels that are compatible with existing fuel distribution and consumer infrastructure, as well as high-value industrial chemicals. LS9 is the pioneer in the commercial development of fermentation derived hydrocarbon biofuels and its patent-pending products are custom engineered in the lab to address immediate market needs for clean energy alternatives to petroleum. In June 2010, LS9 was awarded the U.S. Environmental Protection agency’s highest environmental honor for its revolutionary Renewable Petroleum™ technology. The company was founded in 2005 and Flagship Ventures, Khosla Ventures, Lightspeed Venture Partners, Chevron Technology Ventures, and BlackRock among others have provided funding to date. LS9 is headquartered in South San Francisco, California.
###
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prweb2010/12/prweb4916674.htm

description.hltext_display: Lelaki Aceh bebas tuduhan edar dadah
description.content:
SHAH ALAM - Seorang pemilik kedai gunting rambut dari Aceh, Indonesia, terlepas daripada hukuman mati selepas Mahkamah Tinggi di sini hari ini melepas dan membebaskannya daripada tuduhan mengedar dadah jenis Kanabis seberat 7,269 gram pada Mac tahun lepas.
Hakim Dr. Badariah Sahamid membuat keputusan itu selepas berpuas hati bahawa Ishak Abdurrahman, 31, berjaya menimbulkan keraguan yang munasabah terhadap kes pendakwaan.
Ishak didakwa melakukan kesalahan itu di hadapan bangunan Pasaraya Tesco, Jalan Setia Prima SU 13/5 di sini, kira-kira pukul 12.30 pagi pada 1 Mac lepas.
Dia didakwa mengikut Seksyen 39B (1)(a) Akta Dadah Berbahaya 1952 dan boleh dihukum mengikut Seksyen 39B (2) Akta yang sama yang memperuntukkan hukuman mati mandatori, jika sabit kesalahan.
Sepanjang perbicaraan, pendakwaan yang dikendalikan Timbalan Pendakwa Raya Yeong Leu Shin memanggil lima saksi memberi keterangan sementara pembelaan yang diwakili peguam Ariff Azami Hussein mengemukakan tiga orang saksi. - Bernama

description.hltext_display: 歐洲大雪 港接回滯英學生
description.content:
受歐洲大風雪影響，香港多個來往歐洲的班機被迫取消或延誤，不少港人滯留當地。國泰航空公司今天安排4個班機，優先接回滯留英國的400名香港學生。
香港機場管理局表示，由於歐洲大風雪，香港今天有3班來往英國倫敦班機被取消，另有4班來往英國及德國的班機延誤。
國泰航空表示，倫敦機場受到暴風雪影響，運輸量大減，從18日至今，共有15班國泰班機被迫取消，目前約2800名乘客滯留倫敦機場，但因部份乘客已取消或更改行程，還要進一步確認實際滯留人數。
另外，在香港政府協調下，國泰今天安排4個班機從倫敦返港，優先接回滯留倫敦機場的400多名香港學生，他們大多數是在英國讀書的中學生，首批返港的是年紀較小、沒有人同行的13至16歲學童。
香港旅遊業議會表示，香港至今仍有9個旅行團滯留在歐洲，涉及人數170人，其中4個團約100人滯留在倫敦，其餘5個團分別滯留在布拉格及巴塞隆納等城市。

description.hltext_display: NZ man wins payout over 'lost' elephant
description.content:
A New Zealand elephant handler has won a wrongful dismissal claim against a circus that falsely told him it had lost his beloved animal and his services were no longer required.The Employment Relations Authority (ERA) found on Wednesday that Tony Ratcliffe, who had looked after Jumbo the elephant for 30 years, had agreed to sell the animal to the Australian-based Loritz Bros Circus in 2008 and act as its carer.
It said Ratcliffe, who once ran his own circus, disagreed with Loritz Bros about the way the female elephant was being displayed to be fed by members of the public.
After the dispute, he went to the circus's scheduled camp at Tauranga, on the North Island, only to be told by a staff member that Jumbo had been lost and circus workers were looking for her.
He later read in a newspaper that the 35-year-old elephant had been donated to the RSPCA.
The ERA found the circus deliberately plotted to mislead Ratcliffe about the elephant's fate, causing him considerable distress about an animal he had formed a close relationship with over three decades.
It ruled Wednesday he had been unfairly dismissed and ordered the circus to pay $NZ26,000 ($A19,4000 compensation for lost wages, humiliation and distress at not being able to say goodbye to his long-term charge.
Jumbo now lives at the Franklin Zoo, south of Auckland, where she has been named Mila and is undergoing rehabilitation with the aim of allowing her to socialise with other elephants, national news agency NZPA reported.

description.hltext_display: Penjual bunga digantung kerana membunuh
description.content:
SHAH ALAM - Seorang penjual bunga Melor dijatuhi hukuman gantung oleh Mahkamah Tinggi di sini hari ini selepas didapati bersalah membunuh seorang penghantar surat dengan menikamnya di bahagian leher, rusuk kanan dan perut menggunakan sebilah pisau, tiga tahun lepas.
Hakim Datuk Mohd Yazid Mustafa membuat keputusan itu selepas berpuas hati bahawa pihak pendakwaan berjaya membuktikan kes terhadap M.Nagarajan melampaui keraguan yang munasabah.
Nagarajan, 39, dituduh membunuh B.Elanko, 31, di No: 147, Rumah Setinggan Pandan Jaya, Ampang Jaya dekat sini, kira-kira pukul 8.30 malam pada 30 Disember 2007, mengikut Seksyen 302, Kanun Keseksaan itu memperuntukkan hukuman mati mandatori, jika sabit kesalahan.
Dalam penghakimannya, Hakim Mohd Yazid berkata, mahkamah menerima keterangan sepupu mangsa, G.Mogan dan isteri Mogan, T.Nancy yang berada di tempat kejadian serta melihat kejadian tersebut.
Beliau berkata, tertuduh dalam pembelaannya tidak menafikan bahawa sebelum datang ke tempat kejadian, dia (tertuduh) telah berjumpa mangsa dan Mogan di kedai serta berlaku pergaduhan antara tertuduh dan mangsa. - Bernama

description.hltext_display: Positional Call: Gujarat Pipavav Port
description.content:
Source: IRIS (22-DEC-10)
Comments | Post Comment
Broking firm Anagram has recommended Gujarat Pipavav Port (GPCL) as positional call and has recommended buy in the range of Rs 64.50-63.50 with the stop loss of Rs 59.60 and target of Rs 70; Time-frame of 15 days from December 22.
Rationale:
GPPL has broken out of a trend line resistance adjoining tops of October 25 and November 9 with good volumes as shown in the chart above. The stock has decisively closed above the upper band of the Bollinger on the dailymchart, indicating strength and momentum. RSI and MACD are firmly placed on the daily chart and are moving northwards, supporting the up move in the stock.

description.hltext_display: 五百公斤肉圓 彰化要創金氏紀錄
description.author: purplesmiling
description.content:
五百公斤的肉圓到底有多大？這個周六(25日)的2010彰化肉圓節，彰化縣政府要結合當地肉圓業者，耗費7個小時、20位師傅一起製作這顆超大肉圓，挑戰金氏世界紀錄，誓言打造「世界第一的肉圓在彰化」的金字招牌。
用力敲下象徵五百公斤肉圓的冰雕，彰化縣副縣長張瑞濱興奮地舉著大拇指表示，「在彰化，有一半地方都在製作肉圓，彰化肉圓不僅歷史悠久更是台灣經典小吃。」適逢「百年全國運動會」也將在彰化縣舉行，想製作一顆巨大肉圓吸睛。
負責製作這顆超大肉圓的阿璋肉圓師傅施明裕表示，為了這項任務，他們特別訂製了一個直徑2公尺長的鋁鍋，預計請來20多位師傅，從早上6點開始製作到下午1點，完成後可以讓3千多位共同見證歷史的民眾一起食用。
除了傳統蕃薯粉作外皮、竹筍、豬肉等簡單原料的彰化肉圓外，傳統老店的第二代、第三代業者也紛紛研發出包有干貝、泡菜等新口味的肉圓。阿三肉圓老闆張耀仁表示，「加入干貝、蛋黃、香菇的肉圓，在做法上改以高溫油炸，更能逼出味道層次。」
另外，川原肉圓老闆花了一年半時間，研發出泡菜口味的肉圓，兒子黃辰峰在記者會現場吃起肉圓說：「我曾經一天吃25個肉圓耶！我同學都超愛我的，因為我都會帶去學校請大家吃！」摸摸自己圓圓的臉蛋，他還俏皮地說：「我就是最好的代言人啦！」
「2010彰化肉圓節」也將安排彰化縣特色伴手禮、農產品展示、趣味遊戲及體驗活動。同時，縣政府也邀請民眾上facebook上集氣，只要超過5000個讚，現場就能加碼品嘗更多肉圓。

description.hltext_display: India test raket, net als Pakistan
description.content: NEW DELHI - Een dag na een Pakistaanse proef met een kernraket, heeft aartsrivaal India woensdag een test gedaan met een soortgelijke raket. De proef is succesvol verlopen, meldde het Indiase ministerie van Defensie. Het land schoot twee zelfgemaakte Prithvi II-raketten af vanaf een testcentrum in Chandipu-aan-zee in het oosten van India. De raketten kunnen 350 kilometer ver reiken en kunnen een gewone of een kernbom dragen. India had het wapen op 24 september voor het laatst getest. Toen ging de lancering echter niet door wegens technische problemen.''De Prithvi II-raket heeft zijn robuustheid en precisie bewezen'', zei het Indiase ministerie.Pakistan testte dinsdag met succes haar Hatf V, die geschikt is voor een atoombom. (ANP)

description.hltext_display: Ahli perniagaan bebas tuduhan sebabkan kematian
description.content:
SHAH ALAM - Seorang ahli perniagaan hari ini dilepas dan dibebaskan oleh Mahkamah Sesyen di sini daripada tuduhan menyebabkan kematian
seorang lelaki empat tahun lepas, tanpa dipanggil membela diri.
Hakim Hasbi Hasan memutuskan demikian selepas mendapati terdapat banyak kelompangan dalam keterangan saksi-saksi pendakwaan sebelum ini.
Sejurus selepas Hasbi membacakan keputusannya, S.Anumathan, 42, yang berdiri di kandang tertuduh dengan berkaki ayam terus mengangkat kedua-dua tangannya dan bersyukur.
Anumathan dibicarakan atas tuduhan menyebabkan kematian Zulkifli Parman, 23, di Perhentian Bas Jalan Suci 25/90, Seksyen 25 di sini, antara pukul 10.30 malam, 8 Januari 2006 dan pukul 2.30 pagi pada 9 Januari 2006.
Kesalahan di bawah Seksyen 304 (a) Kanun Keseksaan itu memperuntukkan hukuman penjara maksimum 20 tahun jika sabit kesalahan.
Sepanjang perbicaraan 18 saksi pendakwaan dipanggil memberi keterangan. - Bernama

description.hltext_display: True Grit has the impact of an Old Testament saga
description.author: Ken Eisner
description.content:
Directed by Ethan and Joel Coen. Starring Jeff Bridges and Hailee Steinfeld. Rated 14A.
The Coen brothers continue their journey into arcane Americana in True Grit , this time obscuring a highly effective telling of the same story. By going back to the novel by Charles Portis—a southern writer still working in multiple genres—they create a superb vehicle for Jeff Bridges, in which he actually manages to make us forget that John Wayne played this role in 1969. Watch the trailer for True Grit.
The bearded, eye-patch-wearing Bridges is an excellent shambles as Rooster Cogburn, an 1880s U.S. Marshal with a reputation for steady drinking and trigger-happy encounters with bandits and bystanders. That suits 14-year-old Mattie Ross, out to avenge the murder of her upstanding father by a no-good ranch hand called Chaney.
In contrast with 20-something Kim Darby in the old Grit , our pigtailed protagonist is played by an actual kid, newcomer Hailee Steinfeld, who rushes her lines in early scenes but later proves increasingly resourceful. This mirrors the effect Mattie has on Cogburn and on a rival bounty hunter, a Texas Ranger called LaBoeuf. The latter is played by an almost unrecognizable Matt Damon, an incalculable improvement on Glen Campbell, at least when guitars aren’t involved.
When this trio heads into Indian Territory, they have a series of period-correct adventures, some violent, some mysterious, and some mordantly funny. It’s all three when they find their fellow in the company of outlaw Ned Pepper, harmoniously played by Barry Pepper, fitted with the worst dentures you’ve ever seen.
This haunting material is aided by the indelible imagery of Roger Deakins, the Coens’ usual cinematographer, and a score by veteran collaborator Carter Burwell, based on old church hymns. The script spares us Mattie’s incessant Bible quoting, by the way, but .

description.hltext_display: El IBEX sube el 0,36 por ciento a la espera del PIB de Estados Unidos
description.content:
El principal indicador de la bolsa española, el IBEX 35, subía el 0,36% en los primeros compases de una jornada en la que los inversores tendrán la vista puesta al otro lado del Atlántico, donde se conocerá el PIB del tercer trimestre en Estados unidos.
Tres inversores conversan mientres siguen las cotizaciones en la Bolsa de Madrid, en la Plaza de la Lealtad. EFE/Archivo
A las 09.10 horas el selectivo recuperaba 42,80 puntos y se situaba en 10.246 unidades, en tanto que el Índice General de la Bolsa de Madrid, con todos sus sectores en positivo, avanzaba el 0,42%.
El descenso acumulado desde enero se reducía al 14,18%.
El resto de bolsas europeas mantenía las dudas de la apertura, con avances del 0,49% en Milán, del 0,03% en Fráncfort, y del 0,01% en Londres, y descensos del 0,10% en París.
La cita de la jornada se hará esperar hasta media sesión, cuando el Gobierno de Estados Unidos divulgue su cálculo definitivo del producto interior bruto (PIB) del tercer trimestre, que según el consenso de los analistas mostrará que la economía del país creció a un ritmo del tres por ciento.
Las principales cotizadas españolas optaban por las subidas, del 0,81% para repsol, del 0,56% para Iberdrola, del 0,54% para BBVA, del 0,36% para Endesa, del 0,29% para Santander, del 0,40% para Telefónica, y del 0,24% para Inditex.
BME lograba el mayor avance del índice, del 1,03%, en tanto que solo dos valores encajaban descensos, Banesto (0,64%) y Acciona (0,18%).
El euro abrió hoy con tendencia a la baja y se cambiaba en el mercado de divisas de Fráncfort a 1,31 dólares, después de que el martes cerrara en 1,3133 dólares.

description.hltext_display: [社会]今年のクリスマスプレゼントの傾向は？ ズバリ『実用的家電製品
description.content:
お付き合いも長くなると毎年やってくるクリスマスのプレゼント選びも大変です。「何を贈れば喜んでもらえるのか」悩むところですね。せっかく贈るのですから喜んでもらえるものを贈りたいと思うのも当然でしょう。
そこでコミュニケーションデザイン総合研究所では三大都市圏の既婚・恋人がいる20〜40代の男女1200人を対象にアンケートを行いました。
◆クリスマスプレゼントの平均予算
男性21，000円、女性は14，000円
◆相手に期待するプレゼントの平均金額
女性18，000円、男性13，000円
今年の傾向としては、男女ともに日常的に使える実用的なものを選ぶ人が多いようです。
相手の懐事情も考慮
それはズバリ、家電製品であり、男性は「ＩＴ機器」や「ＡＶ機器」、女性は「美容家電」が人気となっているようですね。
具体的にはスマートフォンや最新デジタル機器、美顔器や美顔スチーマーなど、男性はかっこよく、そして女性はきれいになれるものがおすすめです。
また、予算では自分が予定している額よりも期待する金額のほうが安いところをみると相手の懐事情もちゃんと考慮している人が多いということがわかります。（情報提供：婚活ニュース）

description.hltext_display: BJP accuses Sibal of covering up 2G scam
description.author: Tihar inmates paid to make CWG 'supari' claim
description.content:
New Delhi: Dismissing Telecom Minister Kapil Sibal
"It is a worst kind of cover up," BJP spokesman Prakash Javdekar said reacting to Sibal's claim.
Sibal had on Tuesday claimed that the government "actually" lost Rs 1.43 lakh crore in revenue in 1999 due to the then BJP-led NDA regime shifting to revenue share system from fixed licence fee for telecom operations.
Javdekar said NDA government's "pragmatic policies" and revenue sharing model "unleashed a revolution" in the telecom sector and "it did not allow the sector to die."
It is evident from the "tele density" in the country today, he said.
Criticising the minister for comparing it to the present telecom policy, he said, "You are selling the spectrum in 2008 at the rate of 2001 and how you want to justify any how is all bad advocacy... what was right in 2001 will not be right in 2008."
Sibal's comment come at a time when the government auditor CAG has quantified a "presumptive" revenue loss of Rs 1.76 lakh crore due to non-auction of 2G spectrum in 2008 by former Telecom Minister A Raja
