description.hltext_display: BAM heeft financiele overeenstemming voor bouw scholen in VK
description.author: beurs.nl
description.content:
Woensdag 22 december 2010 09:26 AMSTERDAM (Dow Jones)--Koninklijke BAM Groep nv (BAMNB.AE) heeft financiele overeenstemming bereikt met de Londense deelgemeente Camden voor de bouw van drie scholen.
Met het publiek-private bouwproject is een investering gemoeid van circa EUR90 miljoen. De financiering wordt verstrekt door Aviva.
BAM gaat een academisch gebouw bouwen voor University College Londen, alsmede een school voor speciaal onderwijs voor kinderen van 3 tot 19 jaar. Ook gaat het bedrijf een middelbare school in Camden renoveren. De oplevering van de eerste school wordt verwacht in juni 2011.
Door Archie van Riemsdijk; Dow Jones Nieuwsdienst; +31-20-5715 210, archie.vanriemsdijk@dowjones.com
(END) Dow Jones Newswires

description.hltext_display: Richtingloze handel op Europese markten
description.author: beurs.nl
description.content:
AMSTERDAM (ANP) - De Europese aandelenbeurzen openden woensdag vlak bij gebrek aan richtinggevend nieuws. Volgens handelaren is het onderliggende sentiment echter positief, mede dankzij goede macro-economische cijfers en overnamenieuws dat dinsdag naar buiten kwam.
Kort na de opening noteerde de AEX-index van meest verhandelde fondsen in Amsterdam 0,1 procent hoger op 356,40 punten. De MidKap-index van middelgrote fondsen was onveranderd en stond op 634,10 punten. Ook in Frankfurt, Londen en Parijs stonden de graadmeters onveranderd.
Chemieconcern DSM (min 0,3 procent) was een van de sterkste dalers in de AEX. Amerikaanse advocatenkantoren onderzoeken of DSM de aandeelhouders van Martek Biosciences genoeg betaalt voor hun stukken. Na de aankondiging dinsdag van de overname voor circa 1,1 miljard dollar steeg het aandeel DSM 3,9 procent.

description.hltext_display: CCTV di kawasan panas siap Mac depan
description.content:
GEORGETOWN - Sebanyak 496 buah kamera litar tertutup (CCTV) yang sedang dalam proses pemasangan di kawasan "panas" di seluruh negara dijangka siap pada Mac depan, kata Timbalan Menteri Dalam Negeri Datuk Wira Abu Seman Yusop.
Beliau berkata, pemasangan CCTV itu dengan kos RM59 juta merupakan usaha Polis Diraja Malaysia (PDRM) dan Pihak Berkuasa Tempatan (PBT) untuk mengekang gejala jenayah di negara ini dan langkah itu terkandung di bawah Bidang Keberhasilan Utama Negara (NKRA).
"Dalam usaha ini PDRM telah bekerjasama dengan 25 PBT dari segi infrastruktur telah siap tetapi dari segi teknikalnya masih belum siap lagi," katanya di sini hari ini.
Beliau berkata, selain dilihat sebagai usaha yang dapat memberikan hasil 'segera" pemasangan CCTV juga merupakan satu daripada langkah segera dalam pelaksanaan program bandar selamat di bawah NKRA.
Katanya, konsep Penang Intergrated Publis Safety System (PIPS) yang diperkenalkan sejak 14 Februari 2008 telah menjadi sistem CCTV rujukan di negara ini dan juga luar negara. - Bernama

description.hltext_display: [社会]「宇宙兄弟」初のムックにツジトモ、花沢健吾ら寄稿
description.content:
小山宙哉「宇宙兄弟」の初のムック本「Ｗｅａｒｅ宇宙兄弟ＶＯＬ．01」が、本日12月22日に発売された。
「宇宙とヒトの素敵な関係マガジン」をキャッチコピーとした本書では、宇宙の魅力を初心者にも分かりやすく紹介。野口聡一や毛利衛ら宇宙飛行士たちも登場するほか、ツジトモ、花沢健吾、益田ミリ、木下晋也による描き下ろしマンガも掲載される。
またムックの特設サイトもオープン。益田ミリの描き下ろし「オレの宇宙はまだまだ遠い」第1話が無料公開されている。なお「宇宙兄弟」12巻が本日同時発売され、通常版のほかＴシャツがセットになった限定版も数量限定で用意されている。
「Ｗｅａｒｅ宇宙兄弟ＶＯＬ．01」収録内容
Ｓｐｅｃｉａｌ＜ＢＲ＞野口聡一は見た！大好きな「地球」ベスト10
Ｉｎｔｅｒｖｉｅｗ＜ＢＲ＞毛利衛：宇宙飛行士の底力／宇宙の「黒」は、優しく僕を包み込んだ。＜ＢＲ＞山方健士：ＪＡＸＡの底力／海に潜るように、宇宙に潜れ！＜ＢＲ＞植松努：民間の底力／重力とのケンカは、こんなにおもしろい。＜ＢＲ＞
Ｆｅａｔｕｒｅｓ＜ＢＲ＞本谷有希子：無重力系ゆるふわコラム／かっこいい宇宙？＜ＢＲ＞辻村深月：宇宙姉妹――1992年の秋空――＜ＢＲ＞
Ｃｏｍｉｃｓ＜ＢＲ＞益田ミリ：オレの宇宙はまだまだ遠い＜ＢＲ＞ツジトモ：ＤＡＢＯ＆ＲＡＣＯ＜ＢＲ＞花沢健吾：スペース・マン「＃スペースちょんの間」＜ＢＲ＞木下晋也：ポテン生活特別編「宇宙生活
Ａｒｔｗｏｒｋｓ＜ＢＲ＞鈴木康広：りんごのけん玉と月面着陸
Ｃｏｌｕｍｎ＜ＢＲ＞林公代：ベテラン宇宙ライターが『宇宙兄弟』の裏側、教えます！＜ＢＲ＞嶋浩一郎：宇宙についてこれだけは覚えておかなくちゃ＜ＢＲ＞向井万起男：私と宇宙兄弟
Ｍａｎｉｆｅｓｔｏ＜ＢＲ＞ＷＥＡＲＥ宇宙兄弟ＰＲＯＪＥＣＴ
Ｃｌａｓｓｉｃｓ＜ＢＲ＞小山宙哉：『宇宙兄弟』第1話「弟ヒビトと兄ムッタ」完全収録（情報提供：コミックナタリー）

description.hltext_display: Robots serve food in China eatery
description.content:
Service with a smile also comes with a mechanical voice at the Dalu Robot restaurant, where the hotpot meals are not as famous as the staff.The restaurant is touted as China's first robot hotpot eatery, where Star Wars-like droids circle the room carrying trays of food in a conveyor belt-like system.
More than a dozen robots entertain, serve, greet and receive customers. The eatery opened this month in Jinan in northern Shandong province.
The service industry in China has not always kept up with the country's rapid economic growth. Some restaurants offer quite basic service, leading Dalu's customers to praise the robots.
First-time visitor Li Xiaomei says the robots "have a better service attitude than humans".

event_or_fact.property: have a better service attitude than humans

description.hltext_display: La prima de riesgo de la deuda española abre en 257 puntos básicos
description.content: La prima de riesgo de la deuda soberana española -que depende de la diferencia entre la rentabilidad del bono español a diez años y la del alemán del mismo plazo- inició hoy la jornada en el mercado secundario de deuda en 257 puntos básicos, sin cambios respecto al cierre de ayer.

description.hltext_display: Little Fockers need to Fock off
description.author: John Lekich
description.content:
Little Fockers is the third kick at the can in a very lucrative franchise. Surprisingly little has changed for nurse Greg Focker (Ben Stiller). Despite being the loving father of precocious twins, he still has to cope with the father-in law from hell (Robert De Niro), an ex-CIA agent who has lingering doubts that the ever-gullible Greg is good enough for his daughter Pam (Teri Polo). When Jack has a mild heart attack, he begins grooming Greg to take over the as the family patriarch. This is how we arrive at De Niro summoning up the pale ghost of the young Vito Corleone and asking, “Are you ready to become the God Focker?”
Watch the trailer for Little Fockers .
The bad news? This is the best line in the movie.
Not that things ever get totally unwatchable. Director Paul Weitz gives everybody just enough slack to make the most of their characters. As Kevin (Pam’s doting ex-boyfriend), Owen Wilson reprises his trademark turn as the human equivalent of a golden retriever. Greg’s parents (Dustin Hoffman and Barbra Streisand) appear to enjoy their limited time on-screen. On the other hand, it’s always disconcerting when the cast seems to be having a better time than the audience.
The only new twist here? Jessica Alba as a sexy drug company rep who’s hot for Greg. Despite her best effort, it’s not enough to keep things fresh. After 10 years, the initial pep behind the lucrative concept is long gone.
Not surprisingly, the ending hints at the coy possibility of a fourth installment. Personally, I think it’s time for everyone to just take the money and Fock off.

description.hltext_display: Pengedar kanabis ke tali gantung
description.content:
SHAH ALAM - Seorang tukang cat kereta dijatuhi hukuman gantung sampai mati oleh Mahkamah Tinggi di sini hari ini selepas dia didapati bersalah mengedar kanabis seberat 9,144 gram di hadapan sebuah restoran, dua tahun lepas.
Hakim Datuk Wira Mohtarudin Baki menjatuhkan hukuman itu selepas berpuas hati tertuduh, Tuay Boon Wee, 40, gagal menimbulkan keraguan yang munasabah terhadap kes pendakwaan.
Beliau berpendapat, tiada kelompangan dalam kes pendakwaan walaupun pihak pembelaan membangkitkan persoalan mengenai kegagalan pendakwaan untuk memanggil seorang saksi penting memberi keterangan.
Dalam pembelaannya sebelum ini, tertuduh mendakwa saksi itu, Tan Say Yong mengupahnya untuk menghantar dadah tersebut dengan bayaran upah RM200.
Tuay didakwa melakukan kesalahan itu di hadapan Restoran Xin Mei, Tingkat bawah, Vista shop lot, Damansara Damai dekat sini, kira-kira pukul 9 malam, 8 April 2008.
Dia didakwa mengikut Seksyen 39 B (1)(a) Akta Dadah Berbahaya 1952 dan dihukum mengikut Seksyen 39 B (2) Akta yang sama yang memperuntukkan hukuman mati mandatori jika sabit kesalahan.
Pendakwaan dikendalikan oleh Timbalan Pendakwa Raya Rosidah Abu Bakar sementara tertuduh diwakili peguam V.Ayasamy dan K.Renuka. - Bernama

description.hltext_display: 國泰加機 恢復服務 疏導倫敦旅客
description.content:
國泰今天公布，已運作額外航班疏導滯留倫敦的旅客，同時因應希斯路機場第二條跑道重開，準備恢復往來當地的定期航班服務。
所有原定今天分別往來倫敦的4班定期航班將如常運作。
首班額外加開的航班已於英國時間昨晚午夜由倫敦曼徹斯特機場開出，預計於香港時間今晚8時抵達香港國際機場。該航班載有300名乘客，大部分為年幼及少年學生。國泰準備於今、明兩天加開另外兩班機，接載滯留的乘客返港。詳情容後公布。
國泰發言人表示：「在運作環境非常嚴峻的情況下，同事正日以繼夜為滯留學生及乘客提供協助，盡一切力量使他們得到適當的照顧。並同時制訂方案，包括安排陸路交通，經由曼徹斯特機場接載滯留學生盡快返港。」
「由於定期航班剩餘的機位不多，預料疏導滯留倫敦的乘客需時數天。我們正研究加開更多班次的可行性，以盡快協助乘客返港。」
發言人補充：「香港機場方面，我們已成功疏導原定前往倫敦的滯港乘客，亦恢復由其他航點接載經香港前往倫敦的乘客。」
發言人提醒未有確認機位的旅客，請勿前往機場。旅客在出發前往機場前，宜先瀏覽國泰網站www.cathaypacific.com.tw ，查閱最新航班資訊。另亦可利用網站的「自助訂位管理服務」功能登記及更新聯絡資料，確保能透過手機短訊或電郵，獲取有關航班的最新消息。另歡迎旅客申請notiFLY航班提示服務，透過行動電話簡訊及電郵提供航班編號、最新出發/抵達時間、最新航班狀況及天氣預測等訊息。亦或是透過手機或無線通訊器材下載CXMobile 應用程式使用流動服務，以獲得即時國泰航班訊息。
*媒體查詢：
侯恩錫 國泰航空企業傳訊部副理，(02)2714–9678

description.hltext_display: [社会]劇場でミラクル・ラー再び！舞台「ふしぎ遊戯」再演が決定
description.content:
10月に上演され好評を博した、渡瀬悠宇原作の舞台「ふしぎ遊戯」の再演が決定した。
今回上演されるのは、初演時の前半部分をクローズアップした「ふしぎ遊戯〜朱雀編〜」。企画制作を手がけるａｍｉｐｒｏによると、初見の人のみならず前回観た人も楽しめる内容になるとのことだ。2011年3月30日より4月3日まで、東京・新宿のシアターサンモールにて上演される。
キャストやチケットの販売方法などの詳細は、ａｍｉｐｒｏの公式サイトにて近日公開予定。前回チケットを入手できず涙を飲んだ人は、欠かさずチェックしておこう。（情報提供：コミックナタリー）

description.hltext_display: Toshiba lanceert brilvrije 3D-televisie
description.content:
TOKIO - Het Japanse elektronicaconcern Toshiba heeft woensdag in Japan de eerste driedimensionale televisie gelanceerd waarbij kijkers geen gebruik hoeven te maken van een speciaal brilletje.
De Japanse consument moet een bedrag van 119.800 yen (1089 euro) neertellen voor de nieuwe 3D-televisie. Kijkers hoeven daarbij geen gebruik te maken van een speciale bril die het mogelijk maakt om diepte te creëren. (ANP)

description.hltext_display: 兩岸醫衛協議文本 呈交陸委會
description.content:
海峽交流基金會董事長江丙坤今天下午3時率第6次江陳會海基會協商代表團向陸委會報告，並將海峽兩岸醫藥衛生合作協議文本呈交陸委會，由行政院大陸委員會主任委員賴幸媛代表接受。
在海基會協商代表團報告前，賴幸媛致詞表示，兩岸醫藥衛生協議是兩岸15項協議中，條文最多、非常具體可行的協議，充分達到政府設定的3目標：維護國人健康安全、保障消費者權益、兼顧產業發展。
賴幸媛表示，這次來不及簽署的兩岸投資保障協議是因為協商代表團認為需要更充足的時間討論，以爭取最有利的結果，這表示在兩岸協商中，政府堅持「以台灣為主、對人民有利」的承諾，不會為簽署而簽署。
賴幸媛表示，在兩岸協商過程中，政府不僅可主導議題，也可循序漸進促進台灣經濟發展，一步一步落實保障民眾權益的目標。協商團隊用實際行動「顧主權、顧安全、顧生存、顧產業」的成果，在各民調獲得高度支持。
賴幸媛表示，第7次江陳會重點推動議題包括投保協議，還有海峽兩岸經濟合作架構協議 （ECFA）後續協商，有具體進展就會納入海基、海協兩會會談並簽署協議。
財團法人海峽交流基金會（海基會）和大陸海峽兩岸關係協會（海協會）的制度性協商，由海基會董事長江丙坤和海協會會長陳雲林主談，通稱「江陳會」。

description.hltext_display: Sarjan polis bebas tuduhan rasuah
description.content:
KLANG - Seorang anggota polis berpangkat Sarjan yang menghadapi dua pertuduhan rasuah hari ini dilepaskan dan dibebaskan daripada pertuduhan itu oleh Mahkamah Sesyen di sini.
Hakim Yong Zarida Sazali membuat keputusan itu selepas mendapati pihak pendakwaan gagal membuktikan dua pertuduhan ke atas Sarjan G.Kanniappan itu adalah melampaui tahap keraguan munasabah.
Kanniappan, 56, dituduh meminta rasuah berjumlah RM300 daripada Kamal Jummu pada 18 September, 2003 di Balai Polis Sungai Pelek, Sepang supaya tidak mengambil tindakan ke atas Kamal yang terlibat dalam satu pergaduhan.
Dia juga dituduh menerima suapan RM200 daripada Kamal Jummu di Restoran Aziz , No 45, Jalan Besar Sepang pada 19 September 2003 bagi tujuan yang sama.
Kanniappan dituduh melakukan kesalahan itu semasa bertugas di Jabatan Siasatan Jenayah Ibu Pejabat Polis Daerah Sepang dan beliau ditahan pada tahun 2003 sebelum didakwa pada Julai 2004. - Bernama

description.hltext_display: [コラム]婚活を上手に行うための基礎知識
description.content:
【はじめに】
今、テレビや雑誌でなにかと話題の「婚活」。「婚活」とは結婚活動のことです。
結婚したいと思った時には出会いがないという人や、自分が求める条件を持つ人が、パーティーや、結婚紹介所に通い、「婚活」をする人が増えてきています。
そんな話題の「婚活」について知っておきましょう！今回は、婚活を始める前の基礎知識について紹介します。
【婚活をはじめる前の基礎知識】
■婚活を上手に行う方法
婚活にも色々と種類があり、異業種交流会やコミュニティサイトをはじめとするインターネット関連など多種多様です。
しかし、結婚を考えていない人が集まっている、ネットを通して知り合うのは怖いなどを考える人も多くいるはずです。
インターネットを通じて知り合うのには、デメリットもあるのが現状です。また、出会いは増えても結果に結びつかないというのもよく聞く話です。
結婚相談所や、婚活パーティでは結婚を前提とした出会いが確約されているので、理想の相手を見つけ、婚約へつながる可能性がグッと高まります。
■どうして婚活をするのか
ひと昔前までは、働く女性も少なく、20代の前半には結婚するカップルがほとんどでした。しかし現在は働く女性も多くなり、相手から「見つけてもらう→見つける」という意識に変わってきました。
結果、適齢期という概念もなくなり30歳を過ぎてからの結婚が当たり前になってきました。
しかし、社会的地位を築いて、「そろそろ結婚したい！」と思っても、いざという時に見つからないことで、晩婚化が進んでいるとのことです。女性は高齢出産になると、リスクが増えることもあります。
早めに結婚して、将来設計を立てたいと思っている人も多くいるはずです。そのため、待っていても理想のパートナーには巡り会えません。
婚活することで自分でチャンスを掴むことができます。そのため、婚活をする人が増えてきています。
待っていても見つからないのであれば、自分から探してみる！これこそ婚活人気の理由です。
【おわりに】
「結婚」とは、大きな人生のイベントです。「結婚」を理想の人とするためにも、現在婚活が流行しています。今まであまり婚活について知らなかった人も、今回の記事で婚活の基礎知識を知っていただけたと思います。
（著者／ｎａｎａｐｉユーザー：ｓｎｙｃｋｅｒ）（情報提供：ナナピ）

description.hltext_display: "Patriots Point board commits to land sale strategy"
description.content:
/p> Nexsen Pruet attorney Neil Robinson shared insight with the Patriots Point Development Authority board members at their retreat on December 16th, 2010. The Charleston Regional Business Journal reported on the meeting in an article entitled "Patriots Point board commits to land sale strategy."
At the event, members "endorsed the idea of selling off pieces of land to developers, rather than offering only long-term leases as it has in the past."
Robinson talked to the board about how "developers have more difficulty getting financing if they are working under a ground lease than they do if they own the land."
Robinson was invited to address the board members due to "his experience with complex development" and because he has "represented developers who previously considered projects at Patriots Point."
Read more here from the Charleston Regional Business Journal.
Neil C. Robinson, Jr. has extensive experience in virtually every aspect of complex real estate transactions. He is frequently retained to develop, negotiate and interpret contractual relationships.

description.hltext_display: HootSuiteがmixiに対応 デジタルガレージと提携して国内販売強化
description.content:
ニュース Twitterなどに対応したクライアントソフト「HootSuite」がmixiにも対応。デジタルガレージと提携し、有料版の国内販売を加速する。 2010年12月22日 16時59分 更新 ソーシャルメディアアカウントを一元的に管理できるクライアントソフト「HootSuite」を開発・運用するカナダHootSuiteは12月22日までに、HootSuiteをmixiに対応させたと発表した。デジタルガレージと提携し、有料版の国内販売を加速する。 HootSuiteは、Twitterや、Facebook、LinkedInなどさまざまなソーシャルメディアを一元管理できるクライアントソフト。PCのほかiPhoneやAndroid端末に対応。無料版と有料版（月額5ドル99セントからの「PRO」、同1499ドルの「Enterprise」）がある。
新たにmixiに対応。携帯電話向けクライアントソフトも開発し、一部ユーザー限定でテスト公開していることも明かした。Blackberry版とAndroid版の日本語版も公開した。
HootSuite有料版の国内販売では、デジタルガレージと提携する。デジタルガレージは「企業ユーザーにソーシャルメディアの活用を推進していく」としている。 関連記事 アクセスの4割が日本から カナダ製Twitterクライアント「HootSuite」日本語版公開へ
複数のTwitterアカウントを一括管理できる「HootSuite」日本語版が7月ごろに公開される。全トラフィックの38％が日本から。「勝間和代さんなど日本のユーザーが広めてくれた」という。 関連リンク ニュースリリース（PDF） デジタルガレージ [ITmedia] Copyrightｩ 2010 ITmedia, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

description.hltext_display: Met 'faces toughest period yet'
description.content:
The Metropolitan Police is facing its most challenging period since Commissioner Sir Paul Stephenson took over, he has said. Sir Paul, who was deputy commissioner five years ago and took the top post last year, said a combination of violent disorder on the streets, budget cuts, and the forthcoming Olympics were stretching his force.
And he acknowledged the student tuition fees protests were being driven by "a real passion about a cause". Sir Paul, interviewed on BBC Radio 4's Today programme, was asked how far the protests, cuts, and other events, were stretching his force. He replied: "When you put all the various challenges that face me and my colleagues in the Metropolitan Police service together, this is as challenging a period as we have ever faced." He stressed he did not doubt the operational capability of the force. But he said: "I think the challenges we are facing, that stretch we are facing, is not as we have known for a long, long time. "We can make significant economy savings, but how far we can stretch those savings is a real issue. I am concerned about our current budgetary situation." On the student protests, Sir Paul said: "There's clearly a sense of anger out there that's led to a level of violence." He said some protesters were determined to breach police lines and had come prepared, and added: "I think we have got a sense of a real passion about a cause out there. Within that, there are various levels of passion that lead to extremism."

description.hltext_display: Perkhidmatan kaunter Imigresen ditutup
description.content:
KUALA LUMPUR - Jabatan Imigresen Malaysia menutup perkhidmatan kaunter di semua cawangannya sempena cuti Hari Krismas, kata Ketua Pengarahnya, Datuk Alias Ahmad hari ini.
Operasi di Jabatan Imigresen Negeri di Pulau Pinang, Perak, Selangor, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur/Putrajaya, Negeri Sembilan, Melaka, Johor, Kelantan, Terengganu, Sarawak dan Sabah akan ditutup pada 25 dan 26 Disember manakala di Kedah pada 24 dan 25 Disember, katanya dalam kenyataan di sini hari ini.
Sebarang pertanyaan boleh dikemukakan kepada Bilik Gerakan, Ibu Pejabat Imigresen Malaysia, Putrajaya di talian 03-8880 1555/1556. - Bernama

description.hltext_display: [社会]「ＳＵＰＥＲ☆ＧｉＲＬＳ」がファーストコンサート
description.content:
ａｖｅｘ初のアイドルプロジェクト「ＳＵＰＥＲ☆ＧｉＲＬＳ」が、本日発売の1ｓｔアルバム「超絶少女」でメジャ−デビューを果たした。そのアルバム「超絶少女」をひっさげて、ＳＨＩＢＵＹＡ−ＡＸでデビュー記念のファーストコンサートを行った。
今回「ＳＵＰＥＲ☆ＧｉＲＬＳ」の衣裳は、ファッション専門学校のモード学園とタッグを組み、生徒がデザイン・制作した衣裳で登場。メンバー内で初のユニットも登場。ロック調のポップな曲で登場した「ロックスター」、ふわふわした女の子らしいドレスの「ツインテールズ」、学園恋愛ソングの「スクールガールズ」、と3組のユニットも披露された。公演中にはバックスクリーンの映像に、オーデションからデビューまで振り返る映像が映し出され、感極まったメンバーたちが次々と涙した感動的な場面も。
24日大阪、25日名古屋、26日東京と、アルバム「超絶少女」の全国握手会イベントが予定されている。（情報提供：リアルライブ）

description.hltext_display: Fidelity Tax Advantage Fund: Invest
description.content:
Source: BUSINESS LINE (22-DEC-10)
Comments | Post Comment
Investors eyeing equity-linked saving schemes (ELSS), that have the potential to participate in market rallies as well as the ability to contain the downsides across market cycles, can consider adding Fidelity Tax Advantage Fund to their portfolio.
Over a three-year period the fund delivered a compounded annualised return of 7.6% and beat its benchmark BSE-200 by eight percentage points. In the corrections experienced in 2006 and 2008, despite being fully invested in equity, its contained losses through diversification.In general, due to stable corpus, ELSS funds tend to take sizable exposure to mid-cap and small-cap stocks. However, Fidelity Tax`s allocations are predominantly concentrated in large-cap stocks. Hence investors with a conservative approach to their investment can consider buying units of the fund.
Having said that, investors opting for dividend reinvestment for the sake of tax-benefits, should bear in mind that once the Direct Taxes Code is implemented, they will not be eligible for benefits under Section 80C. Investors opting for the dividend option may not have any special benefits vis-à-vis those opting for growth.
Performance: Over the past year, the fund clocked an annualised return of 30% and outpaced the BSE-200 by 14 percentage points. Over a one-year period, the fund trailed just two of its ELSS peers - HDFC Long Term Advantage and Quantum Tax Saving Fund, and that too by a few percentage points.
The returns since Fidelity Tax`s inception through the systematic investment plan (SIP) route are far superior to what may have been generated through its lump sum investments.
Portfolio overview: The fund`s latest available September portfolio consists of 64 stocks across and 25 sectors. The fund is overweight on financial sectors and close to 30% of the assets is shared between banking and financial services stocks.
As these sectors rallied the most over the last year, it has aided performance. In the past few months, in the banking space, the fund pruned exposure to Axis Bank, and HDFC Bank while it retained other banking stocks such as SBI, Union Bank of India, and ICICI Bank. The fund is managed by Sandeep Kothari.

description.hltext_display: 天使還是魔鬼？Apple將WikiLeaks軟體從App Store下架
description.content:
對支持者來說，WikiLeaks維基解密網站是捍衛媒體自由、揭露真相的民主鬥士，但對反對者來說，它卻是擾亂世界秩序、無端惹是非的眼中釘。WikiLeaks網站洩漏阿富汗戰爭文件，又引爆美國外交911事件，使得Amazon、PayPal、Mastercard、Visa、和Bank
of America等單位終止對它的服務，但這些不友善機構也遭到其支持者的駭客攻擊，而創辦人Julian
Assange更被告性侵，隨後投案交保，但各種相關謠言仍層出不窮，事情的發展可比美好萊塢電影般撲朔迷離。
就在今天，科技產業龍頭的Apple，也將一款17號上架，可讓iPhone及iPad用戶瀏覽WikiLeaks網站內容，並跟隨其Twitter帳號的軟體，從它的官方線上商店App
Store中下架。Apple發言人表示，在App
Store上的軟體必須符合所有當地法律規定，並且不傷害到任何個人或團體，但並未對當初WikiLeaks軟體為何會有辦法上架做出解釋。這款WikiLeaks軟體在App
Store上要價$1.99美金，短短幾天內已被購買下載4434次，其開發者表示將把大部分收益捐給WikiLeaks網站。
事實上，WikiLeaks網站被封鎖之後，網路上已出現上百個鏡像網站(mirror
sites)相挺，其中包括保護媒體自由的無國界記者聯盟組織(Reporters Without
Borders)，也宣布將加入此行列以表示支持。WikiLeaks網站究竟是天使還是魔鬼，很難一言以蔽之，不過可以肯定的是，它將引起網路世界的一場混戰，還將帶動更多類似的新媒體產生，影響改變媒體生態。

description.hltext_display: Outside editorial: Making good history
description.content: Outside editorial: Making good history

description.hltext_display: Outside editorial: Making good history
description.content:
The following editorial first appeared in the Milwaukee Journal Sentinel:
There was premature talk of a post-racial nirvana after the election of President Barack Obama. But the election was nonetheless a singularly significant event in a continuum of significant events that began with ?All men are created equal? on to the Emancipation Proclamation, through the civil rights struggles of the 1960s to present day.
When Obama signs a bill repealing the military?s ?don?t ask, don?t tell? rule, it will be an event as significant for gay rights as President Harry Truman?s order integrating the U.S. military was for black Americans. Obama?s signature will mark historic progress for a nation that has for too long denigrated gay Americans. Our hope is that it is the death knell for one of the last frontiers of bigotry.
The U.S. Senate on Saturday did its part, striking down the ban that forced gay men and lesbians to deny who they are, even as they risked their lives for the rest of us. The House acted earlier. Now the measure is headed for the president?s desk, where his signature is assured.
It is with no small measure of pride in this nation that we note this progress, though at state levels resistance continues. And in this also there are similarities to how the battle for civil rights for African-Americans and others unfolded. This momentum can be stalled but not halted. ?Don?t ask, don?t tell? never made sense. It was intended by President Bill Clinton to soften the military?s outright ban. Instead, it acknowledged the obvious that gays and lesbians were already serving, ably and courageously. And they have likely been doing so since the United States has had a military.
Ensconcing them in barrack and shipboard closets simply made the statement that being who they were was a flaw but that harboring prejudice against them was not. We should be past that as a nation. But then the military often has been a leader in such progress.
We make a prediction here that we don?t believe to be bold: There will be no long-standing deterioration of military morale or readiness after repeal. A survey of the military earlier revealed that.
But the military must ensure this by having as little tolerance for the prejudices of homophobes as it now has for the bigotry of racists. It is, simply, the American thing to do.

description.hltext_display: Windkraft bis Ernährung: BIBB fördert sieben Projekte für eine nachhaltige Entwicklung
description.author: Andreas Pieper
description.content:
In der beruflichen Bildung werden die Weichen weiterhin auf nachhaltige Entwicklung gestellt: Das Bundesinstitut für Berufsbildung (BIBB) fördert aus Mitteln des Bundesministeriums für Bildung und Forschung (BMBF) sieben Projekte zur Beruflichen Bildung für eine nachhaltige Entwicklung (BBNE) aus den Bereichen Metall/Elektro mit Schwerpunkt Erneuerbare Energien, Bauen und Wohnen, Chemie und Ernährung. In den Projekten wird zum Beispiel der Qualifikationsbedarf von Fachexpertinnen und -experten für Offshore-Windenergieanlagen ermittelt, in den Bereichen Chemie und Ernährung werden Strategien entwickelt, die für das Thema nachhaltige Entwicklung von der Berufsorientierung bis zum Übergang vom Beruf zur Hochschule qualifizieren, und mit der Bauwirtschaft werden Lernmodule erarbeitet, mit denen das Thema nachhaltige Entwicklung in der Aus- und Weiterbildung im Bausektor verankert werden soll.
Knapp drei Millionen Euro umfasst dieser Förderschwerpunkt, der in die zweite Hälfte der UN-Dekade Bildung für eine nachhaltige Entwicklung (2005 2014) eingebunden ist.
Gefördert werden vier Verbundprojekte mit einer Laufzeit von 3 Jahren und drei Einzelprojekte mit jeweils 2 Jahren Laufzeit. Im Bereich
Metall/Elektro
- wird in einem Verbundprojekt mit der Universität Oldenburg ein Fortbildungsgang zum/zur geprüften technischen Fachwirt/-in Erneuerbare Energien entwickelt, implementiert und evaluiert (Kontakt: Prof. Dr. Karin Rebmann, Universität Oldenburg, karin.rebmann@uni-oldenburg.de)
- werden in einem weiteren Verbundprojekt berufliche Kompetenzen und Qualifikationsbedarfe von Fachexpertinnen und -experten bei der Montage, Inbetriebnahme und dem Service von Offshore-Windenergieanlagen ermittelt, um daraus Aus- und Weiterbildungsmaßnahmen zu entwickeln und (zunächst) regional zu etablieren. Projektnehmer ist das Institut Technik und Bildung der Universität Bremen (Kontakt: Prof. Dr. Georg Spöttl, Universität Bremen/Institut Technik und Bildung, ITB, spoettl@uni-bremen.de)
- gehen das Institut für Mittelstandsforschung der Universität Mannheim und die MetropolSolar Rhein-Neckar e.V. der Frage nach, welcher Bedarf an beruflicher Bildung im Handwerk im Hinblick auf die Zukunftsmärkte Elektromobilität und Erneuerbare Energien besteht (Kontakt: Dr. René Leicht, Institut für Mittelstandsforschung/ Universität Mannheim, leicht@ifm.uni-mannheim.de)
- entwickelt das Bildungswerk für berufsbezogene Aus- und Weiterbildung Thüringen eine Strategie, um Bildungspersonal als Multiplikator für das Leitbild der nachhaltigen Entwicklung zu gewinnen. Dabei wird die Ausbildereignungsverordnung zugrunde gelegt und eine Verbindung zur Produktion in der Photovoltaik-Branche hergestellt (Kontakt: Marion Wadewitz, BWAW Thüringen, m.wadewitz@bwaw-thuerin-gen.de)
Bauen und Wohnen
- wird das Netzwerk KOMZET Bau und Energie ein Zusammenschluss der Kompetenzzentren in der Bauwirtschaft im Rahmen eines Verbundprojektes Lernmodule entwickeln und erproben, die eine nachhaltige Entwicklung im Bausektor fördern und diese in Kooperation mit kleinen und mittleren Unternehmen (KMU) und anderen Bildungsakteuren dauerhaft als Leitbild in der Aus- und Fortbildung verankern (Kontakt: Jens Schwarz, Ausbildungszentrum-Bau in Hamburg GmbH, AZB, jens.schwarz@azb-hamburg.de)
Chemie
- rückt die Rhein-Erft Akademie GmbH zusammen mit ihren Partnern nachhaltige Bildungskarrieren in der Chemieindustrie in den Mittelpunkt. Das Verbundprojekt baut auf den Ergebnissen des Modellversuchs NICA (Nachhaltigkeit in der Chemieausbildung) auf. Ziel ist die methodische Aufbereitung und Implementierung der Kriterien nachhaltiger Entwicklung für den Bildungsbereich auf allen Ebenen der beruflichen einschließlich der universitären Bildung im Chemiesektor (Kontakt: Rainer Overmann, Rhein-Erft Akademie GmbH, rainer.overmann@rhein-erft-akademie.de)
Ernährung
- wird die Fachhochschule Münster/Institut für berufliche Lehrerbildung ein modulares Rahmencurriculum zur systematischen Qualifizierung für nachhaltige Entwicklung im Ernährungsbereich erarbeiten über die gesamte Berufsfeldbreite und alle Qualifikationsstufen hinweg (Kontakt: Prof. Dr. Irmhild Kettschau, FH Müns-ter/Institut für berufliche Lehrerbildung, kettschau@fh-muenster.de).
Ansprechpartnerinnen im BIBB:
Dagmar Winzier, E-Mail: winzier@bibb.de
Dr. Beate Feuchte, E-Mail: feuchte@bibb.de | Quelle: Informationsdienst Wissenschaft
Weitere Informationen: bbne.bibb.de/de/bbne_index.htmwww.bne-portal.de

description.hltext_display: 乳児放置で栄養失調…重体、母に猶予判決 「育児で立ち直りを期待」
[経済]「中国人による台湾の自由旅行」来年４月ごろに大幅緩和・解禁か
description.content:
Y!V 【経済ニュース】 【この記事に対するコメント】 2010/12/22(水) 17:26
財団法人台湾海峡両岸観光旅遊協会（中国略称：台旅会）と、中国大陸海峡両岸旅遊交流協会（中国略称：海旅会）はこのほど、早ければ来年の清明節（4月3−5日ごろ）に、中国本土からの旅行客に対して、商用、観光などの目的や人数を問わず、個人旅行を解禁する方針で合意に達した。双方はまた、「解禁」に先立ち、上海市、北京市、天津市、重慶市、広東省、福建省のうちの2都市で、同制度を試験的に実施する可能性についても触れた。国際在線などが伝えた。
中国本土−台湾間では現在、台湾資本による中国本土への投資の増加にともない、経済界を中心に、中国全土での「通商」、「通航」、「通郵」を認める「三通」への要望が高まっている。また、2008年からは、本土−台湾間の直行チャーター便の増加など、本土の観光客に対する規制緩和が進んでいる。
今回の「中国人による自由旅行の解禁」の提案では、「三通」をいち早く実現した、福建省廈門市−台湾・金門島間の「小三通」地域における本土住民らによる、台湾への個人旅行が優先的に認められるという。
このほか、「個人旅行解禁」の具体的な実施時期は、2011年の清明節（4月3−5日ごろ）をめどに、「小三通」地域のほか、上海市、北京市、天津市、広東省、福建省、重慶市など10都市で先行運用が行われ、人数制限なども大幅に緩和される見通し。
台湾海峡交流基金会（中国略称：海基会）の高孔廉副董事長は、「中国エリアは非常に広いため、自由な旅行を一度で全面解禁することはできない」と語り、本土から台湾への観光客の解禁を前例にのっとって、解禁当初は本土からの出発都市を限定し、その後、出発可能な地域を徐々に増やしていく考えを示した。（編集担当：金田知子）

description.hltext_display: Rebet air, elektrik tahun depan
description.content:
KUALA LUMPUR - Lebih sejuta pengguna domestik akan mendapat manfaat rebet bil elektrik dengan anggaran kos berjumlah RM138.48 juta tahun depan.
Timbalan Menteri Tenaga, Teknologi Hijau dan Air Noriah Kasnon berkata, langkah itu diharap dapat membantu golongan berpendapatan rendah dan mengurangkan perbelanjaan bulanan mereka.
Beliau berkata, Selangor mencatat bilangan pengguna tertinggi menerima rebet tersebut iaitu 150,000 pengguna, diikuti Johor (126,000), Perak (114,000), Kedah (99,000) dan Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur (94,000).
Selain itu, Kelantan pula mencatatkan 69,000 pengguna, Sarawak (69,000), Pulau Pinang (68,000), Pahang (63,000), Sabah (62,000), Negeri Sembilan (53,000), Terengganu (50,000), Melaka (36,000), Perlis (11,000) serta Putrajaya dan Cyberjaya (4,000)," katanya.
Bagi tempoh Januari hingga Oktober tahun ini, Noriah berkata, kerajaan membelanjakan RM116.24 juta bagi menampung rebet kepada pengguna.
Katanya, rebet tersebut hanya akan diberi kepada penguna yang bil elektrik kurang daripada RM20 sebulan. - Bernama

description.hltext_display: Gas leak at India drug plant kills 2
description.content:
Police say a suspected gas leak in a drug manufacturing plant in southern India has killed at least two workers.Police officer Sunder Kumar Das says another four workers were hospitalised early on Wednesday in Bolrum. The industrial township is on the outskirts of Hyderabad, the capital of Andhra Pradesh state.
The suspected leak occurred in the plant of Dr Reddy's Laboratories, which has over 100 generic drugs for sale in emerging markets.
Other details are not immediately available. Police are investigating.

event_or_fact.property: another four workers were hospitalised early on Wednesday in Bolrum

description.hltext_display: Obamacare and the risk of 'positive rights'
description.author: E. Thomas
description.content:
The recent court decision striking down the linchpin provision of the health care bill is a reminder what?s at stake is larger than the future of Obamacare. If this law passes constitutional muster, the question is whether the federal government can be constrained by any limits at all.
At issue is the personal mandate, the part of the law that says everyone must buy health insurance or pay a penalty. The implications were aptly captured by U.S. District Judge Henry Hudson, ruling in Virginia vs. Sebelius one of several lawsuits challenging Obamacare.
Two other federal judges have upheld the personal mandate, but Hudson saw the law differently. He pointed out neither the Supreme Court nor any federal court of appeals has held Congress? power to regulate commerce means people can be compelled to buy a product from a private company.
If that provision is upheld, the implications are deeply troubling.
Up to now, defenders of the health care law have airily dismissed such concerns. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, asked to name the constitutional provision on which the personal mandate was based, famously replied in an outraged tone: ?Are you serious? Are you serious?? During the health care debate, it was common to hear people piously assert health care should be a right, perhaps unaware of the full implications. The ongoing strikes and riots in Europe, however, represent the long-term risks of the progressive vision, in which government-delivered social benefits are portrayed as personal rights. No wonder they?re rioting in Europe. They believe their personal rights are being violated by budget cuts brought on by the sovereign debt crisis.
Government benefits expressed in this way are known to political scientists as positive rights, which differ from the negative rights with which we?re more familiar. Negative rights generally describe things the government cannot do ? take your stuff without due process, stifle your right to express your point of view, lock you up without cause, etc.
Positive rights describe things the government says it will do for you. A good example was the Second Bill of Rights pushed by President Roosevelt. Everyone, he said, should have the right ?to a useful and remunerative job ... to earn enough to provide adequate food and clothing ... to adequate medical care ... to a good education? and more. Worthy goals, all. Who?s against such things?
Certainly a highly developed economy should not be without social welfare programs ? pensions and health care for seniors, aid to the indigent and the like. The problem is elevating benefits to the level of rights confers an unlimited grant of power to the government. In the legislative process, laudable sentiments too often emerge as programs with unconstrained costs or, in the case of the personal mandate in Obamacare, policies that rely on coercion.
As federal lawyers told Judge Hudson, the personal insurance requirement is the ?vital kinetic link that animates Congress?s overall regulatory reform of interstate health care.? From the government?s point of view, positive rights are marching orders. Heaven and earth must be moved to deliver the promises. The state grows rapidly and ultimately it outruns the capacity of the tax base to pay for it all, endangering the financial security of everyone.
Thirty years ago, Portugal?s government cost its taxpayers about 20 percent of GDP. Then a new constitution was written, chock full of positive rights the right to housing, education, health, social security. The size of government doubled. Portugal?s borrowing costs, like that of Greece and Ireland, have ballooned. It?s no coincidence those who believe health care is a ?right? were, like Pelosi, initially flummoxed by the notion that a serious constitutional challenge was even possible. Who could worry about legal niceties when the noble goal of universal health care is within reach?
Once upon a time, President Barack Obama seemed to understand the kind of opposition a personal mandate would generate. That?s why when he ran for president, he was against it and criticized Hillary Clinton for proposing such a thing.

event_or_fact.property: should have the right ?to a useful and remunerative job ... to earn enough to provide adequate food and clothing ... to adequate medical care ... to a good education? and more
neither the Supreme Court nor any federal court of appeals has held Congress? power to regulate commerce means people can be compelled to buy a product from a private company

description.hltext_display: Argentina: Condenados violadores de Direitos Humanos
description.content:
Entre os arguidos encontrava-se o ex-ditador Jorge Rafael Videla (à esquerda) Carlos Arco/Epa Um tribunal argentino condenou na terça-feira a prisão perpétua 12 violadores de Direitos Humanos durante a última ditadura militar no país, acusados de 181 crimes cometidos em três centros clandestinos de detenção, informaram fontes judiciais.
O mesmo tribunal de Buenos Aires também condenou a 25 anos de prisão outros quatro réus e absolveu um.
Os condenados são antigos polícias, militares e quadros dos serviços secretos.
As sentenças foram recebidas com aplausos por parte de ativistas dos direitos humanos.
No julgamento, que durou 13 meses, foram analisados 181 crimes cometidos contra parte dos 1500 detidos ilegalmente nos antigos centros de Club Atlético, Banco e Olimpo durante a ditadura (1976-1983).

description.hltext_display: 洪一峰經典作品 府音樂會再現
description.content:
當杜鵑花遇上思慕的人，會譜出怎樣的音樂篇章？25日登場的總統府音樂會將在國樂伴奏下，由歌手許景淳、洪榮宏分別演唱已故音樂人黃友棣、洪一峰經典作品，感受不一樣音樂會。
總統府今天下午舉行記者會，公布25日音樂會演出細節。總統府公共事務室主任陳永豐說，總統馬英九25日晚間將出席音樂會，致贈紀念牌給黃友棣的學生和洪榮宏，藉此表彰黃友棣、洪一峰兩名音樂前輩用音符記錄時代的貢獻。
這場音樂會有別於過去以管絃室內樂的形式，改由台灣國家國樂團擔綱，主題為「鄉音雅韻˙絲竹傳情」，受邀者僅150人，主要為長期從事地方文化發展的志工、社區營造工作者代表。
演出曲目也別出心裁，串織客家山歌、原民樂舞、台語歌謠之外，還有改編的流行歌曲「九百九十九朵玫瑰」，以及應景的「耶誕鈴聲」。
黃友棣的代表作品「杜鵑花」將由許景淳演繹，洪榮宏也將連續唱出「思慕的人」、「淡水暮色」等膾炙人口的台語經典歌謠。
陳永豐說，音樂會25日晚間6時在總統府大禮堂舉行，民眾在節目結束後，晚間11時可透過公共電視台收看這場音樂會，一起聆聽美妙的樂音。

description.hltext_display: Petraeus has answers on Afghanistan, based on hope
description.author: Trudy Rubin
description.content:
As President Barck Obama was rolling out his Afghan policy review, I had the chance to visit U.S. forward-operating bases in the Taliban heartland and to interview Gen. David Petraeus.
I came away convinced, after the surge of 30,000 U.S. troops, real progress is being made in clearing the Taliban from large areas in the south and disrupting its networks. Yet a visit to Camp Hansen, a dusty U.S. outpost in hotly contested Helmand province, made clear why Obama called those gains ?fragile? and said they could be reversed.
U.S. troops hope to expand and link ?ink spots? areas cleared of Taliban in rural Helmand districts such as Nawa and Marjah. The U.S. military wants to transition partial responsibility for Nawa to Afghan civilian and military personnel by next summer.
But that goal is undercut by two factors. First, the central Afghan government in Kabul hasn?t sent personnel to staff local and district offices or to dispense justice. The failure to adjudicate land disputes pushes farmers into the arms of the Taliban, which operates religious courts. Moreover, the central government often appoints corrupt provincial and district governors or tries to fire honest ones. It took heavy NATO pressure to keep the capable governor in Helmand from being fired by President Hamid Karzai.
Second, when the Taliban is driven out of Helmand, it can find sanctuary across the border in Pakistan. Marine Col. David Furness told reporters that the Taliban brought in weapons and electronic components along the ?rat line? from Pakistan. ?If they couldn?t go to Pakistan, it would be over,? he said. As commander in Afghanistan, Petraeus is painfully aware of these two strategic Achilles heels: lack of adequate governance and the safe havens in Pakistan. At his headquarters in Kabul, he spoke of military gains, saying U.S. forces have ?arrested the momentum of the Taliban in many areas and reversed it in some,? while taking out midlevel Taliban members and bomb-makers.
Handing out copies of his famous multicolored PowerPoint charts, he described a strategy that, while focused on the south and east, is also doing ?shaping operations? in the troubled north and expanding the vastly improved security in Kabul to its neighboring provinces.
He was clearly piqued many think his focus is now purely military, and he stressed that ?kinetic operations, while necessary, are not sufficient.? While securing an area is the priority, he said, ?you have to exploit it through Afghan local governance and anticorruption measures? so villagers ?will support the Afghan government.? In other words, if their local government doesn?t offer services and justice, the people will turn, often reluctantly, to the Taliban.
Petraeus has not given up hope that nascent Afghan institutions and government will gradually improve. ?The governors (Karzai) has appointed on my watch have been generally impressive,? the general said, and more civil servants are being trained to take jobs in far-flung districts. Petraeus has a team pursuing cases of Afghan corruption (including those fueled by lucrative U.S. contracts), and he says Karzai is cooperating.
Karzai has also signed on to a Petraeus priority project: a program to train 10,000 Afghan local police under the aegis of the Interior Ministry. The program will provide security to areas without regular police while also providing jobs to locals.
However, the general does not want to discuss the issue of Karzai?s brother, Ahmed Wali, a powerful and controversial figure in Kandahar, whose machinations are blamed by many for tribal divisions that create openings for the Taliban.
Petraeus appears to be hoping that security gains will create a virtuous circle: As the economy picks up, villagers will turn against the Taliban, and Karzai may want to win their approval by performing better. Those gains may also affect Pakistan?s attitude toward giving the Taliban safe havens.
If Afghanistan seems more secure, and the Taliban has little prospect of retaking power in Kabul, Pakistan may reassess its value as a future card in its conflict with India. And Petraeus, who meets regularly with Pakistani military and intelligence chiefs, believes they now grasp that the militants threaten them too.
Part of the virtuous circle is a shift in the Afghan psyche. The general thinks the administration?s decision to stress a 2014 date for transition to Afghan control will have a positive effect on Afghan attitudes. The militants, he said, had convinced Afghans that Obama?s July 2011 start date for a drawdown meant Americans were ?heading for the exits.? This made villagers afraid to stand up to the Taliban.
Word has now spread of America?s longer commitment. Petraeus recounts when he recently visited the rural village of Farah, he was astonished to find everyone was aware of the date shift. Residents told him, ?We are happy to hear about 2014.? A shift in psyche, continued kinetics, a virtuous circle that shifts the thinking of Karzai and Pakistani generals this appears to be the scenario that Petraeus hopes for.
He says he is neither ?an optimist or a pessimist.? Instead, he repeats Obama?s mantra that Afghan progress is ?fragile and reversible? and ?must be solidified.? Perhaps this is a hedge against failure. Perhaps it is pragmatism. Maybe it is just warding off the evil eye.
David Petraeus knows Afghanistan is much tougher than Iraq, and that the burden falls most heavily on his shoulders. I sense that he thinks success is possible, but he isn?t sure.

event_or_fact.property: while focused on the south and east, is also doing ?shaping operations? in the troubled north and expanding the vastly improved security in Kabul to its neighboring provinces.
the Taliban brought in weapons and electronic components along the ?rat line? from Pakistan.
?kinetic operations, while necessary, are not sufficient.?
?you have to exploit it through Afghan local governance and anticorruption measures? so villagers ?will support the Afghan government.
he is neither ?an optimist or a pessimist.
Obama?s July 2011 start date for a drawdown meant Americans were ?heading for the exits.?

description.hltext_display: CAVACO SILVA: E tudo o BPN levará?
description.author: Lemos Esteves
description.content:
O debate de ontem entre Cavaco Silva e Francisco Lopes surpreendeu-nos pela positiva. Porquê? Porque foi o primeiro debate em que houve efectivamente confronto, não suscitando de imediato uma vontade louca de adormecer ou mudar de canal.
Na forma, Francisco Lopes esteve muito bem. Aproveitou cada minuto para expor as fragilidades do primeiro mandato de Cavaco, sobretudo aquelas que são música celestial para os ouvidos do seu eleitorado. O candidato comunista adotou um tom curto, incisivo, sem rodeios e agressivo sem ser desagradável. Note-se a subtileza: até quando atacou Cavaco pelo escândalo BPN fê-lo de forma subtil - não envolveu Cavaco (como Alegre deu a entender que o fará) no caso, mas associou-o pela promulgação da lei da nacionalização ao negócio desastroso feito para encobrir Oliveira e Costa, seu colaborador e financiador da campanha de há cinco anos. Reparem só na subtileza! Além disso, reconheço que, para um comunista que decorou acriticamente a cartilha do partido, Francisco tem uma boa presença televisiva. Cavaco Silva, por seu turno, esteve muito analítico, aqui e ali muito nervoso, evidenciando que não estava preparado para abordar determinados assuntos com Francisco Lopes, nomeadamente a questão do BPN. Nunca tínhamos visto (nem nesta campanha, nem na campanha de 2005) um Cavaco tão crispado - o que poderá indiciar um excesso de confiança que, na minha perspetiva, é de evitar.
E quanto ao conteúdo? Ora, aí Francisco Lopes debitou a cassete comunista da década de 80 do século passado e Cavaco puxou pelos seus méritos enquanto governante. Primeira questão: o caso BPN deveria ter sido chamado à baila? Bom, na política portuguesa tem vingado o princípio do politicamente correto, traduzido na frase: à justiça o que é da justiça, à política o que é da política. Pois bem, lembra-se certamente que nas últimas legislativas, o PSD não utilizou o Freeport contra Sócrates, sendo que neste caso se tratava de um potencial crime cometido no exercício de funções governamentais. É curioso verificar que os mesmos colunistas que defenderam que seria um golpe baixo invocar o Freeport contra Sócrates, aplaudem efusivamente a utilização do BPN contra Cavaco. Entendamo-nos: o BPN é um processo que corre nos tribunais para apurar a eventual responsabilidade criminal dos acusados. Creio que é mau tom discutir numa eleição presidencial um processo judicial. Dir-me-ão: sim, mas o que queremos é apurar a responsabilidade política. Muito bem: então, a pergunta deve ser por que razão Cavaco aguentou Dias Loureiro como conselheiro de Estado após rebentar o caso BPN - e não qual a sua responsabilidade no caso. Porque se a formulação for esta última, implicitamente estamos a acusar Cavaco de participação num crime em que nem sequer foi constituído arguido! Meu conselho: Cavaco não se deve esconder - deve, pelo contrário, esclarecer de uma vez por todas o assunto, nem que seja de passagem. Quando? Antes de dia 29 - ou seja, antes do debate com Alegre. Sei que Alegre está tentadíssimo para queimar Cavaco com o assunto e Cavaco não reage bem, como ficou provado ontem. Que diabo: aproveite-se um comício qualquer, um discurso para puxar o tapete a Alegre!
Quanto ao mais, Francisco Lopes continua a viver num mundo que não existe, completamente descolado da realidade. Sem pensamento próprio - é o discurso do Partido Comunista, versão linha dura. E já repararam que Francisco Lopes não sorri, a sua expressão facial nunca muda, sempre hirta, fechada, fazendo lembrar os comunistas da era Brejnev? O comunista faz-me lembrar, quando fala de economia e ataca os mercados, os tempos em que eu contava histórias de encantar à minha irmã: tudo era fantástico até ao momento em que ela me fazia uma pergunta ou me confrontava com a realidade - e lá tinha eu de inventar, inventar sem parar...e a história acabava uma verdadeira confusão e nem a minha irmã, com os seus seis anos, acreditava! A Francisco Lopes acontece o mesmo: ele fala, fala, fala...mas ninguém leva a sério o que diz.
Por último, Cavaco esteve bem na descredibilização do discurso económico de Francisco Lopes: ao contrário do que vários analistas defenderam, não cometeu nenhuma contradição quando afirmou que o discurso de Francisco Lopes agitava os mercados, mas graças a deus que não o ouvem. A ideia de Cavaco é esta: um presidente responsável nunca poderia dizer tais palavras porque daria um sinal negativo aos mercados, proporcionando a subida dos juros e o aumento do desemprego. Contudo, Francisco Lopes, como nunca será presidente de Portugal, pode dizer o que quiser que ninguém o ouve! Não há contradição - e é uma frase forte. Pessoalmente, deu-me uma satisfação enorme verificar que FINALMENTE um candidato a Presidente conhece a Constituição e sabe que as leis de revisão constitucional são as únicas não pode vetar! Tem de promulgar - como fartei-me aqui de escrever! Aleluia! Note-se que não é um argumento apenas formal: já imaginou o que seria um presidente estar a comentar alterações à Constituição que ele jura? Quando não tem nenhuns poderes para a evitar ou para a influenciar? Por alguma razão a Constituição limitou drasticamente a intervenção do Presidente - para dar todo o protagonismo em sede de definição da Lei fundamental aos partidos políticos e ao parlamento! Era só o que faltava que o PR falasse da revisão constitucional...seria o cúmulo do ridículo! Um candidato afirmar que evitará uma revisão constitucional será o mesmo que prometer oferecer a cada português um carro topo de gama! Não é para levar a sério. Ademais, Cavaco asseverou que, caso o FMI entre em Portugal, será um sinal de incapacidade do Governo. Significará isto que a demissão do Governo é certa? Não: significa apenas que Cavaco sabe que os portugueses criticam a sua passividade no primeiro mandato, logo, quer dar a entender que será diferente da próxima vez.
Tudo dito e ponderado, vamos às notas:
Debate - como foi o melhorzinho e a bitola de exigência já é muito baixa, vamos dar bom (menos);
Cavaco Silva- No conteúdo, esteve melhor, pese embora o engulho do BPN que tem de esclarecer ainda esta semana - dou bom (menos);
Francisco Lopes - Apesar de tudo, revela um discurso articulado, repete a cassete comunista de forma convincente, pelo que dou suficiente (mais).

description.hltext_display: 拼觀光 集集鎮推出特色三輪車搭載遊客
description.content:
中廣 張文祿
南投縣花卉嘉年華系列活動的「花現集集」，即將在25號揭幕，集集鎮配合推出十部「花車和火車造型的三輪車」，為街道景觀增色不少，這也是全台唯一的特色三輪車隊，未來將以收費方式，搭載遊客遊覽市區。
集集鎮長莊瑞麟表示，十部三輪車中，其中五部火車頭造型的三輪車是集集的泰祥木材行打造，火車頭三輪車分別彩繪當地的五種水果以及鳥類，金蕉、芭樂、紅龍果、葡萄、五色鳥；五部花車造型三輪車則由南開大學協助裝置，五輛花車分別是香蕉花車，富貴花車，聖誕花車，花仙子花車，嘉年華花車；外觀華麗，而且駕駛都穿著制服。
另外，二十五號當天上午有水果公主選拔、牆面彩繪比賽、魔術表演、下午開幕儀式邀請歌手表演、還有踩街活動及集集巡禮等。

description.hltext_display: Award Winning Puzzle Scramble Squares(R), Appeals to the Mobile Age with iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch Application
description.content:
Scramble Squares®, the global leader in challenging educational puzzles with powerful graphics and multigenerational appeal, is pleased to announce that it has moved into the mobile space with the launch of its digital gaming application, Scramble Squares®, for the iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch.
Houston, TX (PRWEB) December 21, 2010
Scramble Squares®, the global leader in challenging educational puzzles with powerful graphics and multigenerational appeal, is pleased to announce that it has moved into the mobile space with the launch of its digital gaming application, Scramble Squares®, for the iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch. A full version of Scramble Squares® is a FREE iTunes download that contains one FREE puzzle, a practice puzzle and an additional interactive puzzle challenge. Additional puzzles are available for purchase in-app at $4.99.
Scramble Squares® are visual puzzles comprised of nine square pieces, each containing images that must be properly arranged to form one complete image solution. Scramble Squares® puzzles look easy to solve but in reality, only one in every 5,000 people can unscramble a Scramble Squares® puzzle in under 5 minutes.
The Scramble Squares® app and puzzle library, built to take advantage of the features of Apple’s iOS 4 operating system, is designed for universal appeal to males and females of any age, featuring over 140 original creations in a variety of themes including nature, sports, history, culture, geography, science, technology, gourmet, occupations, fantasy, hobbies and activities.
The iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch Scramble Squares® application includes one free 5-MINUTE CHALLENGE® puzzle and one free game puzzle players solve at their leisure. Players who solve the 5-MINUTE CHALLENGE® puzzle in under five minutes receive an additional free brainteaser puzzle, a $4.99 value.
Demo Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OLSpUXCURGg
Funny promotional video with Santa: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J4yv2acUxAo
The iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch application allows in-app purchases of additional puzzles from a library of over 140 puzzles; connectivity to the Apple Game Center so players can see where they rank with other players; communication through Facebook and Twitter for social gamers; and location-based iOS geolocation features to find nearby retailers that sell physical Scramble Squares® puzzles. All Scramble Squares® puzzles are stored in an in-app bookcase, similar to Apple’s iBook organization.
Kathie and Marshall Gavin introduced four Scramble Squares® puzzles to the market in 1993, instantaneously receiving a tremendous response from the market and trade media. After gaining global popularity, winning hundred of awards and appealing to children and adults of all ages as a cross-generational family activity, Scramble Squares® is expanding its reach with mobile technology in partnership with 247 Ventures, Inc., an interactive application development company.
“We are passionate about creating entertaining, educational, beautiful and challenging puzzles for adults and children,” said Marshall Gavin, co-founder of b. dazzle and Scramble Squares®. “We understand that the digital age is here and are pleased with the iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch application 247 Ventures, Inc. created to bring Scramble Squares® puzzles to the 21st century.”
Dr. Stevanne Auerbach, known as Dr. Toy ( http://www.drtoy.com ), has consistently recognized the social and educational value of Scramble Squares® puzzles. Dr. Toy responded after experiencing the new digital format, “Playing with Scramble Squares® is always fun, plus these puzzles challenge minds of all ages. Now, with the immediate interaction provided by app technology, the playability is even more portable, engaging and compelling. It’s a winner!”
To download the FREE Scramble Squares® app, including the 5-MINUTE CHALLENGE® giving you the chance to win another FREE Scramble Squares® puzzle, visit http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/scramble-squares/id407954395?mt=8 . For more information about the Scramble Squares® app for iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch: http://www.scramblesquares.com . Like us on Facebook for updates on the product and meet other 5-MINUTE CHALLENGE® masterminds Facebook.com/ScrambleSquares, follow us on twitter@ScrambleSquares, and visit our YouTube Page (YouTube.com/ScrambleSquares) to see a demo of the app in action and even some surprise messages from a very famous holiday celebrity.
About b. dazzle, inc. Founded in 1993, b. dazzle, inc. is a progressive market-driven company which manufactures and distributes wholesale in the gift, souvenir, toy and educational products industries a wide range of beautiful, wholesome, entertaining and informative made-in-America gifts of high quality and low cost for all ages of adults and children that can be selected by topic to appeal to the personal interests of the recipient and can be enjoyed as cross-generational family activities. For more information, visit http://www.b-dazzle.com/ or http://www.scramblesquares.com .
247 Ventures, Inc. Founded in 2009 by three former marketing and media executives, 247 Ventures, Inc. develops applications and provides cloud-based hosting and rich media connectivity and serving for mobile devices as well as social networks and other internet connected devices. Based in Houston, Texas, 247 Ventures works with enterprise customers as well as develops their own portfolio of direct-to-consumer apps. For more information on 247 Ventures, Inc. email us at info(at)247venturesinc(dot)com or call us at 281-360-6811.

description.hltext_display: Kinas ledning fruktar korruption
description.content: Farligaste fienden är varken Nobelkommittén i Oslo eller den lilla skara i Kina som aktivt strävar efter politiska förändringar. Största hotet mot Kommunistpartiet kommer inifrån partiet självt och dess korrupta medlemmar. Analysen är partiledningens egen.

description.hltext_display: 4 sekeluarga maut dalam kebakaran
description.content:
GEORGETOWN - Empat sekeluarga terbunuh dalam satu kebakaran di sebuah rumah kedai dua tingkat di Jalan Perak di sini awal pagi ini.
Pemilik kedai Neoh Hooi Poh, 57, terselamat dalam kejadian itu, bagaimanapun isterinya, Goey Siew Keow, 56, serta anak perempuannya Neoh Li Hong, 18, dan anak lelakinya Neoh Soo Aik, 16, ditemui mati di tingkat atas bangunan rumah kedai itu.
Timbalan Pengarah Jabatan Bomba dan Penyelamat (Operasi) Pulau Pinang, Mohd. Razam Taja Rahim berkata, ibu Hooi Poh, Lim Chai Hwa, 73, yang diselamatkan di tingkat bawah kedai itu, meninggal dunia semasa dalam perjalanan ke hospital.
"Ada lima orang di dalam bangunan itu semasa kejadian pada kira-kira pukul 2.45 pagi; iaitu tiga di tingkat atas dan dua lagi di tingkat bawah," katanya.
Beliau berkata, lima jentera bomba dari Jalan Perak dan empat pasukan sukarelawan bomba dengan kekuatan 35 anggota bergegas ke tempat kejadian selepas menerima panggilan kecemasan pada kira-kira pukul 2.50 pagi.
"Mayat Siew Keow dan anak-anaknya ditemui dalam bilik air di tingkat atas," katanya dan menambah kediaman itu turut digunakan untuk menyimpan bahan-bahan untuk upacara sembahyang bagi kaum Cina untuk jualan. - Bernama

description.hltext_display: 宜蘭跨年晚會 邀百位民眾發聲祝福
description.content:
跨年進入倒數計時，今年宜蘭跨年晚會訂於12月31日晚上在蘭城新月廣場舉行，邀請K歌情人品冠開場演出，並由金鐘獎影后萬芳一同陪民眾熱情倒數，迎接中華民國100年的到來。
宜蘭市公所與蘭城新月合作舉辦『宜蘭久久、活力勁百』建國百年跨年晚會，晚會由知名藝人陳漢典、徐可主持，與會歌手包括K歌情人品冠、歌手萬芳、模仿天王黃鐙輝、哈爾濱之光陸瑤、超人氣偶像賴雅研、南拳媽媽、武虎將，還有白吉勝、陳傑瑞、黃小柔、hotshock等人，將和民眾一同跨年，迎接民國百年到來。
宜蘭市跨年晚會，為了展現建國一百年「市民優先」的意義，並特別募集百位民眾同發聲，說出新年新希望或祝福的話，民眾事先報名拍攝錄影，將在12月31日晚會中播出。

description.hltext_display: [経済]０９年、新興国がけん引、世界のビール消費量２４年連続増
description.content:
キリン食生活文化研究所が22日に発表した2009年の世界のビール消費量は、前年比0・1％増の1億7726万キロリットルと24年連続で増加した。東京ドームをジョッキに見立てると約143杯分に相当するという。金融危機後の経済の低迷で欧米の消費量が落ち込んだが、中国やブラジルなど新興国の伸びがけん引役となり、全体ではプラスを確保した。国別消費量は、中国が7・8％増で7年連続で首位
（情報提供：共同通信社）

description.hltext_display: L1 / PSG : Clash Kombouaré-Sessegnon
description.content:
PSG-Monaco pourrait être le dernier match de Stéphane Sessegnon sous les couleurs parisiennes. Lassé par son statut de remplaçant, comme c'était le cas face aux Monégasques (2-2, 18eme journée de L1) et depuis le match perdu à Sochaux (3-1, 4eme journée) en août dernier, le milieu béninois aurait rencontré Antoine Kombouaré dans son bureau mardi midi au Camp des Loges pour évoquer son avenir personnel. L'ancien Manceau aurait alors répété avec insistance ses envies de départ. Selon l'Equipe, l'entraîneur du PSG se serait énervé et l'aurait fait sortir de son bureau après avoir tenu des propos insultants.
Le Béninois faisait pourtant partie des dix-huit joueurs retenus pour faire le (19eme journée de L1). Mais celui-ci ne se serait pas rendu au rendez-vous fixé à 17h, mardi au Parc des Princes pour prendre la direction de la Lorraine. « Antoine Kombouaré et Stéphane Sessegnon ont eu une discussion, a expliqué un porte-parole du club à l'Equipe. A la suite de cet entretien, Antoine Kombouaré a préféré laisser le joueur souffler pour lui permettre de couper en espérant qu'il revienne régénéré de ses vacances. » Le joueur arrivé au PSG en 2008 devrait en profiter pour oublier son début de saison décevant, marqué par seulement quatre titularisations sur ses quatorze matchs joués.
Selon le site anglais Sport.co, Stéphane Sessegnon serait suivi par Arsenal, Tottenham, Liverpool, West Ham et Everton. Sous contrat jusqu'en juin 2013, le milieu de terrain âgé de 26 ans pourrait être attiré par la Premier League. Pourtant, Antoine Kombouaré ne souhaite voir aucun joueur partir cet hiver. « Aujourd'hui, je suis très content de mon groupe. J'ai déjà dit aux joueurs qu'il n'y aurait pas de départ. Je défends les intérêts du club, alors si un joueur veut partir, c'est niet, a-t-il déclaré en conférence de presse. On a besoin de tout le monde parce qu'on n'est pas nombreux. J'ai un bon groupe en termes de qualité, mais en quantité, on est restreint. Si on n'a pas de pépins, on peut aller chercher un trophée avec ce groupe. » Ce clash pourrait cependant avoir un effet néfaste sur la belle dynamique actuelle du PSG.

description.hltext_display: 「人事評価は必要か」「まかない」「優秀なエンジニアとは」──ベンチャー経営者が語り合う
description.content:
ニュース IVS 2010 Fall： (1/6) IVSの「新進ベンチャー経営者が物申す！『最新の経営とはこういうものだ！』」には、はてなの近藤氏、芸者東京エンターテインメントの田中氏、コロプラの千葉氏、ポケラボの後藤氏、佐々木氏が登場。各社各様の経営論や理想と現状が語られ、大いに盛り上がった。 2010年12月22日 16時33分 更新 京都で開かれた「Infinity Ventures Summit 2010 Fall」（IVS、2010年12月7〜8日）中のセッション「新進ベンチャー経営者が物申す！『最新の経営とはこういうものだ！』」には、はてな代表取締役の近藤淳也氏、芸者東京エンターテインメント代表取締役CEOの田中泰生氏、コロプラ取締役副社長の千葉功太郎氏、ポケラボ代表取締役の後藤貴史氏と佐々木俊介氏の5氏を迎えた。モデレーターはオプト取締役会長の海老根智仁氏が務めた。「モバゲーとグリーは仲良くしてほしい」（田中氏）、「ベンチャーに人事制度は合ってない」（千葉氏）など忌憚のない意見が次々飛び出し、会場からは拍手や笑い声がこだました。 Infinity Ventures Summit 2010 Fall
メイソンCEOが語る「Groupon 2.0」と「成功の秘訣」
毎週50〜60人が入社、2週間に1度の目標上方修正──グルーポン・ジャパンも“史上最速”で急成長
mixi、NHN、Grouponのトップが語る「プラットフォーム進化論」
（左から）司会を務めたオプトの海老根氏、はてなの近藤氏、芸者東京エンターテインメントの田中氏 海老根 今日のタイトル（新進ベンチャー経営者が物申す！「最新の経営とはこういうものだ！」）ですが、すごいテーマですね。またセッションに出てほしいと頼まれたんですが、もうわたしの時代じゃないでしょと。だってこうやって急激に成長してらっしゃる企業も多いし、やはり昔と比べて若手の意識も変わっていると。社員として採用する若手の意識もまったく変わっているんで、経営のスタイル違うんじゃないかと思いまして。急成長企業の皆様に集まってもらった次第です。
まずリラックスしてやってください。では、まず乾杯ということで（グラスビールを掲げ、口をつける）1社1社自己紹介をしていただいてよろしいでしょうか。まずはですね、はてなさんの近藤さん。創業が2001年で、この中で一番古いですね。簡単に会社の紹介をお願いします。
はてな、「T型コミュニケーション」を促進 近藤氏 近藤 株式会社はてなの近藤といいます。はてなをご存知の方は多いと思いますが「T型コミュニケーションを促進する」というミッションを掲げていまして、人と人とのコミュニケーションを促進するという側面とそれから、コミュニケーションから生まれる情報をいろんな方に届けようという側面。それがTの横棒と縦棒ということで、独自の言葉を作っていますが、そういったカテゴリーのWebサービスを提供している会社です。
主なサービスがブログサービスの「はてなダイアリー」であるとか、ソーシャルブックマークの「はてなブックマーク」ですね。「はてなブックマーク」のほうは、かなりネットの情報で面白い情報が集まってくるサイトということで、ご覧になられている方多いかと思います。あと、最近ですと任天堂さんと2008年から協業して「うごメモはてな」という少し毛色の違ったサービスをやってまして、ニンテンドーDSiを使ってパラパラ漫画を動かすサイトです。そういったサービスを10個ほどやってまして、位置情報を表示する「はてなココ」ですとか「はてなモノリス」「人力検索はてな」といったサービスをしています。
創業が2001年ですのでちょっと新進ベンチャーというより老舗の部類に入りつつあるのかなあと思いますが、2001年京都で創業いたしまして、もともと京都の会社です。今回はようこそ京都へといった気持ちでおります。04年に東京に移りました。それから1回シリコンバレーのほうにアメリカの支社を作りまして、僕自身2年ほどそちらにおりました。08年に京都に本社を戻しまして、現在京都の開発拠点と東京の営業拠点という形で活動しています。既存のサービスを伸ばしつつ、世界に通用する技術を作ろうと頑張っています。よろしくお願いします。
海老根 まず、1点近藤さんにお聞きしたいのが、10年会社をやられていて最大の壁っていう障害というか波を一つあげるとすればなんなんでしょう？
近藤 一番大きかったのは、はてななりの経営スタイルをみつけるところまで少し時間がかかったのかなぁと思っています。先ほど申し上げましたアメリカに行ったりとかあったんですが、アメリカに行っていた2年間というのは会社なりの方向性が試される時だったのかなと思っています。
僕自身がシリコンバレーに行って子会社立ち上げをしている。社長が東京のオフィスにいないというのはどういうことなんだという状況になったんですけど、そういう中でアメリカから世界に通用する新サービスを立ち上げようとする機会があったんですけど、若干そのとき日本の体制とアメリカの体制とで力が分散するようなところがありまして、日本に戻るという選択の際、このままアメリカで立ち上げ続けるか、日本に戻って体制作るかって悩む感じでしたね。その時に日本のメンバーと世界に通用するサービスを作ろうと、開発拠点も京都に移して新しい体制でサービスを作り始めていくことにしたんですね。09年10年と随分その体制作りも確立できたので、ここから挑戦というのが始まっていくと思います。
海老根 ということは、古い言い方になりますけど技術力を生かしたSaaSみたいな感じと考えてもいいんでしょうか？
近藤 そうですね。
目指せ！デジタル世界の地主——芸者東京エンターテイメント
海老根 続きまして芸者東京エンターテインメントの田中さんの方から自己紹介、会社紹介おねがいします。 田中氏 田中 こんにちは、田中泰生といいます。元々東大法学部だったので財務省に行こうと思ってたんですけども、当時ノーパンしゃぶしゃぶ事件ってのがあって、（財務省に）行ったら「ノーパンしゃぶしゃぶに行ってるのは一部の人です」と言われて、こんなプライドのない組織に入れるかボケーと思って民間企業に行きましたと。それで2006年10月に会社を作って、電脳フィギュアというもので世に出たんですけども。買ってない人はアマゾンに出てるんで買ってください。9800円です。
フィギュアを作った後、いろいろやって今はソーシャルゲームを作ってます。僕ら会社としてしたいことは1日も早くデジタル世界の地主になる。地主になりたいです。はい。最近どんなことをやってるかというと、プラットフォームを選ばず、PCでも携帯でも面白くてもうかったら何でもやるぞという会社です。
芸者東京の製品／サービスの開発思想
最近ですと「おみせやさん」というのをやっていて会員が300万人ぐらいいて、もうかってます。多分モバゲーとかグリーの30分の1くらい（会場から笑い）もうかってます。（やや小さな声）ミクシィで今テストしているものがあって、めっちゃ僕の中で儲かる予定です。（会場から笑い）。
僕らの製品開発の思想って、技術の会社とかありますけど、僕らは聞いて面白くて、観て面白くて触って面白くて、伝えずにはいられない、そういった商品を作りたいと思ってます。
海老根 ちょっと1個質問したいんですけど、先ほど田中さん、「プラットフォームを選ばず」っておっしゃってましたけど、現在のプラットフォーム業者をぶっちゃけどう思うのかってのをぶっちゃけていただきたいなと。
田中 今日、海老根さんに「新進経営者、過激なこと言え」と言われて何いってもいいって前提で、「龍馬伝」を観てほしいって話で、「もう狭い日本で争ってる場合じゃないがじゃ」とか言ってたでしょ。なんか、モバゲーさんとGREEさん、ほんと仲良くしてほしいな。（会場爆笑、拍手の渦）
海老根 どうやったら、仲良くできるんですかね。
田中 龍馬伝観たらいいんじゃないですか。モバゲーもGREEも、mixiはちょっと違うけど、僕がやっているソーシャルゲームで言うと世界最高の場だと思うんですよ。集客とかマネタイズとかで。だから、本当に健全に切磋琢磨して、いま日本でやってることを世界で10倍にして、10倍を2で割って5にして。僕らもそっから出てくる、甘い汁を吸いたいなぁ。（会場笑い）。お願いします。

description.hltext_display: 放寬農漁會幹部資格 爭議條文保留協商
description.content:
立法院經濟委員會今天審查「農會法」、「漁會法」修正草案，不過民進黨立委質疑，修法條文放寬了農漁會代表、理監事和總幹事資格，有放生黑金的嫌疑。委員會最後雖然通過初審，不過對於放寬農漁會人員資格的爭議條文，全數保留交付朝野協商。
立法院經濟委員會22日審查農會法、漁會法修正草案，不過民進黨立委質疑修法條文放寬了農漁會代表、理監事和總幹事資格，有放生黑金的嫌疑。立委翁金珠質疑，行政院以五都改制和農業金融法配套修法的理由，根本是想偷渡黑金放生條款。
立委李俊毅則質疑，行政部門提案放寬農會幹部、約聘人員的資格，根本是反改革的行為，李俊毅質疑，農漁會修法是馬總統為了的2012連任而拉攏農漁會系統。民進黨一定堅決反對。
委員會雖然通過初審，不過綠營對於行政院版本，放寬規定受緩刑而交付保護管束、5年內沒有不良債權記錄，以及受保安處分者可以競選農漁會會員代表、理監事和總幹事的提案，都提出修正動議。會議主席蕭景田最後裁示，對於綠營有提出修正動議的條文，都保留交付協商。

description.hltext_display: Nude-pic teen in AFL video rant
description.content:
MEGAN LEVY
Naked photograph scandal: full coverage
The teenage girl behind the St Kilda naked photo scandal has failed to follow through on threats to publish more incriminating images of AFL players from clubs across the country today.
The 17-year-old claims to have 19 more explicit images of players from various clubs, including Sydney and Carlton, that she vowed to post on social networking sites by 5pm yesterday, a deadline that was pushed back until 7am today. Some of the photos allegedly show players taking drugs.
But the angry teenager turned to another form of social media late last night to reveal that she had been spooked by a Federal Court order, which earlier this week restrained her and Facebook from publishing photographs of naked St Kilda players.
In one of three videos she streamed on website Ustream last night, the teen said it was "probably best if I don't upload the photos anyway just in case this court case is real".
"I don't know though, I haven't heard anything about it," she said of the court case.
"I'm not sure. Anyway I'm going to keep on fighting and I'm going to keep on saying what's the truth and I'm going to f*ck these footballers up, okay?"
Today, the girl admitted to The Age that she had had group sex with three footballers and two other men. She has previously said she was out for revenge, not financial gain, by publishing the naked photo of Saints captain Nick Riewoldt and another more explicit shot of Nick Dal Santo on Facebook.
The videos, streamed from her holiday accommodation on the Gold Coast, provide a bizarre insight into the life of the teenager whose actions have thrust her into the media spotlight.
She has not shied away from that attention either, posting responses late into the night on Twitter and Formspring, streaming her own videos and conducting scores of interviews over the past two days.
At the beginning of one five-minute video streamed last night, the teen addressed the questioned of how she was holding up emotionally.

event_or_fact.property: I don't know though, I haven't heard anything about it; I'm not sure. Anyway I'm going to keep on fighting and I'm going to keep on saying what's the truth and I'm going to f*ck these footballers up, okay?
she was out for revenge, not financial gain, by publishing the naked photo of Saints captain Nick Riewoldt and another more explicit shot of Nick Dal Santo on Facebook

description.hltext_display: Richard 'Dick' Vaughn
description.content:
Text Size
ght-obit-vaughn-121810
Richard “Dick” Vaughn, 71, of Lewiston, died Dec. 13, 2010, at Otsego Memorial Hospital. He was born on Nov. 29, 1939, to Edward and Helen (Slupka) Vaughn in Detroit.
He married the former Michelle Ondocsin on Oct. 1, 1966, in Flint. Dick worked for Firestone just out of high school, starting as a tire changer and left the company as a store manager 14 years later. He went on to work in sales for Saginaw Distributors and Fisher-Flack selling appliances and electronics, then finally retiring in July 2010 from Kamp Oil where he was a territory manager.
He always loved the conversation and relationships developed with his clients in his time in sales. Dick enjoyed golfing, hunting and taking trips to the casino, especially in Las Vegas. He had a great sense of humor and loved to tell jokes. He was a longtime member of the Lewiston Curling Club, having served as its president for two years. Above all else, he loved his family.
Dick is survived by his wife, Michelle of Lewiston; daughters, Kerri (Loyse) Huffman of Stockbridge and Kristen (Bill) Galo of Avonmore, Pa.; grandson, Tyler; and sister, Louise (Don) Lueckeman of Flint.
Funeral services for Mr. Vaughn were held Friday, Dec. 17, 2010 at 11 a.m. at the Green Funeral Home, Lewiston, with the Rev. Raymond Cotter officiating.
Visitation hours were held Thursday from 4 to 8 p.m. at the funeral home.
The family has suggested memorials to the American Heart Association.
Condolence messages can be sent via our Web site, www.greenfuneralhomes.com

description.hltext_display: Margaret L. Denholm
description.content:
She was born in Waterloo, Iowa, on March 25, 1915, to Earl and Ruby (Burd) Hillier.
In 1937, she married David Denholm in Hamilton, Ill. The couple moved to Alpena in 1950, before settling in Gaylord in 1952. They owned Denholm’s Little Dime Store on Main Street from 1962-1969. Mrs. Denholm then worked in the kitchen at Otsego Memorial Hospital from 1969-1980.
She was very active in the Republican party and in her younger years, she had served as a delegate for the Republican National Convention.
Mrs. Denholm was one of the five original people who established this area’s RSVP program. She was a member of the kitchen band, a football enthusiast and an avid supporter of her kids’ and grandchildren’s sporting events.
Mrs. Denholm is survived by her children, John Earl (Kathryn) of Garden, Nancy Dandona of St. Ignace, Joan Copenhaver of Ann Arbor, Dr. Craig (Susan) of Gaylord; 12 grandchildren; five great-grandchildren; and sister, Kathrine Sawvel of Iowa.
She was preceded in death by her husband, David, in 1968; granddaughters, Jessica and Rebecca Copenhaver; and sisters, Eleanor Hillier and Ruth Sawvel.
As per her wishes, cremation has taken place. A memorial service will be held at a later date.
Contributions in memory of Margaret Denholm may be made to the Otsego Memorial Hospital Auxiliary, through the Nelson Funeral Home, P.O. Box 1548, Gaylord, MI 49734.
Friends may share condolencesonline at www.nelsonsfuneralhome.com

description.hltext_display: Review: No laughs in 'Little Fockers'
description.author: Christopher Kelly
description.content:
By Christopher Kelly
Fort Worth (Texas) Star-Telegram Casino Jack 3D Little Fockers Rabbit Hole Somewhere Summer Wars True Grit You know a comedy franchise has hit rock bottom when, within the first 15 minutes of a movie, you've been forced to watch an obese man receiving an enema and a 2-year-old boy projectile-vomiting into the face of his dad. So it goes with "Little Fockers," the third and (let's all cross our fingers here) presumably last installment in the series about the put-upon nurse Greg Focker (Ben Stiller) and his ex-CIA agent father-in-law Jack Byrnes (Robert De Niro).
Greg and his wife Pam (Teri Polo) are now happily, if busily married in Chicago, with their twins' third birthday fast approaching. But our hero faces temptation in the form of Andi Garcia (Jessica Alba), a knockout pharmaceutical sales rep who wants Greg to become a spokesperson for a new male sexual enhancement drug called Sustengo. (And yes, they beat that joke about how she shares a name with the actor Andy Garcia far into the ground.)
Jack, meanwhile, is facing mortality: He's recently suffered a heart attack, which -- for reasons that make about as much as sense as everything else in this slapdash effort -- only Greg knows. The assorted plot points converge in one of those "I-can't-believe-I'm-actually-watching-this" moments, when Jack has a negative reaction to Sustengo, requiring Greg to inject his aroused private parts with a shot of adrenaline.
As much as De Niro probably earned to endure "Little Fockers," he should have asked for another $5 million for this scene alone. The plot of "Little Fockers," of course, is really just an excuse to assemble a bunch of familiar faces and allow them to shtick it up. At least on that score, "Little Fockers" obliges. Barbra Streisand, as Greg's sex therapist mother, and Dustin Hoffman, as his "menopausal" father, endearingly hover around the edges, and Owen Wilson -- who's long been the best part of this series -- returns as Pam's ex-boyfriend Kevin, a Zen-preaching investment banker who's forever in the throes of a spiritual crisis. New to the mix ?are Laura Dern, playing the headmistress at a tony preschool where Greg and Pam want to enroll the twins, and Harvey Keitel, as Greg's do-nothing contractor.
Yet there's absolutely nothing at stake here: We know Greg would never cheat on Pam, and we know Jack's suspicions will eventually be allayed. Clearly in a state of desperation, director Paul Weitz and screenwriters John Hamburg and Larry Stuckey pile on the puerile sight gags and struggle to come up with new ways to humiliate a bunch of performers who have been humiliated plenty in "Meet the Parents" and "Meet the Fockers."
By the time Greg and Jack have a bloody fistfight on a children's playground, "Little Fockers" is no longer running on fumes -- it's empty.
'Little Fockers' * Rating: PG-13 (crude humor, language and sexual content)Cast: Robert De Niro, Ben Stiller, Barbra Streisand, Dustin Hoffman and Owen WilsonDirector: Paul WeitzRunning time: 1 hour, 38 minutes

description.hltext_display: 歐洲大雪 港接回滯英學生
description.content:
受歐洲大風雪影響，香港多個來往歐洲的班機被迫取消或延誤，不少港人滯留當地。國泰航空公司今天安排4個班機，優先接回滯留英國的400名香港學生。
香港機場管理局表示，由於歐洲大風雪，香港今天有3班來往英國倫敦班機被取消，另有4班來往英國及德國的班機延誤。
國泰航空表示，倫敦機場受到暴風雪影響，運輸量大減，從18日至今，共有15班國泰班機被迫取消，目前約2800名乘客滯留倫敦機場，但因部份乘客已取消或更改行程，還要進一步確認實際滯留人數。
另外，在香港政府協調下，國泰今天安排4個班機從倫敦返港，優先接回滯留倫敦機場的400多名香港學生，他們大多數是在英國讀書的中學生，首批返港的是年紀較小、沒有人同行的13至16歲學童。
香港旅遊業議會表示，香港至今仍有9個旅行團滯留在歐洲，涉及人數170人，其中4個團約100人滯留在倫敦，其餘5個團分別滯留在布拉格及巴塞隆納等城市。

description.hltext_display: Insentif saman trafik masih dibuka
description.content:
KUALA LUMPUR - Insentif pembayaran saman yang dikeluarkan sebelum atau pada 1 Disember 2010 masih lagi terbuka dan belum ditamatkan tempohnya.
Menurut kenyataan Polis Diraja Malaysia melalui laman facebooknya, semua saman yang dikeluarkan sebelum tarikh tersebut akan diberi insentif kadar munasabah secara automatik sebanyak 50 peratus melalui kaunter PDRM, pejabat pos dan internet.
Namun saman PDRM yang bermula pada 1 Disember 2010 pula akan diberi insentif sebanyak 50 peratus dan 30 peratus, mengikut tempoh pembayaran yang dibuat.
"Saman yang diselesaikan dalam tempoh 15 hari akan diberi insentif 50 peratus daripada kadar kompaun sebenar dan saman yang diselesaikan dalam tempoh 16 hingga 30 hari akan diberi insentif 30 peratus daripada kompaun sebenar.
"Saman yang tidak diselesaikan dalam tempoh 30 hari tidak akan diberi sebarang insentif dan seterusnya akan disenarai hitam," menurut kenyataan itu yang dikeluarkan bagi menjawab kekeliruan orang ramai mengenai tempoh pembayaran saman.
Selain itu, PDRM turut menjelaskan tiada masalah "off line" di kaunter pembayaran PDRM sejak kadar baru insentif pembayaran saman dilaksanakan kecuali beberapa masalah teknikal yang telah diatasi. - Bernama

description.hltext_display: Фигурантам дела об убийстве Сулима Ямадаева отменили пожизненный срок
description.content:
Суд ОАЭ готов освободить убийцу Сулима Ямадаева при согласии родственников последнего 1
Апелляционный суд Дубая заменил пожизненное заключение фигурантам дела об убийстве Героя России Сулима Ямадаева иранцу Махди Лорния и гражданину Таджикистана Максуджону Исматову на 27 месяцев лишения свободы. Суд назначил новый срок наказания — три года тюремного заключения по мусульманскому календарю, где год равен девяти месяцам, то есть общий срок — 27 месяцев. По словам адвоката Лорнии Абдулы аль-Мадани, осужденные уже провели в тюрьме около 21 месяца, и этот срок им будет засчитан. «Мы считаем приговор справедливым, мы ожидали этого», — сказал РИА «Новости» аль-Мадани.
Покушениена Сулима Ямадаева было совершено в Объединенных Арабских Эмиратах (ОАЭ) в конце марта 2009 года, в апреле 2010 года дубайский суд приговорил Лорнию и Исматова к пожизненному лишению свободы (в ОАЭ 25 лет). Прокуратура настаивала на высшей мере наказания — смертной казни.
Судья, ведущий процесс, заявил, что апелляционная жалоба осужденных по делу об убийстве Ямадаева в Дубае «принимается по форме и содержанию, а также изменяется приговор уголовного суда Дубая, вынесенный в апреле 2010 года — о присуждении пожизненного срока заключении Лорнии и Исматову».
Обоснование апелляционного суда не оглашалось, оно должно быть озвучено в течение 15 дней после вынесения решения.
По словам представителя адвокатской конторы «Аль-Мадани» Мухаммеда Загера, суд принял во внимание заявление брата Сулима Ямадаева Исы Ямадаева. По мнению юриста, с осужденных сняты обвинения в соучастии в убийстве, а тюремный срок назначен за хранение оружия.

description.hltext_display: Rehab staffer accuses Lohan of battery, then fired
description.content:
Riverside County sheriff's detectives said Tuesday they are investigating the "Mean Girls" star for an alleged altercation with a worker at a Betty Ford Center facility in Palm Desert that occurred after 1 a.m. on Dec. 12.
The agency declined to say what prompted the fight, but said the worker was interested in pursuing charges against Lohan.
Betty Ford spokesman Russ Patrick said the staffer was fired for identifying patients at the center in an interview and "disclosing a privileged document."
Although Betty Ford and the sheriff's department did not identify the worker, she appeared in an interview on celebrity website TMZ on Tuesday afternoon and was promptly fired. She claims the 24-year-old Lohan and two other girls had sneaked out of the facility.
In the video, Dawn Holland claims she was trying to get Lohan to submit to a breathalyzer test when the actress became belligerent, pushed her and snatched a phone from her hand, straining her arm.
Attempts to reach Holland were unsuccessful. A phone number registered to her was not accepting calls Tuesday evening.
Lohan has not been arrested or charged in the incident. Her attorney, Shawn Chapman Holley, said in an e-mailed statement that it was the actress who called for police.
She declined to offer additional details, citing the ongoing sheriff's investigation.
While the fallout for Holland was swift, Lohan's situation remains unclear. A judge has ordered her to remain at Betty Ford until Jan. 3 and remain out of trouble until Feb. 25. He also ordered her to submit to all drug and alcohol screenings or face up to six months in jail for violating her probation on a 3-year-old drunk driving case.
Riverside County sheriff's Deputy Herlinda Valenzuela said Lohan's case would be presented to prosecutors, who will decide whether Lohan faces a new charge.
Lohan has been receiving treatment at the Betty Ford Center and its facilities, about 120 miles east of Los Angeles, since late September.
Patrick's statement said that until Tuesday, Betty Ford had upheld the confidentiality of 96,000 patients who had received treatment there since it opened in 1982.
He said Holland's interview was a breach of trust and the rehab process.
"When patients come to the center for treatment, they come to a safe place where their identity is protected, where anonymity is safeguarded," he said in an e-mail. "Their simple priority when in treatment is to learn how to live a life free of alcohol and other drugs.
"Confidentiality and trust are key to the treatment and recovery process."
Lohan's stint at Betty Ford is her fifth stay in rehab and her second this year.
Beginning in July, she was jailed for 14 days, followed by three weeks at inpatient rehab. Fox agreed to release her early from treatment at Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center in late August based on doctor's recommendations.

description.hltext_display: [経済]住友不動産がＵＢＳ証券の積極判断などで年初来の高値、需給妙味
description.content:
住友不動産 <8830> は22日、前場2001円（59円高）まで上げて12月17日につけた年初来の高値1959円を更新し、終値も1987円（45円高）で2日続伸となった。ＵＢＳ証券が投資判断を21日付けで引き上げて「中立」から「買い」とし、目標株価は1800円から2200円としたと伝えられた。
株価の2000円台回復は09年9月以来。信用取引の売り建てに逆日歩が発生し、売り建てを継続するには高コスト状態。しかも、売り残が買い残を大きく上回っているため、株価が上がるほど売り建ては苦しくなり、これを清算するための買いが増加するとの思惑が出たようだ。（情報提供：日本インタビュ新聞社＝Ｍｅｄｉａ−ＩＲ）
