description.hltext_display: Prokuratura: Mówienie do policjanta "psie" nie znieważa
description.author: online@dziennikwschodni.pl (www.dziennikwschodni.pl
description.content: Lubelska prokuratura umorzyła śledztwo w sprawie nazwania policjanta "psem". Według biegłego językoznawcy słowo "pies" jest używane tak samo często jak "glina" albo "stróż prawa" - czytamy w Gazecie Wyborczej."Zamknij się psie!" miał wykrzyczeć do starszego posterunkowego z lubelskiej policji pijany asesor prokuratury z Poznania. Wszystko wydarzyło się w listopadzie ub. roku na Krakowskim Przedmieściu w Lublinie - podaje Gazeta Wyborcza.Policjant uznał, że został znieważony na służbie, dlatego sprawa trafiła do lubelskiej prokuratury. Podczas postępowania asesor zaczął jednak dowodzić, że słowo "pies" nie znieważa policjanta, bo jest używane jako jego synonim. Za przykład podał m.in. film "Psy".A biegła językoznawca wydała opinię, że słowo "pies" jest używane w potocznym języku tak często jak np. słowa "glina" lub "stróż prawa". Na podstawie tej opinii prokuratura postępowanie umorzyła - czytamy w Gazecie Wyborczej.Posterunkowy zaskarżył umorzenie do sądu, który przyznał mu rację i nakazał rozpatrzyć sprawę prokuraturze jeszcze raz. I tym razem została jednak umorzona, tym razem prawomocnie.Policjant zamierza teraz sam złożyć do sądu akt oskarżenia w sprawie znieważenia przez asesora.

description.hltext_display: El Barça se estrella contra la muralla del Athletic
description.content:
La noche de Reyes traerá un regalo más para los niños de FC Barcelona o Athletic Club de Bilbao, y es que San Mamés decidirá una eliminatoria totalmente abierta tras el empate sin goles que se ha visto este martes en el Camp Nou, en un encuentro con un sólo dominador, como de costumbre el Barça, pero en el que los bilbaínos levantaron una efectiva e inquebrantable muralla defensiva.
Lo probaron hasta la saciedad los blaugrana, incansables en la búsqueda del gol que abriera el muro del Athletic. Lo hicieron con tranquilidad, primero, y a la heroica en los segundos finales, pero sin encontrar el premio deseado. Sí lo hizo el Athletic, ya que encontró lo único que buscó en todo el partido, no encajar un gol.
En la primera parte el Barcelona jugó bien y a su antojo. Con un control absoluto, aplastante, las posesiones más largas del Athletic eran las que tenía Gorka antes de hacer los saques de portería. Sin embargo, este partido fue diferente a los últimos de los de Guardiola, en los que además de dominar en todo el campo obligaban a los porteros a recoger balones de dentro de su área.
El único punto negativo en los blaugrana fue que abusaron del toque sin llegar con peligro. Y es que si se hace buscando siempre los tres palos tiene sentido, pero si el delantero centro, Bojan hasta ser sustituido en el ’62 por Villa, se abre y nadie busca el centro, los balones no encuentran rematador. La defensa bilbaína, con muchos hombres por delante de Gorka, dificultó el ataque local.
No es que faltaran ocasiones, como una de Bojan en el minuto 6 o dos buenos disparos de Iniesta que obligaron a Iraizoz a lucirse con sendas estiradas. Pedro, el más activo y el mejor del partido, no se cansó de correr para asistir a sus compañeros, pero faltaba la chispa habitual, esa sexta marcha que acostumbran a poner los de Guardiola.
Joaquín Caparrós, atento y nervioso siempre en su área técnica, veía como su planteamiento defensivo iba cobrando sentido con el paso de los minutos. El empate sin goles era bueno para los ‘leones’ de cara al partido de vuelta en San Mamés, y por ello no tocó ninguna pieza en su esquema, tan solo cambio de peones. Con ello, el Barcelona seguía siendo el amo y señor del partido y, con Messi en el campo, Guardiola intentó tener más pegada.
Por si acaso, entró el ‘Guaje’ Villa para añadir efectivos en punta en sustitución del renovado y desafortunado Bojan, que ni en su competición predilecta pudo reencontrarse con el gol. Tal era la telaraña defensiva del Athletic que el partido desembocó en un frontón. Los blaugrana incrementaron un poco el ritmo, buscando más el área, pero en pocas ocasiones el balón llegó a Iraizoz, pues la zaga repelía todos los balones.
Guardiola ordenó a sus delanteros que se movieran más e intercambiaran posiciones, para intentar despistar a los bilbaínos, pero ni así encontraron una vía fácil hacia el arco vasco. Orbaiz entró en el campo por el hoy mediapunta Iturraspe y, con este cambio, se evidenció más el planteamiento defensivo. Dos líneas muy juntas y pobladas, con solo Muniain un poco avanzado, eran una muralla demasiado harto complicada de superar. Messi, en una ocasión, consiguió penetrar pero Mateu Lahoz pitó una falta anterior al argentino, cortando la jugada y ganándose el abucheo del Camp Nou.
Los veinte jugadores de campo más Gorka levantaron un campamento en el campo del Athletic. El balón casi no cruzó la línea de medios, y el asedio blaugrana continuaba incansable siendo de las mejores ocasiones un tiro fuerte de Villa. Guardiola dio entrada a Adriano, buscando tener en ambas bandas laterales atacantes y con buen centro y abrir así más espacios.
Una única vez pasó el Athletic al campo contrario, pero fue prueba sin continuidad. Piqué sí subió, a lo Alexanko como acostumbra a hacer en casos de esta índole, y tuvo una buena ocasión que no pudo aprovechar. Hasta el pitido final, centros y más centros, poco utilizables, y a pensar ya en la vuelta esperando que el 2011 traiga pólvora para ambos equipos.
FICHA TÉCNICA.
–RESULTADO: FC BARCELONA, 0 – ATHLETIC CLUB, 0.
–EQUIPOS.
FC BARCELONA: Pinto; Alves, Piqué, Abidal, Maxwell; Mascherano (Adriano, min.78), Keita (Messi, min.53), Xavi; Pedro, Bojan (Villa, min.62) e Iniesta.
ATHLETIC: Iraizoz; Iraola, San José, Ustaritz, Koikili; Susaeta, Gurpegui, Javi Martínez, Gabilondo; Iturraspe (Orbaiz, min.66) e Igor Martínez (Muniain, min.54).
–ÁRBITRO: Mateu Lahoz (Col. Valenciano). Amonestó a Javi Martínez (min.32), Ustaritz (min.44), Gabilondo (min.52) y a Iraola (min.83) en el Athletic.
–ESTADIO: Camp Nou, 45.207 espectadores.

description.hltext_display: 09:58 Του Πάνου Μαραγκού
U.S. Teen Birth Rate At All-Time Low
description.content:
The U.S. teen birth rate hit a record low of 39.1 births per 1,000 teens in 2009, down from the 2008 rate of 42.5 births per 1,000, health officials say. The U.S. teen birth rate for younger and older teens -- teen ages 15-19 -- and for all race/ethnic group reached historic lows in 2009, the Centers for the Disease Control and Prevention reported.
The report by the CDC's National Center for Health Statistics also notes declines in the overall fertility rate -- the average number of births that a group of women would have over their lifetimes -- and the total number of U.S. births. The general fertility rate fell from 68.6 births per 1,000 females ages 15-44 per year in 2008 to 66.7 in 2009.
The total number of births declined from 4,247,694 in 2008 to 4,131,019 in 2009. The decline continues into 2010, CDC officials say.
The birth rate for women in their early 20s fell 7 percent in 2009 -- the largest decline for the age group since 1973. The birth rate also fell for women in their late 20s and 30s, but the birth rate for women in their early 40s increased in 2009.

entity.property: CDC's National Center for Health Statistics

description.hltext_display: 校園容器減量 防治登革熱有成
description.content:
南台灣延燒的登革熱疫情已趨緩，行政院衛生署副署長張上淳今天在高雄市表示，南部中小學推動容器減量有成，降低疫情傳播風險，值得中北部縣市防疫借鏡。
身兼登革熱中央流行疫情指揮中心副指揮官的張上淳，今天南下頒獎表揚台南及高雄執行容器減量的績優學校及個人。
他表示，登革熱防治要從社區環境清潔做起，容器減量更是疫情防治的釜底抽薪之計，沒有容器讓病媒蚊無處可以產卵，能有效遏止疫情蔓延。
張上淳說，從中小學校園推廣容器減量，往下扎根不僅是基層環保教育的一環，更能藉由小朋友在家庭中的影響力，強化社區執行成果。
疾管局第五分局長林立人表示，高雄及台南疫情高峰期，1個星期本土確定病例增加150例，上個星期統計下降為50例，疫情明顯緩和；可見室內外容器減量發揮成效，未來會協調環保署將容器減量列為清淨家園計畫的常規執行項目。991222

description.hltext_display: 'World's first' glasses-free 3D TV on sale
description.content:
Toshiba on Wednesday launched in Japan what it calls the world's first television that allows viewers to see 3D images without wearing special glasses, amid intensifying competition.Curious shoppers stopped to test the screen at an electronics store in central Tokyo as the 12-inch model of Regza GL1 Series went on sale.
The new model with a liquid crystal display carries a price tag of Y119,800 ($A1,440) yen. A 20-inch model will be released on Saturday.
The new 3D TV does not require users to wear special glasses, whereas other 3D-capable models require glasses that act as filters to separate images between each eye to create the illusion of depth.
Toshiba's screens use processing technology to create depth-filled images and the Regza GL1 Series allow users to switch between 2D and 3D on normal TV programs.
Kazuhito Gunji, a public relations official at electronics retailer Bic Camera, said the company had received many inquiries from customers on when they can get their hands on the product.
Electronics stores are hoping the release of the latest technology will help offset declining sales as government incentives for purchasing environment-friendly home appliances were reduced this month.
The hugely competitive TV sector is a challenge for many electronics makers given that customers are increasingly accustomed to declining prices, making it difficult for the industry to generate profits.
Sony on Monday said it may fall short of its sales goal of 25 million liquid crystal display TV sets this fiscal year as it struggles to be profitable in the sector, and has also embraced 3D TV technology.
Most shoppers were curious but also cautious about the new device on Wednesday, however.
"I want to watch on a big screen," said a 47-year-old man who has a 37-inch TV at home. "I'll wait for another year before buying," he said.
Another customer, 33, said: "It's great that we don't have to wear glasses, which is a nuisance."
"But I didn't feel images were flying out of the screen on some programs," he added.
Toshiba says images on the 12-inch screen are best viewed from the front and some 65cm away.
"Customers currently think of 3D images as just an add-on function ... but 3D is expected to become a standard eventually" with 3D films and video titles increasing, said Toshiba sales official Eiichi Matsuzawa.
Rival Sharp earlier this year unveiled a small glasses-free LCD touchscreen that shows 3D images for use in mobile phones, digital cameras and games consoles such as Nintendo's 3DS, to be released in Japan in February 2011.

description.hltext_display: Surging Mavs trim struggling new-look Magic
description.author: Paul Levine
description.content:
Los Angeles - The Dallas Mavericks will enjoy a much- deserved five-day Christmas break, while the struggling new-look Orlando Magic will be working in the gym trying to figure things out.
Caron Butler scored 20 points, Dirk Nowitzki had 17 and the visiting Mavericks held off the Magic, 105-99 on Tuesday night for their 16th victory in the last 17 games.
'It was an important game for us,' said Mavericks coach Rick Carlisle, whose club resumes play on Monday at Oklahoma City. 'We wanted to get momentum going into the break.'
The game marked a milestone for Nowitzki, who passed legendary Larry Bird for 25th place on the NBA's all-time scoring list. Afterwards, the German received a congratulatory text message from the Hall of Famer.
Tyson Chandler added 16 points and Jason Terry contributed 13 off the bench for Dallas (23-5) which moved to 10-1 on the road after sweeping the Florida road trip by snapping Miami's 12-game run and winning at Orlando for the fifth straight time.
'This is a huge trip for us,' Chandler said. 'After a tough win in Miami, to come down to Orlando and get a win on back-to-back nights, where we knew they would be pumped up is huge for our confidence; it's huge for our momentum.'
Dwight Howard had 26 points with 23 rebounds, while J.J. Redick scored 21 for Orlando (16-12) losers of four straight and eight of its last nine games.
With no time for a practice, Orlando has dropped two in a row since acquiring Gilbert Arenas, Hedo Turkoglu, Jason Richardson and Earl Clark following Saturday's blockbuster trade with Phoenix and Washington.
Magic coach Stan Van Gundy explained the difficulties of integrating new players into a team, especially during the season.
'It's not easy when a guy goes to a new team and he's got all of training camp,' he said. 'Now you're talking about guys coming in 26 games into the year. They still haven't practised together.
'Nobody wants to hear it, but it's going to take some time and I'm not talking about two days either. We're back to square one.'
Orlando faces conference leaders San Antonio on Thursday and Boston on Christmas Day.
Dallas led by as many as 12 points in the fourth quarter and 97-89 before Howard hit two free throws and Richardson buried a three to make it a three-point game with 56.6 seconds left.
Terry nailed a 20-footer with 38 seconds remaining, but Turkoglu countered with two free throws.
The Magic fouled Shawn Marion, who made both from the stripe. After Richardson hit another triple, Nowitzki sank a pair of foul shots for a 103-99 advantage at the 24 second mark.
Richardson had his three-point try rim out, and Terry converted two more from the line to further the Magic's frustrations.
'Right now, we're not worried about these last two games,' Arenas said. 'We're worried about four months from now and where we're going to be. It's a long season and we're upbeat about what the future holds for us.'
Elsewhere: Milwaukee Bucks 98, LA Lakers 79 Backup Earl Boykins scored 10 of his season-high 22 points in a 21-7 closing run, John Salmons added 20 and the Bucks (11-16) snapped the Lakers' five-game winning streak, with their first win in seven meetings against the two-time defending NBA champions.
Kobe Bryant netted 21, Spanish-native Pau Gasol had 15 and 11 rebounds for the Lakers (22-7) who were outscored 26-13 in the final 12 minutes en route to a season-low point total.
Chicago 121, Philadelphia 76 Derrick Rose had 22 points with 12 assists, Luol Deng also scored 22 as the Bulls (17-9), minus injured big men Joakim Noah and Taj Gibson pounded the visiting 76ers (11-17) for their eighth win in nine games.
Oklahoma City Thunder 99, Charlotte Bobcats 81 Kevin Durant poured in 32 points and visiting the Thunder (20-9) went on a game-breaking 25-3 fourth-quarter flurry to hand the Bobcats (9-19) their fourth straight loss.
New Jersey Nets 101, Memphis Grizzlies 94 Brook Lopez scored 26 points, newly-acquired Sasha Vujacic added a season-high 16 and the Nets (9-20) stopped a 10-game road slide.
Spanish-native Marc Gasol netted 19 points for Memphis (12-17) losers of three in a row.
Golden State Warriors 117, Sacramento Kings 109 Monta Ellis scored nine of his 36 points in overtime, after Vladimir Radmanovic's three-point buzzer-beater sent the game into the extra session, and the visiting Warriors (10-18) rallied from 16 down in the fourth quarter for just their third win in the last 17 games.
Slovenian Beno Udrih scored a career-high 34 points for the league-worst Kings (5-21), losers of six straight and 20 of 22 games.

description.hltext_display: Braafheid & Demichelis weg - Bayern räumt seinen Kader auf
description.content:
Es tut sich einiges beim Rekordmeister. Die Bayern-Bosse Karl-Heinz Rummenigge (55) und Christian Nerlinger (37) räumen den Kader auf! BILD sagt, was passiert.
• Der Fall Baines
Sportdirektor Nerlinger reiste am Montag zum Spiel Manchester City gegen FC Everton (1:2), um Leighton Baines (26, Vertrag bis 2014) zum letzten Mal zu beobachten. Der linke Verteidiger überzeugte, erzielte sogar mit rechts das zweite Tor für Everton. Es folgten Gespräche mit den Beratern des Spielers. Nach BILD-Informationen braucht Everton zwar Geld (im Gespräch: 10 Mio Ablöse), tut sich aber schwer, den Publikumsliebling jetzt gehen zu lassen.
Fotogalerie Vergrößern
Braafheid und Demichels bald weg?
Bayern räumt auf
Foto: Imago
1 von 6
• Der Fall Gustavo
Im Hotel Kempinski am Münchner Flughafen stieg vergangenen Freitag der „Gustavo-Gipfel“ mit Bayern-Vorstandschef Rummenigge und Nerlinger, sowie Hoffenheim-Mäzen Dietmar Hopp, Sportdirektor Ernst Tanner und Spielerberater Roger Wittmann. Inhalt: Wie stehen die Chancen, Luiz Gustavo (23) in der Winterpause für rund 15 Mio zu holen?
Der Brasilianer kann im defensiven Mittelfeld sowie linker und zentraler Verteidiger spielen. Hopp zu BILD: „Ich gehe zu 99 Prozent davon aus, dass er uns im Sommer verlassen wird.“ Es gebe aber „keinen unterschriebenen Vertrag, auch keinen Vorvertrag“ mit den Bayern. Über einen Wechsel im Winter sagt Hopp: „Ich habe mich am Montag mit Ralf Rangnick und Ernst Tanner getroffen und über die Geschichte gesprochen. Wir sind uns einig, dass es falsch wäre, Luiz bereits im Winter abzugeben.“
Eine Chance, dass Hoffenheim Gustavo (Vertrag bis 2014) noch im Winter gehen lässt, gibt es nur, wenn sie einen Ersatz finden. Berater Wittmann ist inzwischen in Brasilien. Wohl kein Zufall...
Mehr zu Bayern
Gomez glaubt
an den Titel!
„Breno wird
wie Lucio “
• Der Fall van Bommel
Die Position des Bayern-Kapitäns (Vertrag läuft aus): Er will jetzt wissen, wo er bis zur EM 2012 spielt. Die Position der Bayern: Sie wollen mit ihm erst im Frühjahr verhandeln. Nur deshalb entstand die Diskussion, ob Mark van Bommel (33) in der Winterpause wechselt. Wolfsburg, Tottenham und Manchester City haben Interesse.
Die Bayern legen ihm keine Steine in den Weg, wollen ihn aber nicht loswerden. Van Bommel zu BILD: „Es ist möglich, dass ich bei Bayern bleibe. Ich will noch Meister werden.“
• Die Fälle Demichelis und Braafheid
Van Gaal teilte Martin Demichelis (30, Vertrag bis 2012) mit, dass er gehen kann. Gestern sprach der Berater des argentinischen Verteidigers mit Rummenigge über die Transferbedingungen. Am späten Abend meldete der spanische Radiosender Radio Cope: Demichelis wechselt zum FC Malaga. Auf Leihbasis mit Kaufoption für 3 Mio. Von Bayern gab’s bisher keine Bestätigung. Auch der linke Verteidiger Edson Braafheid (27, Vertrag bis 2012) soll und will gehen. Mögliches Ziel: Galatasaray Istanbul.
Bayern räumt auf...

description.hltext_display: Atalantia: Abertis progetta di vendere partecipazione (Expansion)
description.content:
MILANO (MF-DJ)--Abertis sta progettando di vendere la sua partecipazione
in Atlantia e nella portoghese Brisa per finanziare i suoi investimenti
futuri.
Abertis, si legge nell'edizione online di Expansion, detiene una
partecipazione del 6,7% in Atlantia e una quota pari al 14,58% in Brisa.
La partecipazione della societa' spagnola in Atlantia era valutata lunedi'
607,5 mln euro, mentre quella in Brisa 471 mln.

description.hltext_display: 两岸将合作处置重大� 染病疫情
description.content: � � � � 海协会会长陈云林与台湾海基会董事长江丙坤21日在台北举行两会恢复协商以来的第六次领导人会谈，签署《海峡两岸医药卫生合作协议》。 � � � � � �据协议，两岸将就重大� 染病疫情处置等事项，进行交流与合作，建立两岸� 染病疫情信息通报机制，� 强检疫防疫措施和对重大� 染病疫情的处置；同意� 强两岸医药品安全管理及� �发合作，建立重大医药品安全事件协处机制；同意� 强两岸重大意外事件所致伤病者的紧急救治合作。 � � � � 双方同意积极协调海峡两岸旅游交流协会与台湾海峡两岸观光旅游协会� 紧调� �与沟通，为明年适当时候推出大陆居民赴台个人游做好准备；同意海峡两岸航空运输交流委员会与台北市航空运输商业同业公会近日进行沟通，对明年春节两岸包机作出安排；同意尽快在两会框架下成立两岸经济合作委员会；海基会提出台方明年将提高每日赴台大陆游客配额，海协会表示乐观其成并积极配合。 � � � � 双方就后续协商议题规划交换了意见，同意将两岸投保协议列为第七次会谈协商议题。

description.hltext_display: Kiviniemi: Perustuslakiuudistukseen löytymässä sopu
description.content:
Hallituspuolueet ja SDP ovat löytämässä sovun perustuslakiuudistuksen kiistakohdista.
Pääministeri Mari Kiviniemi vahvisti asian aamun neuvottelun jälkeen.
Lisää myöhemmin.

description.hltext_display: Liikenteessä musta marraskuu
description.content:
Tieliikenteessä kuoli lähes tuplasti enemmän ihmisiä marraskuussa kuin vuosi sitten. Kuolleita oli yhdeksän enemmän ja loukkaantuneita 96 enemmän kuin viime vuonna, kertoo Tilastokeskus.
Viime vuonna marraskuu oli aika lailla lumeton. Nyt lumikelit ja liukkaat säät tulivat aiemmin, sanoo aktuaari Raini Östlund Tilastokeskuksesta.
Tieliikenteessä sattui marraskuussa 474 henkilövahinkoon johtanutta onnettomuutta. Niissä loukkaantui yli 600 ihmistä ja kuoli 19.
Kuolleista 15 oli autoilijoita. Lisäksi kuoli kolme jalankulkijaa ja yksi polkupyöräilijä. Valtaosa kuolleista oli miehiä.
Marraskuun kuolleisuusluvut muodostavat vain pienen piikin tilastoissa. Tieliikenteessä kuolleiden määrä on jatkuvasti laskenut viimeisen kahdenkymmenen vuoden ajan, kertoo Tilastokeskus.

description.hltext_display: 蔡批馬政府棄守 投保只提中資鬆綁
description.content:
民進黨主席蔡英文今天批評，第6次「江陳會」未能簽署投資保障協議，會後公布的階段性共識中，攸關「台商人身安全與自由的保障」也隻字未提，反而將重點放在解除中資來台限制，馬政府棄守立場，未來可能達成的協議令人無法期待。
第6次「江陳會」落幕，兩岸簽署醫藥衛生合作協議。民進黨主席蔡英文在中常會前表示，本次「江陳會」不但未能簽署投資保障協議，且根據「江陳會」後公布的「階段性共識」看來，未來投保協議的討論，將依中國所設定的的方向進行，只提中資鬆綁，未提台商安全保障，馬政府已棄守立場。蔡英文：『在250字的共識當中，「台商人身安全與自由的保障」竟然隻字未提，反而把重點放在解除中資來台的限制。中國法治及人權的水準遠低於國際和台灣，因此保障台商安全是人民最在乎的談判事項，但馬政府的談判團隊竟然無法固守，甚至棄守，這令人對於未來可能達成的協議也感到無法期待。』
蔡英文表示，民進黨要求立法院要實質審查所有與中國簽署的協議，協議授權下的工作進行，包括ECFA下的「經合會」、衛生醫藥合作協議下的「工作組」，未來的決議與方案都應該送國會審查，以避免空白授權剝奪了政府公權力。

description.hltext_display: 江西宜春老农看守所死亡 外地专家介入尸检
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
中新网南昌12月22日电(何柳斌)江西宜春市一老农看守所内晕倒死亡引发舆论关注。22日，宜春市宣传部门官员证实，来自上海的司法部司法鉴定科学技术研究院的法医抵达宜春，并已介入尸检。
据当地警方披露的消息，今年9月底和10月初，邹生怀(男，54岁，家住袁州区新坊镇高富村夏家组)、沈荣生、喻贵生等10人在袁州区新坊镇高富村狐仙洞盗得直径约50厘米，长2米的红豆杉，卖得6000元，邹生怀分得1000元。几天后，邹生怀又伙同上述人员把所盗红豆杉的树蔸挖起来，卖给一姓李的人，共卖得1万元，邹生怀分得800余元。
11月22日，袁州区森林公安分局以涉嫌盗窃(盗伐倒卖红豆杉)将邹生怀、邹坚、邹小华、尹小颜等4人逮捕。23日，邹生怀被转入宜春袁州区看守所，关押在6号监室，该监室共关押在押人员15人。
12月11日7时50分，宜春市袁州区看守所在押盗窃嫌疑人员邹生怀起床后突然晕倒。民警随即前往查看，并请狱医进行应急抢救，同时拨打120急救电话。120急救人员在现场对邹生怀进行了抢救，但经抢救无效后死亡。
死者家属对邹生怀的死因持有异议，并在网上发帖希望引起关注。此事经媒体报道后引起社会广泛关注。12月18日宜春市副市长、市公安局局长万秀奇对死者家属鞠躬致歉，并表示不管邹生怀是死于殴打还是疾病，公安系统对此都负有责任。
宜春市、袁州区检察院还成立专门调查组，对邹生怀的死亡原因展开全面调查。
为查明邹生怀死因，检察机关多次与死者家属沟通，协商尸检事宜。
鉴于死者家属提出“希望邀请省外权威鉴定机构参与尸检”的请求，调查组充分尊重家属意见，邀请司法部司法鉴定科学技术研究院的法医进行尸检鉴定。
22日，司法部司法鉴定科学技术研究院的法医与当地公安部门举行会谈，了解案情，并正式介入尸检。但整个过程，媒体记者、死者家属并未被允许参与。
宜春市宣传部门官员表示，尸检结果可能还需要时日才能出来，到时候会统一发布消息。(完)

description.hltext_display: 九把刀脫褲／家長批作家沒品管 張大春：沒品沒法管
description.content:
NOWnews 生活中心／綜合報導
暢銷作家九把刀15日在台南女中演講時的「脫褲致敬」行為，惹來多方爭議，有學生及部分老師認為這個舉動「很屌」、「很可愛」；但更多教育界人士及家長則不以為然，還有人特地至張大春的部落格留言詢問說：「你們作家這一行那麼沒有品管嗎？」不過張大春只淡淡回應說：「沒品是沒法兒管的。」
九把刀脫褲風波讓外界對「作家」一職產生質疑，有一名自稱「穿衣出門的家長」便至張大春的部落格po文表示：「九把刀當眾脫褲教壞孩子，『你們』作家都這樣嗎？」張大春則說：「看起來好像是他霸凌了自己的一條長褲，觀瞻自在人心，很難彼此說服；至於作家品管，我只能說，沒品是沒法兒管的。」
張大春擅長以諷刺、犀利的文字進行創作，也多次在部落格開「重砲」批評，先是叱責吳淡如的史記言論胡說八道，後來又諷文創產業有如「惡性腫瘤」。
據了解，張大春與九把刀兩人並未有糾紛產生，但先前九把刀的小說疑似遭到抄襲時，就有他的書迷直接至張大春的部落格要求評理，甚至還說：「敢用屁眼跟您保證這絕不只是雷同而已！」而張大春也po了一篇「屁眼招領」的文章，暗示要該書迷把屁眼「領回去」。
九把刀脫褲被讚「屌」 李家同：胡鬧也要有限制
網路作家九把刀日前在台南女中演講時脫褲，以表達對學生勇於爭取自主服裝權的敬意，讓該校學生紛紛大讚。但暨南大學前校長李家同卻指出，胡鬧也要有限制，現在學生已漸漸不懂得思考，只求好笑，校方須有所堅持，不應太過媚俗、隨學生起鬨。
據平面媒體報導，李家同指出，他並非刻意針對九把刀，而是純粹就事論事，覺得「現在的年輕人好像非常不嚴肅」，學生行為處事喜歡以好笑、有趣與否做為評斷標準，再這樣下去，日後老師上課恐怕也必須搞笑，才能讓學生乖乖聽課。
對於九把刀脫褲事件引來學生大讚「好屌」，李家同也表示，在學校中，似乎是「哪個學生喜歡思考，就會被當成笨蛋」，感覺學生們已不喜歡花腦筋思考，也不關心國內或國際大事，只喜歡好笑、好玩的事物，但胡鬧要有限制，校方應對晚會、演講場合有所堅持，「不能太過媚俗」。
他更擔憂這種集體媚俗的教學體制，恐怕將培養出許多不思考的人。而這也呼應了日前他新書《李家同談教育──希望有人聽我的話》中提及「教育」的重要性，文中敘述了他對台灣教育的憂心，談及學校素質越來越差的現象，更期盼外界能多關注，「台灣才有救」。
據報導，九把刀回應指出，「我管不了教授啦，他(李家同)好好當他自己就可以了」。他也反駁，很多人成天不解「小孩子到底在想什麼」，但當小孩真的表達他們想法時，就會被打壓，「這有點太可笑了吧！」

description.hltext_display: Postgame Avs-Kings: Can’t cope with Kopitar
description.author: Adrian Dater
description.content:
John Leyba, The Denver Post
As President Obama might have called it, it was a shellacking all right.
The Los Angeles Kings are a very good hockey team. For many, many years, that sentence could not be written without instant derision, an instant check of the sentence writer’s pulse and other vital signs.
Tonight, the very good Kings gave the Colorado Avalanche a very good shellacking at the Can. I really think these Kings can win the next Stanley Cup. I’m having a hard time coming up with areas of weakness on that team. They’re big, fast, strong, skilled, hungry. What’s missing here?
Anze Kopitar was a monster tonight. He just overpowered anyone near him on a couple of end-around rushes, a couple that led to Kings goals. And Drew Doughty was just superb on the back end, playing dominant hockey at both ends.
But enough about the Kings. The Avs tonight? Definitely didn’t bring any desperation to the rink, and I hate using that buzzword. But they didn’t. They just seemed to play like they needed an invitation from the Kings before thinking they could go ahead and do anything tonight.
But the fact is, the Avs just don’t match up well against the Kings. They’re too big. And not slow either. The Kings could cycle with the puck at will all night. Anytime the Avs had the puck in the L.A. zone, they had to make panicky decisions with it, before another hulking King came over.
Duchene, Fleischmann and Jones were bad tonight. Flash was definitely loafing back on L.A.’s third goal, and Jones seems kind of, well, not engaged out there too much these days.
But let’s not bemoan this one any longer. Can’t win ‘em all. I’m lapsing into cliche, so let’s not prolong this any longer. I’m tired, very tired.
A few words with Dutchy after the loss:

description.hltext_display: QMJHL: It’s just talk
description.author: duprass@transcontinental.ca
description.content:
League official says no teams, including the P.E.I. Rocket, have applied for franchise relocation
Topics :
Civic Centre , Credit Union Place , Summerside Western Capitals , Summerside , Quebec , Lewiston
As far as the Quebec Major Junior hockey League is concerned, no teams are moving to new locations for next season.
“No, not at this point,” said Karl Jahnke, the QMJHL’s director of media relations and its point man on the issue. “We’re expecting to have 18 teams in their current 18 markets next year.”
The deadline for teams to apply for franchise relocation was Nov. 26 and Jahnke said none have applied.
Extensions are possible if a team requests one from league president Gilles Courteau, but no teams had asked for that either, said Janhke.
There has been speculation three teams, including the P.E.I. Rocket, are moving because of falling attendance.
Reports around the league and in the media have the Acadie-Bathurst Titan to St. John’s, N.L., the Rocket to Sherbrooke, Que., and the Lewiston Maineiacs to Summerside.
Serge Savard Jr., Rocket president and governor, denied his team is moving in a recent Guardian story.
The Rocket began negotiations two weeks ago with the City of Charlottetown on a new lease at the Civic Centre.
Its current five-year deal expires at the end of this season.
The Lewiston-to-Summerside talk is fueled by the fact Summerside native Bill Schurman, who was point man for Summerside when it tried to land the Sherbrooke Castors in 2003, is a consultant with Lewiston.
Sherbrooke eventually settled in Lewiston, Me.
Courteau also recently met with the City of Summerside in Summerside, which has the 4,400-seat Credit Union Place — the current home of the Summerside Western Capitals junior A hockey team.
Still, nothing is concrete, except every party’s denial.
And, of course, the talk.
“At this point, it’s just rumours,” said Jahnke. “We haven’t got anything official.”
Teams make trade
League trades continued on Tuesday with Gatineau acquiring Félix Bergeron, 18, Dylan Brind'Amour, 17, and a 12th-round pick in 2011 from Cape Breton for Alexander Beaton, 20, and a sixth-round pick in 2011.

description.hltext_display: 09:58 Του Γιάννη Ιωάννου
中菲貿易前10月成長逾4成
description.content:
在中國與東南亞國家協會(ASEAN)自由貿易協定(FTA)上路之後，中國與菲律賓的經貿關係更加密切。今年前10個月，雙邊貿易總額達到227億美元，成長40.2%。
中國駐菲國大使劉建超今天在記者會上說，中國與東協FTA於1月正式啟動，雙邊將近有9成的7000項貨物享受零關稅待遇，同時服務業貿易協定與投資協定也陸續跟進。
根據中國大使館的資料，今年前10個月，中國對菲出口總額是94億美元，成長40%；中國自菲進口總額為133億美元，成長40.4%，菲國享有貿易順差。
中國現為菲國的第3大貿易夥伴。
在投資方面，今年前9個月中國對菲國投資為7300萬美元，較去年同期成長316%，成長幅度居東協地區第2高。菲國對中國投資達6300萬美元，成長177%。
劉建超表示，中國明年將啟動社會經濟方案，加強內需、投資與出口，這可為包括菲律賓在內的鄰國提供合作機會，特別是在農業、採礦業、發電業和環保等方面。
新聞來源：中央商情

description.hltext_display: 陳樹菊獲選全國好人好事代表
description.content:
台東善心女菜販陳樹菊，再接獲全國好人好事運動協會通知，獲選全國好人好事代表，明天將在台北接受「八德獎」的表揚。
陳樹菊女士在民國86年捐了一百萬元給母校台東仁愛國小，作為學童急難救助獎學金；5年前再將多年來賣菜的積蓄450萬元捐給母校蓋圖書館，現在她依然每天在菜市場賣菜，希望能再賺些錢幫助更多小朋友。
陳樹菊這次是由戶籍所在的台東市「建國里」推薦，經由台東縣政府呈轉中華民國表揚好人好事運動協會，經初審、複審及決審等程序，獲選全國好人好事代表，她也是台東縣唯一的獲選受獎者。
陳樹菊長年來的行善義舉，在今年已分別獲得「亞洲富比世亞太地區四傑出善心人士」、美國時代雜誌百大全球影響力人物、並獲頒教育部頒發「一等教育文化獎章」，這是臺灣教育界最高榮耀，也是歷年來唯一只有國小學歷的得獎者。

description.hltext_display: Mexico Will Not Extradite Woman To Utah
description.content:
A woman suspected of the hit-and-run killing of a Utah toddler has so far avoided extradition from Mexico to face prosecution, officials said.
The Mexican government refuses to extradite Gloria Campos-Campos, 31, who has been charged in a Salt Lake City state court with one count of leaving the scene of a fatal accident and one count of obstruction of justice in the killing of 1-year-old Vicsayra Garcia in Taylorsville on July 23, The Salt Lake Tribune reported Tuesday.
"She took my daughter's life. I can't bring that back, but at least I can get some closure," said the baby's father, Oscar Garcia of Taylorsville.
The U.S. Marshals Service went through the process of getting a Mexican extradition warrant, but the Mexican government decided not to hand Campos-Campos over to U.S. authorities, U.S. Marshal Jim Thompson said.
"It surprises us because it was a death and it is a serious offense here," Thompson said. "They just don't recognize it as an extraditable offense."
The charges against Campos-Campos are felonies, each with a maximum sentence of five years in prison, the Tribune noted.
The Utah attorney general additionally has charged Campos-Campos with public assistance fraud, which carries a maximum sentence of 15 years in prison.

description.content:
代表人物：黄晓明
英语教师贴身跟随
另一个一直和英语过不去的当属黄晓明，一直被嘲笑英语发音不准的他，为了能够进军国际影坛，一雪前耻，更是为自己找了一个24小时贴身英语教师，平时那些锅碗瓢盆、吃饭走路的生活用词，都被变成英语“灌进”黄晓明的耳朵里，“学英语最重要是氛围，24小时外教可以让自己就像在国外生活一样，时刻感受英语。”

description.hltext_display: المتحد – الرياضي: صراع الوصافة يحتدم
description.content:
٢٢ كانون الاول ٢٠١٠
لم يكن أشدّ المتفائلين يتوقع دخول النادي المتحد في معركة محتدمة على المركز الثاني مع فريق الرياضي خصوصاً بعد أدائه "المختل" خلال مرحلة الذهاب من بطولة لبنان لكرة السلة لأندية الدرجة الأولى، الذي سرعان ما طورّه بشكل ملحوظ خلال مرحلة الإياب ثائراً من فريق الحكمة ومُجدداً فوزه على أنيبال زحلة، إلاّ أن التحدي الأكبر للمدرب الأميركي بول كافتر ولاعبوه سيكون مساء الأربعاء عند التاسعة مساءً عندما يشقّ الفريق الطرابلسي طريقه الى ملعب المنارة لمواجهة الرياضي بيروت حامل اللقب والمنتشي بفوزٍ صعب وجميل في آنٍ معاً على غريمه التقليدي الحكمة بيروت بثلاثية قاتلة من جان عبدالنور.
في دردشة صغيرة مع لاعب المتحد إيلي رستم، أكدّ الأخير أنّ فريق المتحد سيكون جاهزاً لخوض اللقاء نظراً لأهميته البالغة بالنسبة للفريق الطرابلسي، الذي وإن تمكن من الفوز سيتساوى مع فريق الرياضي مع أفضلية للأخير نظراً لفارق "18" التي حققها في المباراة الأولى بينهما.
وتابع رستم قوله" أداء الفريق تحسّن بشكل كبير خلال مرحلة الأياب وذلك بعد عودة باسم بلعة وإنسجام المحترفين الأميركيين لذلك آمل أن نخرج بنتيجة جيّدة تبقينا في الصراع على المركز الثاني".
وكان أداء فريق المتحد قد شهد تطوراً هائلاً مع عودة قائده باسم بلعة وتأقلم الثنائي الأميركي أوستن جونسون ولافيل بيني، بالإضافة الى تألق اللاعبين اللبنانيين أمثال باسل بوجي وإيلي رستم وحسن الخطيب مما جعل الخيارات أكثر توفراً أمام كافتر.
أما الرياضي "المترنح" بين مباراةٍ وأخرى، فيعولّ على إنطلاقة جديدة مماثلة لأدائه في القسم الأول من مباراة الأحد في مواجهة الحكمة، حيث يبدو أنّ منسوب الإطمئنان قد ارتفع بشكل ملحوظ بعد إستعادة عمر الترك وعلي محمود لدورهما الفعال في أرض الملعب، وإستمرار تألق جان عبدالنور، الذي لقي المساندة الضرورية من الأميركي نايت جونسون.
وتجدر الإشارة أنّ فريق الرياضي يحتلّ حالياً المركز الثاني في الترتيب العام وبرصيده (10 إنتصارات و3 خسارات)، في حين يترصد المتحد خلفه بـ 9 إنتصارات و4 خسارات.
لذا، فمن المؤكد أنّ كافة الأنظار ستتوجه مساء الأربعاء الى ملعب المنارة في بيروت لمراقبة ما ستؤول اليه نتيجة هذه المباراة الحاسمة التي قد ترسم معالم البطولة بأكملها.

description.hltext_display: "La Malesia ti fa bello": conclusa l' iniziativa del Turismo Malesia in collaborazione con YTL Hotel
description.content:
“La Malesia ti fa bello”: conclusa l' iniziativa del Turismo Malesia in collaborazione con YTL Hotel
Si è conclusa l’iniziativa “La Malesia ti fa bello” promossa dall’Ente del Turismo della Malesia in collaborazione con YTL Hotel. All’iniziativa, partita lo scorso 3 agosto, hanno partecipato numerosi banconisti di oltre 600 agenzie di viaggio presenti su tutto il territorio nazionale che hanno inviato, come da regolamento, i documenti necessari per comprovare il numero di pratiche vendute verso la Malesia e, in particolare, il numero esatto di passeggeri inviati nella Terra di Sandokan. Tra queste si è distinta l’agenzia Nicolini , e in particolare Cristina Nicolini, banconista presso la Nicolini Viaggi, si è aggiudicata l’educational di 9 giorni/7notti per 2 persone in Malesia. Il programma di viaggio prevede voli in business class da Roma, 2 notti a Kuala Lumpur presso il The Ritz Carlton con trattamento B&B, visita guidata della città e trasferimento all’Isola di Pangkor per trascorrere 5 notti al Pangkor Laut Resort in pensione completa con trattamenti estetici inclusi offerti da YTL Hotel.Grazie all’impegno di Cristina, "La Malesia ti fa bello’ è nata ascoltando le esigenze delle agenzie di viaggio che abbiamo incontrato durante i mesi precedenti in occasione dei numerosi seminari e meeting organizzati con i nostri partner in tutta Italia. Abbiamo, infatti, raccolto la richiesta dei banconisti di conoscere più da vicino il nostro Paese e avere gli strumenti vincenti per promuovere al meglio la destinazione- commenta Faharuddin Hatmin, direttore dell’Ente del Turismo della Malesia. “Durante i mesi dell’iniziativa si sono iscritti al nostro corso di training online (su www.malesia.travel) più di 500 nuovi agenti con un incremento del 35% dall’inizio dell’anno ad oggi, per un totale di circa 1.800 iscritti. Siamo molto contenti di questo risultato e della curiosità e dall’entusiasmo che sempre più operatori dimostrano verso la Malesia- conclude Hatmin. Per il 2011 l’Ente sta programmando numerose altre iniziative per poter continuare a stimolare e incuriosire gli addetti ai lavori e avvicinarli sempre di più alla Malesia.

description.hltext_display: Il 2010 del Messico è con il segno più
description.content: Secondo stime del Centro d’ Informazione e Statistiche del mondo Imprenditoriale Turistico, l’arrivo di turisti stranieri in Messico è salito del 5,73% nel 2010 rispetto al 2009, nonostante gli eventi negativi che hanno colpito il paese. A fine anno il Messico avrebbe accolto 22milioni 466mila di visitatori, cifra che dovrebbe registrare un incremento dell’ 1% nel 2011. Inoltre, la spesa totale dei turisti nel 2010 ha raggiunto gli 11mila 975milioni 500mila dollari, con un incremento del 12,4% rispetto al 2009. Nel 2011 tale cifra dovrebbe registrare un incremento del 5,7%, secondo quanto detto da Miguel Torruco Marqués, presidente della Confederazione Nazionale Turistica (CNT).

description.hltext_display: Ryanair, prosegue la promozione a sei euro
description.content: Ryanair ha esteso l’offerta del milione di posti a €6 per viaggiare il martedì, mercoledì e giovedì a gennaio, prenotabili sul sito sino alla mezzanotte di giovedì 23 dicembre.

description.hltext_display: Lucca in cerca di sponsor per riqualificare le mura cittadine
description.content: Il Comune di Lucca e Opera delle Mura lanciano una campagna di ricerca sponsor e sottoscrizione di cittadini, per raccogliere fondi e riqualificare le Mura urbane in vista dei festeggiamenti per i 500 anni dell’inizio di costruzione del monumento, che l’amministrazione comunale intende realizzare nel 2013. “Le mura che cingono la città sono un monumento unico al mondo – sottolinea il sindaco Mauro Favilla – completamente conservate e amate non solo dai lucchesi. Necessitano però di tanti interventi e vogliamo muoverci in modo da poterle riqualificare in occasione del loro cinquecentesimo compleanno”.

description.hltext_display: Settemari, prosegue promozione sposi Thailandia di Amo l'Oriente
description.content: Continua con grande successo la promozione di l’Amo l’Oriente dedicata agli sposi che scelgono la Thailandia come meta del loro viaggio di nozze. Amo L’Oriente offre alla sposa il soggiorno in resort esclusivi nel "proverbiale lusso d'Oriente". Le coppie possono optare per una delle tre incantevoli proposte del tour operator: "Dreaming Thailand","Magic Thailand"o "Luxury "Thailand. Le partenze devono avvenire nei mesi di maggio, giugno, settembre e ottobre 2011. Inoltre, In collaborazione con l’Ente del turismo della Thailandia tutti gli sposi che si registrano sul portale www.nozzeclick.it possono partecipare all’estrazione di un magnifico viaggio di nozze “Thailandia a 5 stelle” offerto da Amo l'Oriente . Iniziativa è valida fino al 15 febbraio 2011.

description.hltext_display: Le Huskies fanno 89 Mai nessuno come loro
description.author: Davide Chinellato
description.content:
Le ragazze di coach Auriemma sono le pi� vincenti di sempre nella storia del basket Usa indipendentemente dal sesso. Battuto il record di Ucla maschile che tra il 1971 e il 1974 era arrivata a quota 88
HARTFORD (Usa), 22 dicembre 2010 ? ?89 and counting?, 89 e oltre. Le Connecticut Huskies di coach Geno Auriemma, italiano di Montella da 50 anni emigrato negli States, sono la squadra pi� vincente di sempre nella storia del basket Usa indipendentemente dal sesso. Lo storico record di Ucla maschile, che tra il 1971 e il 1974, col leggendario coach John Wooden al timone, era arrivata a quota 88, � stato superato travolgendo 93-62 Florida State davanti ai 16294 spettatori dello XL Center di Hartford, Connecticut, e festeggiato con una maglietta, ?89 and counting? che lascia intendere che la truppa di coach Geno non ha ancora voglia di fermarsi.
Geno Auriemma con Tiffany Hayes e Lorin Dixon. Reuters IL TIMONIERE ? Auriemma, 56 anni, � emigrato negli Usa con la madre e i fratelli quando ne aveva 7. Ed � diventato una leggenda del basket, tanto da meritarsi un posto nella Hall of Fame. A Connecticut, un?universit� dove lo sport femminile aveva poco spazio, � arrivato nell?agosto del 1985: le Huskies hanno chiuso con un record perdente solo nella prima stagione, poi si sono guadagnate un posto stabile tra le grandi. Il primo titolo di 7 titoli arriva nel 1995, l?anno dopo che Auriemma rinuncia alla cittadinanza italiana per paura di dover assolvere gli obblighi di leva. Coach Geno, che per rilassarsi ascolta Pavarotti e le canzoni napoletane, macina record e in 26 stagioni ha vinto 746 partite (perdendone appena 122). Perch� le Huskies non si limitano a vincere ma dominano, a tal punto che gi� dal 2001 al 2003 avevano messo insieme la serie di successi pi� lunga conosciuta allora dal basket femminile: 70 partite. la star ? A UConn � passata una costellazione di stelle del basket in rosa: da Rebecca Lobo all?italiana naturalizzata Diana Taurasi, da Sue Bird a Tina Charles. In tutto 13 All American e 6 vincitrici del premio di miglior giocatrice dell?anno: ma nessuna stella brilla luminosa come quella di Maya Moore, che ha sigillato la vittoria numero 89 con una prestazione da 41 punti e 10 rimbalzi. Lei e Tiffany Hayes sono le uniche ad aver giocato tutte le partite della serie d?oro, ma Maya in bacheca ha i titoli di miglior giocatrice del 2008 e del 2009. E ha fatto anche di pi�: � la miglior realizzatrice nella storia della scuola con 2443 punti (oltre 19 di media in carriera), ma ha anche arpionato 1046 rimbalzi e gioca consecutivamente da 136 partite. ?Ha avuto un impatto tremendo non solo sulla sua scuola, ma sul basket femminile in generale? l?ha incoronata Pat Summitt, l?unico coach ad aver vinto pi� titoli femminili di Auriemma (8 contro 7).
Di spalle la stella Maya Moore. Reuters SERIE RECORD ? L?ultima sconfitta conosciuta � del 6 aprile 2008, 82-73 da Stanford nella Final Four Ncaa, il match che precede la gara per il titolo. Poi via, senza voltarsi indietro, conquistando due titoli non rischiando quasi mai di perdere (anche se nella finale dell?anno scorso Stanford era avanti 20-12 alla fine del primo tempo) dopo aver chiuso imbattute due stagioni di fila, impresa mai riuscita nel basket femminile. L?ultimo obiettivo era battere il record di Ucla e diventare la squadra pi� vincente indipendentemente dal sesso. Impresa compiuta con numeri da record e gli avversari demoliti a oltre 33 punti di media di scarto: appena due vittorie su 89 con meno di 10 punti di margine, 13 ottenute con oltre 50 punti di scarto, compreso il 117-37 rifiliato a Holy Cross lo scorso 14 novembre, nella partita che ha inaugurato la nuova stagione. LO SPAVENTO ? Ma la serie ha rischiato seriamente di chiudersi a quota 79. Il 16 novembre UConn affronta in casa Baylor, la seconda squadra del ranking, e a 16? dalla fine � avanti 44-29. Poi qualcosa si guasta. Baylor si mette a correre e aggancia sul 48 pari a 9?15? dalla sirena e arriva fino a 56-48 con 6?51 da giocare. La favola sembra al capolinea, ma Moore e la matricola Hartley si caricano le compagne sulle spalle e a 36? dalla fine UConn � avanti 65-64. Moore sbaglia il tiro della sicurezza e lascia 7? a Baylor che per� non trova il tiro buono che avrebbe cambiato la storia. L?ULTIMA SFIDA ? Per arrivare a quota 90, il prossimo 30 dicembre, UConn dovr� imporsi sul campo di Stanford, l?ultima squadra a battere le ragazze di Auriemma. Una sfida difficile, anche se le Cardinal non sono pi� la seconda miglior squadra del paese: ma vogliono vendicare la sconfitta patita nel match per il titolo 2010, hanno due star di prima grandezza come Nnemkadi Ogwumike e la sorella Chiney e in casa non perdono da tre anni e 50 partite. ?Hanno la miglior giocatrice che c?� in circolazione e sono la squadra migliore, ma non ci intimidiscono? avvisa Tara VanDerveer, coach di Stanford. Per le Huskies e coach Auriemma una nuova sfida.
Davide Chinellato

description.hltext_display: Auratours punta sulle adv
description.content: Affiancamento totale di Auratours alle agenzie di viaggio: così prosegue, con sempre maggiore attenzione e impegno, il percorso vincente intrapreso dal'operatore romano che presenta in anteprima le iniziative rivolte ai partner di fiducia per il 2011. A partire dall’iniziativa già avviata che vedrà l’operatore consegnare, ad una selezione di agenzie fidelizzate, roll-up banner descrittivi delle destinazioni più vendute dall’agenzia stessa e inserite in catalogo. Il banner recherà, oltre al logo di Auratours, anche quello dell’agenzia per una personalizzazione a 360°.Il Marzo, 15 agenti parteciperanno al primo fam-tour Auratours con destinazione Libano: la programmazione sul Paese mediorientale, ancora poco conosciuto dal pubblico italiano, è stata di recente avviata, dopo un’approfondita esplorazione del territorio da parte dello staff dell’operatore. Ad Aprile si vola in Canada, meta fortunata per 10 agenti selezionati che visiteranno Québec e Ontario. Il fam tour è organizzato in partnership con Air Transat e durerà 7 giorni, dando modo ai partecipanti di visitare le 2 Province confinanti dell’est canadese. “Il nostro, nei confronti degli agenti di viaggio, è un affiancamento totale- commenta Roberto Morgi, Sales Manager dell’operatore – dedicate a tutti, agenzie accreditate e non, distribuite sull’intero territorio italiano, le nostre iniziative rientrano nella politica di avvicinamento della nostra realtà agli agenti che cerchiamo di invogliare a conoscere e consigliare il nostro prodotto”. Sempre mediorientale la meta del fam tour di Maggio: la Giordania, uno dei cavalli di battaglia dell’operatore romano, sarà oggetto di approfondimenti in loco per 12 agenti Infine, ancora in data da definirsi, la Grande Mela in versione shopping per 10 agenti.

description.hltext_display: Giamaica, tour in bicicletta
description.content:
Per i viaggiatori che vogliono conoscere da vicino la Jamaica, c’è il Jamaica Reggae Ride un viaggio in bicicletta della durata di 3-5 giorni. Si tratta di un percorso di 500 chilometri per l’isola con straordinari e vari paesaggi, che vanno dalle montagne alle vallate, attraverso rigogliose foreste pluviali, piantagioni di noci di cocco e banane, dai fiumi alle foreste, da bianche spiagge sabbiose a pittoreschi villaggi di pescatori. Si visiteranno i mercati degli agricoltori, le scuole locali di bambini e si scaleranno cascate di circa 200 metri.
Il popolo jamaicano è caldo e sinceramente amichevole. Questo viaggio è un’avventura in quello che rende la Jamaica così diversa da molte altre isole: l’unicità della sua popolazione, della sua spiritualità, della sua musica e la sua cultura che fanno della Jamaica veramente il cuore pulsante dei Caraibi. Sono due gli appuntamenti: 11-18 febbraio e 18-25 marzo 2011. Il Jamaica Reggae Ride è operato dalla Active Holidays Caribbean, un tour operator specializzato nelle vacanze avventurose. Per maggiori informazioni: www.jamaicareggaeride.com

description.hltext_display: Travelport, servizio diretto alle adv Galileo di Cipro e Grecia
description.content: Travelport fornirà servizio diretto alle agenzie di viaggio della Grecia e di Cipro utenti Galileo, a seguito della scadenza del suo contratto di distribuzione con Galileo Hellas alla fine dell’anno. Il fornitore di servizi GDS ha infatti preso la decisione di non rinnovare il pre-esistente accordo di distribuzione con una terza parte, nell’ambito della propria strategia di investimenti nell’area e di crescita delle proprie attività dirette. La nuova realtà combinata Galileo-Worldspan, che seguiterà ad offrire alle agenzie di viaggio di quell’area geografica la scelta tra le due piattaforme GDS, prenderà il nome di Travelport Hellas. Con sede centrale ad Atene, verrà guidata da Leo Zotos, un veterano del settore GDS che ha già condotto il team di Worldspan in Grecia negli ultimi 18 anni ed ha oltre 20 anni di esperienza nel campo GDS. Travelport sta attualmente ampliando il team dedicato ai clienti nell’area geografica, ma anche investendo in nuovi servizi di supporto, tra cui un help desk dedicato.

description.hltext_display: 明星闯好莱坞苦练英语 周杰伦直言想放弃(图)(3)
遊覽車7死車禍 運將判2年
description.content:
去年10月發生的7死仙儷通運公司遊覽車車禍，司機許恩榮被依業務過失致死罪，遭判刑有期徒刑2年。
高雄地方法院今天發布的判決書指出，被告為仙儷通運公司遊覽車司機，民國98年10月10日駕駛營業大客車，載運旅客自台北南下，準備前往屏東小琉球旅遊。
判決書表示，大客車行經國道3號385公里的高雄縣大樹鄉路段，以時速120公里行駛，失控追撞同方向的小貨車後，再擦撞公路護欄，衝出道路邊坡翻覆，造成7死、21傷。
判決書表示，承審法官開庭審理，認為被告肇事後，向抵達現場處理的員警坦承犯行，符合自首條件，依法減刑，且與部分死者家屬和受傷乘客達成和解，審結判處有期徒刑2年。991222

description.hltext_display: 10:20 «Μπλόκο» της Apple στο Wikileaks
description.content:
Στην απόσυρση της εφαρμογής WikiLeaks app, μέσω της οποίας οι χρήστες των συσκευών iPhone και iPad μπορούσαν να έχουν πρόσβαση στα διαβαθμισμένα διπλωματικά έγγραφα των ΗΠΑ που δημοσιοποιεί η ιστοσελίδα Wikileaks, προχώρησε η Apple.
Η κίνηση, που ανακοινώθηκε την Τρίτη, σηματοδοτεί την προσχώρηση της Apple στην ομάδα των μεγάλων αμερικάνικων επιχειρήσεων που έχουν διακόψει κάθε σχέση και έχουν σταματήσει να παρέχουν υπηρεσίες στο WikiLeaks, και συνεπεία αυτού έχουν γίνει στόχος χάκερ που τοποθετούνται υπέρ του οργανισμού, που προέβη στην μαζική δημοσιοποίηση εκατοντάδων χιλιάδων διαβαθμισμένων διπλωματικών τηλεγραφημάτων.
Η συγκεκριμένη εφαρμογή, με κόστος 1,99 δολάριο, είχε διατεθεί την Παρασκευή στο App Store και επέτρεπε στους χρήστες των τηλεφώνων και των υπολογιστών-ταμπλετών να μπαίνουν στο site με ένα «κλικ».
Η εφαρμογή δεν συνδέεται επίσημα με το WikiLeaks, αν και ο άνθρωπος που την ανέπτυξε έκανε σαφές ότι όλα τα έσοδα από τις πωλήσεις της θα διατεθούν στον οργανισμό αυτό.
«Αφαιρέσαμε την WikiLeaks App από το App Store διότι παραβίαζε τους κανονισμούς μας για την ανάπτυξη λογισμικού», δήλωσε η Τρούντι Μίλερ, εκπρόσωπος της εταιρίας, η οποία εδρεύει στο Κουπερτίνο, στην Καλιφόρνια.
«Οι εφαρμογές πρέπει να τηρούν όλους τους εγχώριους νόμους και δεν μπορούν να θέτουν κάποιο πρόσωπο ή μια συγκεκριμένη ομάδα σε κίνδυνο», πρόσθεσε.
Η Apple ελέγχει αυστηρά τα προγράμματα που διατίθενται για τις συσκευές της, αντίθετα με την πιο ανοικτή διαδικασία απόκτησης λογισμικού για τα τηλέφωνα με λειτουργικό σύστημα Android, γεγονός που έχει ωθήσει ένα ποσοστό των χρηστών της να προβούν στην διαδικασία «jailbreak», ώστε να απαλλαγούν από τους υφιστάμενους περιορισμούς όσον αφορά το λογισμικό που μπορούν να εγκαταστήσουν.
Τσέχικο Wikileaks από το Κόμμα των Πειρατών
Τη δική του εκδοχή του Wikileaks, PirateLeaks.cz, ανακοίνωσε την Τρίτη το Κόμμα των Πειρατών της Τσεχικής Δημοκρατίας.
Οι ιδρυτές του ιστοτόπου ανέφεραν ότι έχουν στόχο να ρίξουν φως στις ενέργειες Τσέχων γραφειοκρατών και κυβερνητικών στελεχών δημοσιοποιώντας έγγραφα τα οποία αποκρύπτονται από τους πολίτες.
Υποσχέθηκαν να διατηρήσουν τις ταυτότητες όσων διαρρέουν τέτοια έγγραφα μυστικές και να τους δώσουν οδηγίες για το πώς να "ανεβάσουν" ή να τους στείλουν τα διαβαθμισμένα έγγραφα.
Ο ιστότοπος -προς το παρόν λειτουργεί μόνο στην τσεχική γλώσσα-, μέχρι στιγμής, έχει δημοσιοποιήσει μια πρόταση για την τροποποίηση του νομικού πλαισίου όσον αφορά τα πνευματικά δικαιώματα στη χώρα, την οποία το Κόμμα των Πειρατών είχε ζητήσει επανειλημμένως αλλά ανεπιτυχώς να δημοσιοποιήσει το υπουργείο Πολιτισμού.

description.hltext_display: Дмитрий Мезенцев обвинил министра строительства Иркутской области в неполном служебном соответствии
description.content:
Губернатор Иркутской области Дмитрий Мезенцев вынес предупреждение о неполном служебном соответствии министру строительства и дорожного хозяйства региона Руслану Болотову, которого он назвал ответственным за нарушение сроков реализации проектов, включенных в план подготовки празднования 350-летия Иркутска. Недовольство губернатора, в частности, вызвало нарушение сроков подготовки документов для проведения торгов по выбору подрядчика на строительство здания библиотеки имени Молчанова-Сибирского, в результате чего торги состоялись с опозданием на месяц.
Сам министр никаких комментариев не дает. Он признает право губернатора оценивать профессиональный уровень чиновников, однако отмечает, что перед этим должна пройти служебная проверка.
Торги по выбору подрядчика на строительство нового здания областной научной библиотеки имени Молчанова-Сибирского, назначенные на 7 октября 2010 года, были аннулированы управлением Федеральной антимонопольной службы по Иркутской области в связи с отсутствием экспертизы ценообразования проекта. Антимонопольное ведомство провело проверку по жалобе компании «СМП-Иркутск», не подававшей заявку на участие в торгах. Повторные торги были проведены 12 ноября.

description.hltext_display: Prueba la India misil de corto alcance con capacidad nuclear
description.author: emorales
description.content:
"Las pruebas fueron llevadas a cabo por las fuerzas armadas. Ambos lanzamientos fueron perfectos", dijo a la agencia india IANS el director del Centro Integrado de Pruebas, S.P. Dash.
Nueva Delhi.- La India probó hoy con éxito por dos veces en el este del país el misil tierra-tierra de corta distancia Prithvi-II, con un alcance de 350 kilómetros y capacidad para llevar ojivas nucleares, informó una fuente del Ministerio de Defensa.
El primer misil fue disparado desde una lanzadera móvil situada en la localidad costera de Chandipur, situada en el estado oriental de Orissa, a las 8.16 de la mañana horas locales (02.46 GMT), y el segundo, desde otra lanzadera, 59 minutos después.
"Las pruebas fueron llevadas a cabo por las fuerzas armadas. Ambos lanzamientos fueron perfectos", dijo a la agencia india IANS el director del Centro Integrado de Pruebas, S.P. Dash.
El Prithvi-II ("tierra", en sánskrito), que ya ha sido puesto a disposición del ejército indio, tiene un alcance de 350 kilómetros y capacidad para transportar hasta 500 kilos de carga.
El proyectil ha sido diseñado por la Organización para la Investigación y el Desarrollo de la Defensa (DRDO), que depende del Ministerio de Defensa, y la prueba fue llevada a cabo en presencia de varios científicos de la organización.
La India ha probado tres variantes del misil Prithvi, todas ellas de tipo tierra-tierra y de corto alcance.
La última prueba realizada con el modelo Prithvi II data del pasado mes de septiembre, pero se saldó con un fracaso por "problemas técnicos".
La India mantiene desde hace años una carrera armamentística con su potencia rival vecina, Pakistán, que también posee el arma nuclear, y ambos países efectúan frecuentes pruebas con misiles.
Pakistán, de hecho, probó este martes con éxito el misil tierra-tierra de media distancia Hatf-V, con capacidad para portar ojivas nucleares."Las pruebas fueron llevadas a cabo por las fuerzas armadas. Ambos lanzamientos fueron perfectos", dijo a la agencia india IANS el director del Centro Integrado de Pruebas, S.P. Dash.

description.hltext_display: 'World's first' glasses-free 3D TV hits Japan stores
description.content:
Toshiba on Wednesday launched in Japan what it calls the world's first television that allows viewers to see 3D images without the need to wear special glasses, amid intensifying competition in the market.
Curious shoppers stopped to test out the screen at an electronics store in central Tokyo as the 12-inch model of Regza GL1 Series went on sale.
The new model with a liquid crystal display carries a price tag of 119,800 yen (1,400 US dollars). A 20-inch model will be released on Saturday.
The new 3D TV does not require users to wear special glasses, whereas other 3D-capable models require glasses that act as filters to separate images to each eye to create the illusion of depth.
Toshiba's screens use processing technology to create depth-filled images and the Regza GL1 Series allow users to switch between 2D and 3D on normal TV programmes.
Kazuhito Gunji, a public relations official at electronics retailer Bic Camera, said the company had received many inquiries from customers on when they can get their hands on the product.
Electronics stores are hoping that the release of the latest technology will help offset declining sales as government incentives for purchasing environment-friendly home appliances were reduced this month.
The hugely competitive TV sector is a challenge for many electronics makers given that customers are increasingly accustomed to declining prices, making it difficult for the industry to generate profits.
Sony on Monday said it may fall short of its sales goal of 25 million liquid crystal display TV sets this fiscal year as it struggles to be profitable in the sector, and has also embraced 3D TV technology.
Most shoppers were curious but also cautious about the new device on Wednesday, however.
"I want to watch on a big screen," said a 47-year-old man who has a 37-inch TV at home. "I'll wait for another year before buying," he said.
Another customer, 33, said: "It's great that we don't have to wear glasses, which is a nuisance."
"But I didn't feel images were flying out of the screen on some programmes," he added.
Toshiba says images on the 12-inch screen are best viewed from the front and some 65 centimetres (26 inches) away.
"Customers currently think of 3D images as just an add-on function... but 3D is expected to become a standard eventually" with 3D films and video titles increasing, said Toshiba sales official Eiichi Matsuzawa.
Rival Sharp earlier this year unveiled a small glasses-free LCD touchscreen that shows 3D images for use in mobile phones, digital cameras and games consoles such as Nintendo's 3DS, to be released in Japan in February 2011.

event_or_fact.property: I'll wait for another year before buying
the company had received many inquiries from customers on when they can get their hands on the product
But I didn't feel images were flying out of the screen on some programmes

description.hltext_display: 明星闯好莱坞苦练英语 周杰伦直言想放弃(图)
dEVCOR Innovations Introduces “The Opener,” A Protective Case for the iPhone with an Integrated Bottle Opener
description.content:
dEVCOR Innovations introduces “The Opener”, a protective case for the iPhone with a built in bottle opener. dEVCOR’s thought was why just have a protective case for your phone when you can have a protective case with a handy integrated bottle opener, that still has a stylish look, and fits easily in your pocket?
Athens, GA (PRWEB) December 21, 2010
dEVCOR Innovations introduces “The Opener”, a protective case for the iPhone with a built in bottle opener. dEVCOR’s thought was why just have a protective case for your phone when you can have a protective case with a handy integrated bottle opener, that still has a stylish look, and fits easily in your pocket? The opener was designed around this concept where protection, functionality, and style were all key elements to the overall design of the case and it shows in the finished product. The Opener is sure to be a conversation starter.
The Opener has a hard, impact resistant outer shell and soft shock absorbing inner lining to grip around the phone. This design creates optimum protection for the phone. The stainless steel bottle opener is molded into the back of the case just above a small sunken area, which acts as a simple guide for placing the bottle in the correct place to be opened. The Opener is reinforced with inner ribbings that make the case extremely strong and durable specifically around the bottle opener.
A lot of effort went into the design of The Opener and finding a way to create an iPhone case with a bottle opener that is sleek, slim, and attractive so it could be used as an everyday case. To achieve this the bottle opener was positioned on the top rear of the case resulting in the case tilting forward at a slight angle when it is lying on it’s back. This feature scored very well with focus groups as it cuts screen glare and allows for easy viewing of the iPhone screen while it is laying on a flat surface. This design also allowed for the case depth to be kept at a minimum so that The Opener will fit comfortably in your pocket.
dEVCOR Innovations is focused on providing innovative and exciting new products to enhance the iPhone experience. The Opener is being marketed nation wide to specialty stores and online retailers and is also available online at http://www.devcorproducts.com . For the latest dEVCOR Innovations updates on The Opener and other products, visit the dEVCOR Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/pages/dEVCOR-INNOVATIONS/121092477905882 .
###
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prwebiPhone/devcor/prweb4916274.htm

description.hltext_display: Efterlyser forsøg med modulvogntog
description.content:
22. december 2010 / Transportcentre / Af Jesper B. Nielsen
Det haster med at finde ud af, hvad forsøget med modulvogntog skal gå ud på, hvis EU skal godkende ønsket om at forlænge det til 2017.
Foreningen af Danske Transportcentre bakker 100 procent op om modulvogntogsforsøget i Danmark. Over halvdelen af de modulvogntog, der kører på det danske rutenet, kører mellem centrene. Her gør man en stor indsats for at skabe den rette infrastruktur.
- Vi arbejder ikke bare for at indrette omkoblingspladser og brede rundkørsler, men vi bakker også op om udbredelsen af nettet til at omfatte havne og store erhvervsområder langs rutenettet, siger Kent Bentzen, formand for FDT.
Han minder dog om, at der officielt stadig er tale om et forsøg, selv om de fleste i transportbranchen nærmest tager det givet, at modulvogntogene er kommet for at blive.
- Vi bliver nødt til at få mere logistik ind i forsøget. Det er urealistisk at tro, at EU giver Danmark lov til at forlænge forsøget, når det udløber ultimo 2011.
Ikke godkendt
- Det kan godt være, at de danske politikere har besluttet at forlænge forsøget til 2017; men hvad det forsøg skal gå ud på, og hvordan man vil præsentere det for EU, er endnu ikke lagt fast, siger Kent Bentzen.

description.hltext_display: Govt willing to bear 1/3 of FY11 fuel subsidy: official (Reuters)
description.content:
NEW DELHI (Reuters) The government is willing to bear one-third of fuel subsidies in the fiscal year that ends in March 2011, Finance Secretary Ashok Chawla said on Wednesday.
Oil marketing companies' revenue loss on fuel sales in the current fiscal year is estimated at 660 billion rupees ($14.6 billion), S. Sundareshan, Oil Secretary had said on Tuesday.
(Reporting by Manoj Kumar and Rajesh Kumar Singh; editing by Aradhana Aravindan)

event_or_fact.property: Govt willing to bear 1/3 of FY11 fuel subsidy: official (Reuters) NEW DELHI (Reuters) The government is willing to bear one-third of fuel subsidies in the fiscal year that ends in March 2011

description.hltext_display: 外館製發護照不適用赴加免簽
description.content:
中華民國駐美代表處今天發佈新聞指出，加拿大給予中華民國國民免簽證待遇，僅適用於外交部在台北核發且載有身分證字號的普通護照，駐外各館處製發的護照不適用。
代表處說，最近有很多僑胞詢問，持外館製發的護照，可否免簽進入加拿大。據加拿大移民部及加拿大駐台北貿易辦事處說明，目前加國給予中華民國國民免簽待遇，僅適用於中華民國外交部在台北核發，且載有身分證字號的中華民國普通護照。
代表處說，由於年節將近，旅美僑胞如有意赴加拿大旅遊，宜先確定所持護照是否符合要求，如持外館核發的護照，仍須先向加拿大大使館辦理簽證。僑胞如有疑問可電詢代表處。代表處電話是202-895-1814或202-895-1816。

description.hltext_display: India test raket, net als Pakistan
description.content:
NEW DELHI (ANP) - Een dag na een Pakistaanse proef met een kernraket, heeft aartsrivaal India woensdag een test gedaan met een soortgelijke raket. De proef is succesvol verlopen, meldde het Indiase ministerie van Defensie.
Het land schoot twee zelfgemaakte Prithvi II-raketten af vanaf een testcentrum in Chandipu-aan-zee in het oosten van India. De raketten kunnen 350 kilometer ver reiken en kunnen een gewone of een kernbom dragen. India had het wapen op 24 september voor het laatst getest. Toen ging de lancering echter niet door wegens technische problemen.
,,De Prithvi II-raket heeft zijn robuustheid en precisie bewezen'', zei het Indiase ministerie.
Pakistan testte dinsdag met succes haar Hatf V, die geschikt is voor een atoombom.

description.hltext_display: 女捐千冊英文童書 當耶誕禮物
description.content:
因為自認是國語文普及教育的受惠者，吳艷霞一直想回饋。旅居美國期間，吳艷霞收藏不少英文童書，她今天捐出1500本給基隆市文化中心圖書館，當作小朋友的耶誕禮物。
吳艷霞說，因為台北市的老市長游彌堅在台灣光復初期努力推行國語文普及教育，並創立出版社，翻譯西方兒童經典名著，讓她的童年在大量閱讀的樂趣中成長。
後來，吳艷霞從東吳大學英文系畢業，到美國深造，研究英語教學，吳艷霞一直想為台灣的國小英語教育做些什麼。
在美國，吳艷霞見到兒時讀物的原文書，非常開心，遇到就買，「買書像買菜一樣」。她認為，英文童書圖文並茂，可讓小朋友學英文「不那麼痛苦」。
為什麼要捐給基隆市？吳艷霞說，回台後，第1個工作就是到基隆海洋大學任教，「人不親土親」，加上基隆人口少，小學生約有3萬人，因此她選擇從基隆開始推動英語教學。
值得一提的是，1500本、價值約新台幣65萬元的原文書籍，運費全由海大名譽教授林光贊助。林光說，他從海大畢業，深造回國又在海大任教，待了40多年，算是「半個基隆人」，當他得知吳艷霞的計畫後，毫不猶豫就答應了。
基隆市長張通榮、基隆市文化局長張建祥中午頒發感謝狀給吳艷霞和林光。吳艷霞說，1500本原文書希望是送給基隆市兒童最有意義的耶誕節禮物。991222

description.hltext_display: Подпольная пекарня обнаружена в Иркутске
Volatility in bond market to continue in 2011 with RBI`s fight against inflation: Shriram Ramanathan
description.content:
Source: IRIS (22-DEC-10)
Comments | Post Comment
Shriram Ramanathan, Fund Manager - Fixed Income, Fidelity Mutual Fund, said, ``India`s economic growth has been robust across most sectors despite the global turmoil and is likely to beat the 8.5% mark in FY 2010-11. Inflation remains above RBI`s comfort zone, albeit significantly lower than the peak double digit levels seen during 2010. A combination of supply and demand side factors has still kept inflation at an elevated level, and it is likely to remain the primary concern for the central bank in its policy formulation for the coming year.
The central bank, after a somewhat delayed start to the tightening process in 2010, accelerated the pace of rate hikes and liquidity tightening in the second half of the year, pushing up short rates by 300- 400bps. While the full impact of these measures on growth would be seen over the course of the coming quarters, we expect to see some more tightening measures by the RBI through the course of 2011 to get inflation within its comfort zone.
The key uncertainty stems from the global macro environment, where super easy policy adopted particularly by the US Fed has resulted in a rising trend for commodity prices - potentially impacting both India`s inflation and current account deficit.
For the Indian bond markets, volatility is likely to continue into 2011 with the central bank`s fight against inflation keeping the markets guessing on the extent of further tightening. However, with the effective front loaded tightening by the central bank, market yields discounting a fair bit of inflation worries and more importantly real rates finally moving into positive territory, we believe that returns from the fixed income market are likely to be attractive for investors with a medium term horizon.``

description.hltext_display: Opsving lader vente på sig
description.content:
22. december 2010 / Indland
Efter pæne stigninger i starten af året viser ITD’s konjunkturindeks for årets 3. kvartal 2010 en stagnation i lastbiltrafikken over grænserne i forhold til samme kvartal sidste år.
Lastbiltrafikken over landegrænserne lå i årets 3. kvartal på niveau med samme periode sidste år, men i forhold til 2. kvartal 2010 var der tale om en nedgang i trafikken på 5,2 procent.
Det er østeuropæiske lastbiler, der taber terræn på de danske veje. Sammenlignet med 1. kvartal 2010 kan den samlede lastbiltrafik over landegrænserne dog stadig noteres for en pæn fremgang på 3,9 procent.
Det er stadig tysk indregistrerede lastbiler, som med 42,2 procent står for den største andel af den samlede mængde lastbiltrafik til Danmark. Danske lastbiler har 23,6 procent mod de østeuropæiske 17,4 procent

description.hltext_display: 戶籍法將修正 查證親等更便利
description.content:
立法院內政委員會今天初審通過戶籍法修正草案，過去民眾辦理器官移植或繼承登記時，須備妥親等關聯資料。修正草案規定，內政部可以透過電腦系統，提供親等資料，手續更便民。
過去民眾要辦理人工生殖、器官捐贈、繼承登記時，必須由申請戶籍謄本後，再依各主管機關需求，填報相關文件，辦理的手續非常繁雜。除此之外，目前戶政事務所受理民眾查詢親等關聯資料，是以戶為單位，查證時間冗長，也容易衍生疏漏。
內政部民政司長謝愛齡今天在內政委員會答詢表示，人工生殖法規定受術夫妻不得為直系血親、直系姻親、4等親內的旁系血親，過去民眾要先申請所有4等親的戶籍謄本，再填妥其他所需文件才能完成辦理。
謝愛齡說，戶籍法修正草案秉持便民理念，未來戶政司可以運用現行戶籍資料，透過電腦資訊系統連結親屬關係，直接提供人民親等關聯資料。
戶籍法修正草案第65條之1明定，人民辦理人工生殖、捐贈器官、繼承登記，或要取得中華民國國籍，都有待查證親屬關係的需要，可以向各地戶政事務所申請。

description.hltext_display: Ligue 1. Le TFC veut finir l'année en beauté
description.content:
Dernière journée aller. Valenciennes-TFC ce soir à 19 heures.
Rendez-vous sur le terrain. C'est grosso modo le discours que tiennent les Valenciennois depuis samedi soir et leur défaite malheureuse à Rennes, avant la venue du TFC au stade Nungesser tout à l'heure.
Au menu, les duels.
Le TFC s'attend à un match compliqué ce soir. «Ils vont être déterminés, très motivés», acquiesce Alain Casanova. «C'est une équipe aggressive, qui joue direct, beaucoup de longs ballons qui te mettent la pression», avance Etienne Capoue.
«Il n'y aura pas beaucoup de jeu», pronostique le joueur, «mais ça va se jouer à l'aggressivité, au mental, dans les duels, ça ne me dérange pas».
Sauf que les Téfécistes n'apprécient guère de jouer sous la pression. Un aspect à corriger, sous peine d'une grosse désillusion ce soir.
Le retour aux fondamentaux.
«Depuis un petit moment, on joue plus sur la récupération et la transition offensive, on essaie d'être moins porté sur la possession du ballon et la production d'un jeu qui suppose beaucoup de risques», reconnaît volontiers l'entraîneur du TFC, dont l'équipe vient de prendre neuf points sur douze, après une série de trois défaites qui l'avaient fragilisée.
«On faisait du jeu, mais ça ne menait à pas grand chose. On a essayé de retrouver nos fondamentaux, c'est à dire de ne pas prendre de but, et aussi forcer notre chance, on l'a bien vu contre Lorient», confirme Etienne Capoue. Sur leurs quatre derniers matches, les Toulousains n'ont encaissé que trois buts, à Auxerre et à Lyon.
Les forces en présence.
«Il vaut toujours mieux une défense stable, qui a trouvé ses automatismes. Mais il y a tellement d'absences qu'il faut s'adapter», note, fataliste, Alain Casanova.
Suuit la longue liste des absents, Pelé (gardien), Cetto et M'Bengue (défense), Tabanou (défense-milieu), Braaten (milieu-attaquant), Pentecôte (attaquant). On les reverra en janvier prochain, pour la plupart... «On a les qualités et le groupe pour finir dans les cinq premiers, on en a très envie, et on veut confirmer à Valenciennes qu'on a fait une bonne première partie de saison, malgré tous les absents», précise Capoue, aussi ambitieux que serein.
Sur la feuille de match.
Tabanou arrêté pour plusieurs semaines, Alain Casanova devrait reconduire l'équipe qui a terminé contre Lorient samedi soir. «On a la chance d'avoir Congré. Sa grande polyvalence nous permet de couvrir tous les postes, c'est un luxe qui n'a pas de prix», apprécie Casanova qui souligne encore la facilité d'adaptation de Capoue («ça ne me gêne pas», répond l'intéressé) et le retour en forme de Fofana. A Valenciennes, Philippe Montanier n'a guère le choix, comme depuis le début de la saison. Avec 8 blessés, il est dans la fourchette de la saison (de 7 à 12)...

description.hltext_display: 高市債臺高築 每人負債5萬
description.content:
高雄縣市12 月25日合併，合併後的高市府非自償債務約新台幣1410 億元，平均每名市民負債5萬900元；不過，合併後的高雄市總資產含土地、建物設備等有1兆816億元。
高市府現任財政局長雷仲達不諱言財政問題，他說，高雄市依法舉債，舉債制度高雄縣、市不同。他說，市府正在執行「十年財政收支平衡計畫」，從民國94年開始降低歲出、入短差數額。經過多年管控，他盼民國103年財政收支平衡，屆時高雄市就有更多的償債能力。
高市府統計，截至民國97年11月底，高雄市1年以上非自償債務累積未償餘額共有1268億7000萬元、高雄縣是142億2000萬元。平均每個高雄縣民負債約1萬7000元、高雄市人均負債約9萬元；縣市合併後人均負債是5萬900元。
資料顯示，高雄市97年度歲出預算數是712億7000萬元、高雄縣是399億8000萬元。
歲入方面，中央統籌分配款是縣市政府重要的財源之一；高雄市去年獲得132億元、高雄縣69億元；中央專案補助方面，高雄市獲得100億元、高雄縣0元，不過在一般性補助款方面，高雄市得到9億元、高雄縣有93億元挹注。總計民國98年，高雄市獲得中央補助款共241億元、高雄縣共162億元。
另外，市府統計，民國96年縣、市府的人事支出都占總預算51%以上；高市社福支出占14%、高縣占11% ；高市教育支出占29%、高縣占30%。

description.hltext_display: National. Luzenac et Rodez : Papa Noël, une victoire, SVP
description.content:
Der de l'année à Paul-Fédou pour Hergault et ses copains./Photo DDM. Michel Viala.
US Luzenac-Colmar, ce soir à 20 heures, stade Paul-Fédou.
Face au 19e du championnat, qui n'a gagné que deux matches (dont le dernier le… 21 août face à Rodez) et marqué que 9 buts, on pourrait croire que tout autre résultat qu'une victoire serait une mauvaise opération pour les Ariégeois. Vrai.
Pourtant, la méfiance règne du côté de Christophe Pélissier et ses hommes. Sur leurs sept derniers matches, les « rouge et bleu » n'ont en effet gagné qu'une seule fois (Cannes, 1-0). Après des rendez-vous haut de gamme (Guingamp, Cannes, Strasbourg, Bastia, Niort), les Ariégeois retrouvent des équipes du bas de classement.
Et même si beaucoup considèrent Colmar comme condamné, il n'en est pas de même pour Christophe Pélissier. « Dans ce championnat, il n'y a aucun match facile. Ils n'ont pas joué depuis un mois et seront prêts à nous affronter. »
Rentrés frustrés de Corse, les Ariégeois rêvent de l'emporter et d'atteindre la barre symbolique des 30 points à la trêve. Histoire de passer les « fêtes au chaud. »
Rodez AF-Guingamp, ce soir à 20 heures, stade Paul-Lignon.
Le RAF devra impérativement battre le deuxième du championnat, ce soir, pour s'éloigner quelque peu de la zone de relégation. Pour autant, avec la venue de Guingamp, deuxième de la compétition (budget 8 M€), le RAF avec son 1,1M€ de budget semble bien modeste. Il faudra chercher d'autres valeurs pour relever le défi sportif d'une équipe bretonne sortant d'une défaite à domicile contre Amiens 2 à 0. Ces valeurs seront le courage, le combat, une attitude de « guerriers » comme l'estime Julien Lorthioir, attaquant reconverti avec brio au poste de latéral vendredi dernier à Cannes. « Notre maintien ne s'obtiendra que par un engagement de tous durant 90 minutes ». C'est aussi le message du président Pierre-Olivier Murat. Pour autant, il faudra compter avec Guingamp dont les capacités à voyager sont certaines. Afin de contrer les Bretons, Rodez devrait attaquer la rencontre avec conviction. C'est ce qu'espèrent les spectateurs de Paul-Lignon amoureux passionnés de ce style de football qui ont peu reçu en 2010. Ce soir, leur Rodez saura-t-il les contenter ?
Quoi qu'il en soit le retour d'Alet dans l'effectif ou le maintien du jeune Delmas, seront les présences fortes de jeunes footballeurs capables d'apporter au RAF le dynamisme attendu.

description.hltext_display: Parkering blir dyrere
description.author: Anna Kappler
description.content:
P4 (Lillehammer): Det blir dyrere å parkere i Trondheim neste år.
Trondheim Parkering må i 2011 bidra med å betale 58 millioner kroner til bykassen og for å klare dette må prisen på gateparkering opp, skriver Adressa. Den første timen med parkering øker prisen med 10 prosent, til 22 kroner, mens de to neste timene øker med to kroner. Også boligsoneparkeringen blir dyrere.
P4 ønsker å gi stort rom for ulike meninger, men oppleves dette innlegget støtende eller ulovlig, skriv en kort begrunnelse og trykk send.

description.hltext_display: 汽車DNA 嘉警破解體工廠
description.content:
嘉義市警察局以科技辦案，日前根據汽車DNA防盜辨識碼，破獲一宗汽車解體工廠，警方今天在刑事鑑識實驗室揭幕典禮中，當場展示以汽車DNA防盜辨識碼破案的工具。
警方表示，以往竊賊在偷得車輛後，都會將車身號碼及引擎號碼磨掉，讓警方無法據此追蹤車籍資料，因此往往造成警方偵辦上的困難。
但是，自民國96年以後出廠的新車，幾乎都噴貼有汽車DNA 防盜辨識碼，業者將車廠名稱、製造地點、車身號碼、引擎號碼等資料，以雷射噴印方式，濃縮在1個直徑不到1 毫米的晶片上，再以隨機方式，噴貼在所有零件上，每輛車最多可以噴貼7000多個DNA 防盜辨識碼。
嘉義市警局鑑識課表示，這種汽車DNA 防盜辨識碼抗磨、耐熱，不容易除去，由於直徑不到1 毫米，因此用肉眼難以察覺，歹徒即使發現，也很難將晶片磨掉。
警方是在日前偵辦一起號稱南台灣最大的汽車解體工廠案時，以高倍數的數位顯微鏡，經過細心比對，才從汽車DNA 防盜辨識碼中記載的車籍資料，順利破案，成為全國首宗由警方自行辨識汽車DNA 防盜辨識碼破案的案例。
警方指出，科技辦案講求的是證據，嘉義市警局成立刑事鑑識實驗室，就是希望以最新的科技及方法，為打擊犯罪注入新的能量與活力。991222

description.hltext_display: 陳雲林話別 願盡力協商投保
description.content:
大陸海峽兩岸關係協會會長陳雲林今天在話別時表示，兩會商談還有很多重要課題，在前進的道路上，還會有一些困難和阻礙，但任何阻礙改變不了兩岸和平發展的大趨勢。
陳雲林說，這次商談簽署了兩岸醫藥衛生合作協議，並為另一個重要協議(兩岸投資保障協議)進行階段性總結，達成共識，雙方將盡最大努力，在不久的將來完成協商。
財團法人海峽交流基金會原訂上午11時50分在台北圓山飯店舉行話別談話會，但因班機時間延後，因此談話會延至12時30分舉行。
海基會董事長江丙坤表示，這次兩會簽署的「海峽兩岸醫藥衛生合作協議」，是從人道關懷出發，以兩岸人民的健康福祉為依歸。
他說，今年透過兩岸交流，有超過600萬人次往來兩岸從事觀光、商務等活動，透過疫病的通報、緊急救護制度的建立，對兩岸人民的生命安全提供進一步保障。同時，也有機會透過兩岸合作，優勢互補，在醫藥衛生方面發展新商機，共創雙贏。
江丙坤表示，明年在兩會繼續推動協商交流下，繼續完成未完的許多協議，也將推動兩岸民間交流，希望透過這些交流和協商，讓兩岸民眾共享成果。
他說，海基會將在兩會建構的平台上，繼續推動平等協商，循序漸進，擱置爭議、追求雙贏。
陳雲林表示，第6次兩會商談，我們是帶著希望和期待而來，帶著成果而歸，為能夠讓兩岸和平發展寫下新的歷史而感到高興，為讓兩岸民眾身體健康、生命安全做出努力，感到無限欣慰。
他說，兩會商談未來還有許多重要課題，在前進的道路上，還會有一些困難和阻礙，但任何阻礙只能夠阻止進程的時間，永遠改變不了兩岸和平發展的大趨勢。
陳雲林對圓山飯店的熱情接待，以及負責維安的員警表達感激之意。他說，這次到台北的情況與上次有很大不同，員警的敬業精神，給他留下深刻的印象。 陳雲林表示，兩會簽署的15項協議和達成兩項共識，得到相當多台灣人民的理解和支持。未來將不辜負兩岸人民期待，繼續為兩岸人民謀福祉。
海基會副董事長高孔廉、副秘書長馬紹章，大陸海協會常務副會長鄭立中、執行副會長兼秘書長李亞飛、駐會副會長李炳才、副秘書長張勝林等出席談話會。
陳雲林離開飯店前，現場響起陣陣掌聲，飯店人員熱情歡送，高喊「再見！歡迎再來！」。
海峽交流基金會和大陸海峽兩岸關係協會的制度性協商，由海基會董事長江丙坤和海協會會長陳雲林主談，通稱「江陳會」。

description.hltext_display: Politically Motivated Cyberattacks Rising
description.content:
Web sites posting controversial materials or promoting human rights are up against rising numbers of politically motivated cyberattacks, U.S. researchers say.
Harvard University researchers who conducted the computer attack survey identified almost 300 attempts to silence independent media and human rights Web sites over the past year, NewScientist.com reported Tuesday.
"There is almost always a political component to these attacks," Jillian York, one of the report's authors, says.
The researchers focused on distributed denial of service attacks such as the one that temporarily crashed the WikiLeaks Web site last month.
Cyberattackers direct a flood of connections at a target Web site until the site, or the network that connects it to the Internet, goes down under the strain of the masses of incoming data.
While the WikiLeaks attacks were characterized as a new and dangerous attempt to limit free speech, they are anything but new, the Harvard team says.
York and her colleagues say they identified 140 attacks aimed at 280 media and human rights sites during the 12-month period ending in August.

event_or_fact.property: There is almost always a political component to these attacks

description.hltext_display: Prada: ricompra immobili per 50 mln (MF)
description.content:
MILANO (MF)--Ritorno a casa per Prada. Superata la fase piu' critica, il
gruppo del lusso di Patrizio Bertelli e Miuccia Prada ricompra alcuni
degli immobili che aveva ceduto nel gennaio del 2005 al fondo Spazio
Industriale con un'operazione di sale & lease back, cioe' vendita e
riaffitto degli stessi edifici.
A essere riacquistati, si legge in un articolo di MF, sono i due edifici
di Montevarchi, e quelli di Arezzo e Montegranaro, che oggi ospitano gli
impianti piu' avanzati del gruppo, cedute all'epoca a Spazio Industriale,
fondo immobiliare chiuso gestito da Prelios sgr. I quattro immobili
(66.240 metri quadrati di superficie) insieme ad altri tre erano stati
ceduti per 77 mln euro, e ora vengono ricomprati, senza maggiorazioni, per
50 mln.

description.hltext_display: Richtingloze handel op Europese markten
description.content:
AMSTERDAM (ANP) - De Europese aandelenbeurzen openden woensdag vlak bij gebrek aan richtinggevend nieuws. Volgens handelaren is het onderliggende sentiment echter positief, mede dankzij goede macro-economische cijfers en overnamenieuws dat dinsdag naar buiten kwam.
Kort na de opening noteerde de AEX-index van meest verhandelde fondsen in Amsterdam 0,1 procent hoger op 356,40 punten. De MidKap-index van middelgrote fondsen was onveranderd en stond op 634,10 punten. Ook in Frankfurt, Londen en Parijs stonden de graadmeters onveranderd.
Chemieconcern DSM (min 0,3 procent) was een van de sterkste dalers in de AEX. Amerikaanse advocatenkantoren onderzoeken of DSM de aandeelhouders van Martek Biosciences genoeg betaalt voor hun stukken. Na de aankondiging dinsdag van de overname voor circa 1,1 miljard dollar steeg het aandeel DSM 3,9 procent.

description.hltext_display: 中菲貿易前10月成長逾4成
description.content:
在中國與東南亞國家協會（ASEAN）自由貿易協定（FTA）上路之後，中國與菲律賓的經貿關係更加密切。今年前10個月，雙邊貿易總額達到227億美元，成長40.2%。
中國駐菲國大使劉建超今天在記者會上說，中國與東協FTA於1月正式啟動，雙邊將近有9成的7000項貨物享受零關稅待遇，同時服務業貿易協定與投資協定也陸續跟進。
根據中國大使館的資料，今年前10個月，中國對菲出口總額是94億美元，成長40%；中國自菲進口總額為133億美元，成長40.4%，菲國享有貿易順差。
中國現為菲國的第3大貿易夥伴。
在投資方面，今年前9個月中國對菲國投資為7300萬美元，較去年同期成長316%，成長幅度居東協地區第2高。菲國對中國投資達6300萬美元，成長177%。
劉建超表示，中國明年將啟動社會經濟方案，加強內需、投資與出口，這可為包括菲律賓在內的鄰國提供合作機會，特別是在農業、採礦業、發電業和環保等方面。
新聞來源：中央社

description.hltext_display: Straffer elektronikk-kjedene
description.author: Mona Tiller
description.content:
P4 (Oslo): Nesten fire av ti nordmenn sier de vil unngå å handle på for eksempel Elkjøp som følge av avsløringene om at elektronikkkjedene bevisst skrur opp prisene før jul.
Det kommer fram i en meningsmåling InFact har utført for VG. Nærmere 40 prosent sier de vil unngå å handle i de største elektronikkjedene i framtiden, mens over 33 prosent sier de vil unngå å handle småelektriske varer i ukene før jul.
P4 ønsker å gi stort rom for ulike meninger, men oppleves dette innlegget støtende eller ulovlig, skriv en kort begrunnelse og trykk send.
Send Avbryt
Mye av bråket om lokalsykehusene de siste ukene kunne vært unngått med en egen nasjonal plan for sykehusene.
