description.hltext_display: 芒果“新年合家欢” 创新节目充实首个播出季
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 湖南卫视2011年主打四个播出季概念，目前，已经为1、2月推出的“新年合家欢季”准备好四大创新节目和大量电视剧集。随着新年的到来，湖南卫视也将主打家庭亲情牌，正式拉开“新年合家欢”大幕。 2011年，湖南卫视在丰富内容的基础上，将推出全新“播出季”：1、2月是“新年合家欢季”，集结元旦、春节、寒假的节目优势，汇集贺岁大片、节庆晚会；3、4、5月是“幸福生活季”，播出家庭伦理长剧和真人秀节目；6、7、8月是“青春偶像季”，制作播出大型选秀、自制偶像剧等；9、10、11、12月是 “金色梦想季”，将推出系列创新节目和年度大戏。
为了在元旦过后推出第一个播出季，湖南卫视目前正在紧锣密鼓地筹备新节目。据悉，元旦过后将正式播出《给力星期天》、《非常靠谱》、《喜剧之王》、《好奇大调查》等四档定位各不相同、满足各个阶层群众需要的节目。此外，在元旦、春节、元宵等节日，湖南卫视也将制作播出跨年演唱会、春节联欢晚会、元宵喜乐会等大型晚会，与观众一起欢度传统佳节。
创新节目“合家欢”：五大晚会四大创新栏目1月开始陆续登场
记者获悉，“新年合家欢季”已经筹备了丰富的节目内容。除了1月1日晚零点的跨年演唱会、当晚7点半的《快乐大本营特别节目》、1月2日晚的《金芒果粉丝节》、1月27日晚小年夜的春晚、2月17日晚的《元宵喜乐会》等五台大型晚会以外，四大创新栏目1月开始陆续登场。
前不久传出汪涵在录制现场流鼻血的《非常靠谱》，将作为该季首推的第一档创新节目，在1月初播出。该节目将以“百姓主题、群英摆谱”的方式，为观众解读姓氏文化。从2011年1月3日开始，该节目将于每周一晚2025播出。
在周五播出《天天向上》、周六播出《快乐大本营》的基础上，湖南卫视2011年将重点在周日打造综艺节目《给力星期天》。作为一档全新的青春偶像艺能榜样互动秀节目，《给力星期天》第一季将启用《一起来看流星雨》的男主角张翰、魏晨、朱梓骁等作为主持。此外，来自台湾地区的天王级全能艺人庾澄庆也已经正式加盟该节目。该节目将从2011年初开始，每周日晚19：30 播出。
主打“新年合家欢”季的另一档生活喜剧创意SHOW《喜剧之王》，由前央视著名节目主持人刘仪伟主持。据制片人廖珂透露，这档节目旨在整合全球最一流的表演团体，打造最为开放和自由的喜剧平台，挖掘最具潜力的年轻表演者和表演内容。节目共分“喜剧全能”、“喜剧超现实”、“喜剧大赏”三个单元。从2011年初开始，《喜剧之王》将在每周四晚830播出。
全新娱乐纪实类节目《好奇大调查》将作为“新年合家欢季”的日播节目播出，定位为“娱乐纪实类节目”，主要通过娱乐、趣味的方式，对诸如“加油站能不能打手机”、“是否真的存在迷魂烟”、“六度空间理论是否成立”等生活中各类大家感兴趣的问题和话题进行验证，并找出最终答案。主持人由曾经《晚间》的黄金搭档张丹丹、李锐，再次携手主持，“音乐才子”谭杰希也会以助理主持的身份加盟。该节目将从年初开始，每周一至周五1800播出。
电视剧“合家欢”：三部国产大戏连续登陆
湖南卫视在选择电视剧方面一向具有独到眼光，对于2011开年大戏，早已经预备下丰富大餐。与以往有所区别的是，本年度开年大戏将在三部国产大剧中产生。
2010年，湖南卫视已经囤积了自制的多部电视剧，此次入围开年的是古装穿越情感大戏《宫》、都市生活情感大戏《8090向前冲》以及唯美深情偶像剧《一不小心爱上你》。
《一不小心爱上你》是李湘领衔的芒果影业主推的力作，与多年前的韩剧《蓝色生死恋》有异曲同工之妙。故事从两个被抱错了的女孩子开始，因为这次阴差阳错，秦晴和米莉的命运发生了天翻地覆的变化。秦朗和秦晴本是一对幸福快乐的兄妹，可是命运沉淀的故事改变了他们的一生，两人间的“兄妹恋”是纠结全剧故事的最大看点。
《宫》是湖南广电首次尝试制作的古装穿越剧，杨幂主演的考古系少女洛晴川通过一次偶然的机会穿越到了清朝，成为太子的宫女，与八阿哥和四阿哥经历了一场生死爱恋。经过九死一生，晴川回到了现代，她更加懂得去珍惜一切，并学会宽容别人，看淡得失。她一边研究历史，一边照顾生病的父亲，在偶然的街头，她遇见了一个跟八阿哥长得一模一样的现代男子，爱情故事再次完美上演……
《8090向前冲》是类似于《奋斗》题材的一部青春偶像剧和励志片，讲的是80后的年轻人对待爱情和事业的态度。蒋天涯和夏志刚读大学时是最好的朋友。蒋天涯出生知识分子家庭，叛逆而自我。夏志刚家在农村，发愤读书十余年，终于考上了大学。两个毕业后经历了一系列生活变化，最终找到了自己的存在意义……
除了这三部精彩情感剧集将亮相新年荧屏之外，湖南卫视还预备了大量引进剧目，也将逐步上演。

description.hltext_display: 臧世凯：开创未成年人思想道德建设新局面
description.content:
2010年12月09日05时54分 中安在线-安徽日报
12月8日，全国未成年人思想道德建设工作视讯会议在北京召开。省委常委、宣传部长、省文明委常务副主任臧世凯出席安徽分会场会议并讲话。他强调，各地各部门要切实把未成年人思想道德建设纳入重要议事日程，纳入经济社会发展规划，纳入科学发展考评体系，确保认识到位、领导到位、措施到位，推动形成全社会人人关心、人人支持未成年人思想道德建设的生动局面。
臧世凯指出，安徽省作为劳务大省，留守儿童、流动儿童数量庞大，未成年人占全省总人口比重近四分之一，做好未成年人思想道德建设工作责任重大，使命崇高。各地各部门要把未成年人思想道德建设作为战略工程、民心工程和希望工程，按照“抓好是本职、不抓是失职、抓不好是不称职”的工作要求，集成资源、集中力量、集聚优势，坚持标本兼治，保持工作常态，抓紧抓实抓细，多办实事好事，让群众看到实际成效。各级文明委要切实负起统一规划、组织协调、督促检查、加强指导的重要职责，完善协调机制，加强沟通交流，发挥整体合力。
臧世凯强调，加强和改进未成年人思想道德建设是一项长期的战略任务。要着力完善科学化的考评机制，建立定期测评制度，注重经常性工作，注重群众的评价，推动未成年人思想道德建设工作走上规范化、制度化的轨道。要努力构建多元化的保障机制，紧紧抓住编制“十二五”规划的重要契机，争取一批未成年人思想道德建设的重点项目、关键工程列入“十二五”规划的总盘子，积极支持、鼓励有关部门提供更多更好的文化产品和文化服务，努力把安徽省未成年人思想道德建设工作提高到一个新水平。
省净化社会文化环境协调领导小组成员单位负责同志参加会议。 (记者黄永礼)

description.hltext_display: Casillas y figo apadrinan mañana un partido de fútbol solidario
description.content: El portero del Real Madrid y de la selección española, Iker Casillas, y el ex futbolista portugués Luis Figo apadrinan el "Partido por la ilusión. Fútbol 7 solidario", un encuentro que se celebrará mañana, jueves, en Madrid con el fin de recaudar fondos para proyectos solidarios. Casillas y Figo firmaron hace unos días en el Consejo Superior de Deportes (CSD) el acuerdo para la celebración del encuentro, junto a Jaime Lissavetzky, secretario de Estado para el Deporte, y César Gallo, vicepresidente de la Fundación Repsol, patrocinadora del evento. El partido se disputará en el Palacio de los Deportes de la Comunidad de Madrid, donde Casillas y Figo capitanearán a dos equipos de futbolistas en activo y retirados, así como representantes del mundo de la cultura. El entrenador del Getafe, José Miguel González "Míchel", dirigirá al equipo de Figo, mientras que el seleccionador español, Vicente del Bosque, hará lo propio con el de Casillas. El 50% de la taquilla del partido se destinará al Mundialito de la Inmigración y de la Solidaridad, que se disputará en varias localidades de Madrid durante tres meses de 2011; un 25% a la Fundación Luis Figo, y el 25% restante a la nueva Fundación Iker Casillas. La Fundación Luis Figo trabaja desde 2003 en favor de los jóvenes portugueses en proyectos de educación, salud, integración social y deporte. Por su parte, Casillas registrará próximamenmte su fundación. El precio de las entradas para asistir al partido es de 11 euros para los adultos y 7 euros para los niños.

description.hltext_display: Dioxin levels safe in Ireland
description.content:
The latest Irish Environment Protection Agency (EPA) report on dioxin levels shows that dioxin levels in Ireland are well below EU safety limits.
The report is based on 2009 testing and shows that measurements are back to acceptable levels since the 2008 feed contamination incident.
In 2008, dioxin contamination led to supermarkets removing Irish pork from the shelves.
The incident was traced back to animal feed supplied by Millstream Power Recycling Ltd, County Carlow which has been tainted with industrial oil.
Dioxins arise mainly as unintentional by-products of incomplete combustion and from certain chemical processes. They contaminate the environment as a by-product of activities such as burning of household waste, chlorine bleaching of wood pulp and cement kilns and coal fired power plants.
Some dioxins have little environmental significance but some possess high levels of toxicity and result in immunotoxicity and carcinogenicity, as well as reproductive and developmental toxicity.
The data is based on samples taken from the milk of grazing cows and the results compare Ireland favourably with the EU and other countries.
EPA Office of Environmental Assessment regional chemist, Dr. Colman Concannon, said: "The concentrations of dioxins were low by international standards and comparisons.
"A total of 37 samples were taken and the average level was less than 10% of the EU limit. This is the 7th such survey undertaken by the EPA since 1995 and the results are in line with the earlier studies.
"The survey confirms the continuing low levels of dioxins and dioxin-like substances in the Irish environment."
Source: edie newsroom

event_or_fact.property: The concentrations of dioxins were low by international standards and comparisons.
regional chemist, EPA Office of Environmental Assessment

description.hltext_display: 周杰伦新任绯闻女友一夕暴红 过往情事遭曝光(图)(5)
Intesa Sanpaolo: Bazoli si confronta coi soci sul piano (MF)
description.content:
MILANO (MF-DJ)--Il presidente del consiglio di sorveglianza di Intesa
Sanpaolo, Giovanni Bazoli, torna a sottolineare il ruolo chiave delle
Fondazioni nel sostegno del sistema bancario italiano e annuncia che gli
enti azionisti della Ca' de Sass saranno consultati in vista della
definizione del piano di impresa della banca, che dovrebbe essere pronto
entro l'estate. "Adesso che c'e' il piano industriale", ha detto Bazoli,
"e' chiaro che sentiremo anche le Fondazioni per stabilire quali sono le
linee".
Il presidente di Intesa Sanpaolo, si legge in un articolo di MF, ha
inoltre escluso che l'istituto possa avere bisogno di aumentare il
capitale al fine di adeguarsi ai requisiti di Basilea 3. "In questo
momento non e' assolutamente prevista una cosa del genere" ha tagliato
corto Bazoli. Per quanto riguarda invece la possibilita' che Jean Paul
Fitoussi lasci il consiglio di sorveglianza di Intesa Sanpaolo dopo la
decisione del Credit Agricole di procedere a uno smobilizzo, anche se non
immediato, della quota nella banca italiana, Bazoli ha commentato:
"vedremo. La mia personale valutazione e' che un consigliere non ha
vincolo di mandato, quindi non vedo ragioni per cui dovrebbe dare le
dimissioni".
Lo scioglimento dell'intreccio tra Ca' de Sass e la banque verte arriva,
forse nemmeno tanto per caso, nel momento in cui l'Antitrust si appresta a
dare il via libera alla riorganizzazione delle attivita' assicurative
della banca italiana.

description.hltext_display: 臧世凯：为加速崛起兴皖富民营造良好舆论环境
description.content:
2010年12月11日05时48分 中安在线-安徽日报
12月10日，全省宣传部长座谈会在肥召开。会议总结回顾“十一五”工作，深入谋划“十二五”特别是明年工作的主要思路和总体布局。省委常委、宣传部长臧世凯强调，要认真贯彻十七届五中全会和省委八届十三次全会精神，为推进科学发展、全面转型、加速崛起、兴皖富民大业营造良好舆论环境。
在听取各市党委宣传部长发言后，臧世凯充分肯定各地宣传思想文化工作取得的成绩。他指出，当前正处在“十一五”收官、“十二五”开局的关键时期，要按照中央和省委的要求，认真落实全国宣传部长座谈会提出的各项重点任务，突出抓好学习型党组织建设、形势政策宣传教育、互联网建设管理、文化改革发展规划纲要编制等工作，同时，要科学谋划，精心组织实施好今后五年特别是明年的宣传思想文化工作，确保开好局、起好步。
臧世凯强调，“十二五”是安徽全面建设小康社会的关键期、工业化城镇化的加速期、经济社会发展的转型期，需要更加有力的舆论支持，呼唤更为良好的舆论环境。各级宣传部门要强化舆论引导工作，不断提高传统媒体和新兴媒体管理的科学化水平，做到敢于管理，善于引导。要加强和改进对热点问题和突发事件的报道，完善快速反应机制，及时准确发布权威正面信息，努力消除和化解不和谐因素，发挥弘扬社会正气、通达社情民意、引导社会热点、疏导公众情绪的作用，维护社会和谐稳定。各级各类媒体都要牢牢把握正确导向，坚持团结稳定鼓劲、正面宣传为主的方针，自觉围绕中心，有效服务大局，精心组织重大主题、重大活动、重大典型的宣传，巩固扩大健康向上的主流舆论，展示安徽朝气蓬勃、奋发图强、开放崛起的崭新形象。 (记者李跃波)
编辑: 汪赛霞
・

description.hltext_display: Hochwasser in Los Angeles - Orkan im Anzug
description.content: Los Angeles (dpa) - Nach anhaltenden Regenfällen mit Überschwemmungen wird der Süden Kaliforniens auch von orkanartigen Stürmen bedroht. Das nationale US-Wetteramt hat für Los Angeles und die Region eine Sturmwarnung ausgegeben. Die Evakuierung besonders gefährdeter Regionen werde vorbereitet, berichtet die «Los Angeles Times». Durch die schweren Regenfälle drohe Flutgefahr auch in den ebenen Gebieten rund um die Millionenmetropole.

description.hltext_display: 獲利佳 遠銀連2年調薪
description.content:
遠東商銀(2845)今、明2年獲利穩健成長，總經理洪信德表示，今年元月全行都加薪，平均調幅超過5%，明年在獲利成長2位數下，7月有機會再加薪。
法人預估，遠銀今年每股稅後純益 (EPS)有1.2元，明年更可成長至1.5元，洪信德表示，由於去年已經轉虧為盈，擺脫金融海嘯陰霾，因此將年度加薪時間從7月提早至元月。
洪信德表示，目前遠銀的資產報酬率 (ROA)0.6%及股東權益報酬率 (ROE)11%都還有努力空間，年底前資產品質希望能達到呆帳率0.5%以下、覆蓋率200%的目標。
此外，由於遠銀今年持續獲利表現，股東明年也有股利可拿，洪信德說，因商業銀行多項業務可承作規模需以淨值為基準，因此去年起即確立股票股利為主的政策，去年每股配發0.45元股利中，有0.35元股票股利，外界推測，明年每股可望發1元股利，其中也將以股票股利為主。
遠銀董事會通過，將發行5年期、額度2億美元海外可轉債 (ECB)，遠銀表示，除了可藉此取得低利美元外，也可讓資產規模穩定擴大，為未來巴賽爾資本協定做準備，洪信德說，未來每年自然股本擴張的幅度希望都有10%水準。
新聞來源：中央商情

description.hltext_display: Bergquist går mot personlig konkurs
description.content:
Den sparkade vd:n vid numer kraschade minröjningsföretaget Countermine, Christer Bergquist, riskerar personlig konkurs. Det skriver hans juridiska ombud Tom Johansson och Johan Danelius vid advokatbyrån Hamilton i ett yttrande till Stockholms tingsrätt.
I yttrandet, en begäran från 17 december, om att tingsrätten omprövar ett tidigare beslut att belägga tillgångar till ett värde av 30 miljoner kronor med kvarstad, avvisar Christer Bergquist de anklagelser som riktas mot honom i en tidigare inlämnad stämningsansökan.
Stämningen har lämnats in av finansmannen Erik Pensers holdingbolag Yggdrasil tidigare i december. Bakgrunden är att Yggdrasil satsade 30 miljoner kronor i en nyemission i Countermine för ett år sedan och fick se värdet av dessa aktier krypa ner till 1 krona.
Den investeringen hade Yggdrasil aldrig gjort om bolaget känt till vad det menar att Christer Bergquist kände till, menar Yggdrasil. Bolaget hävdar också att Bergquist och bolagets ordförande Björn Wolrath förvanskat och förtigit sanningen om bolagets olika problem när emissionen genomfördes.
Bergquists ombud skriver tvärtom att denne inte har ”medverkat till några överträdelser av redovisningslagstiftningen” och än mindre gjort sig skyldig till brottsliga gärningar.
Christer Bergquist, som tidigare berättat att han planerar att flytta till Portugal av skatteskäl för att skattefritt kunna lyfta sin pension på 30 miljoner kronor, avslöjar nu att Portugalflytten har lagts på is och att risken för att han ska undandra sig eventuella framtida skadeståndskrav därmed ytterligare minskat:
”I sammanhanget kan tilläggas/…/att Bergquists planer på utflyttning till Portugal numera är lagda på is”, skriver juristerna.
Bergquist begär därför att tingsrätten omedelbart upphäver kvarstaden och anför att han ”redan på måndagen den 20 december eller tisdagen 21 december” kommer att utsättas för verkställighetsåtgärder av kronofogden som ”kommer att föranleda irreparabel skada för honom och hans familj (och det dagarna före jul).
Kronofogden har hotat med att tömma Bergquists fastighet på all inredning och bortfrakta den. Konsekvensen av tingsrättens kvarstadsbeslut är således synnerligen allvarliga för Bergquist”, skriver de juridiska ombuden.
Bergquist kritiserar inte bara rättens beslut att belägga hans tillgångar med kvarstad utan pekar samtidigt på risken att han själv riskerar att gå i personlig konkurs samt att den bankgaranti som Yggdrasil deponerat då inte kommer att räcka till för att täcka de skador som han kan drabbas av.
”Kvarstadsbeslutet avser ett belopp som vida överstiger Bergquists tillgångar. Det betyder att Bergquist inte kan förfoga över sina tillgångar överhuvudtaget/…/. Det betyder att han inte kan betala sina skulder framgent . Han löper alltså risk att försättas i personlig konkurs. I en konkurs kommer egendom att avvecklas och det kommer att innefatta en stor förmögenhetsförstöring. Att då tro att Yggdrasils skadeståndsansvar kommer att stanna vid en miljon kr är naivt. Bergquists förlust kommer att vida överstiga detta belopp.”
Bergquists ombud avslutar sin inlaga med det ovanliga påståendet att domaren behöver bytas ut:
”Det kan ifrågasättas om det är lämpligt att samma rådman som fattat beslut om den interimistiska kvarstaden ska pröva Bergquists begäran om omprövning. Rådmannen Hedenmo kan antas ha ett starkt intresse att vilja försvara sitt ifrågasatta beslut./…/Mot den bakgrunden borde målet lottas om och det till en annan avdelning inom tingsrätten.”

description.hltext_display: 周杰伦新任绯闻女友一夕暴红 过往情事遭曝光(图)(4)
SEC durchleuchtet Abgang von HP-Chef Hurd
description.content:
Der spektakuläre Rausschmiss von Hewlett-Packard- Chef Mark Hurd erregt weiter die Gemüter. Die US-Börsenaufsicht SEC ist auf den Fall aufmerksam geworden und sieht sich die Umstände des Abgangs vom August genauer an, wie der weltgrößte Computerhersteller bestätigte.
New York (dpa)
Der überraschenden Abgang hatte den Aktienkurs derart einbrechen lassen, dass er sich seitdem noch nicht wieder erholt hat. «HP unterstützt die SEC in vollem Umfang bei ihren Ermittlungen», ließ das Unternehmen verlautbaren, ohne allerdings in die Details zu gehen.
Das «Wall Street Journal» berichtete, dass die Ermittlungen vor allem um die Frage kreisen, ob Hurd Insiderinformationen ausgeplaudert hat. Die ehemalige externe Mitarbeiterin Jodie Fisher behauptet, Hurd habe ihr verraten, dass HP die Übernahme des IT- Dienstleisters EDS plane. Der Kauf im Jahr 2008 war rund 14 Milliarden Dollar schwer. «Mark hat in allen Belangen sauber gehandelt», sagte sein Sprecher.
Hurd hatte Hewlett-Packard Hals über Kopf verlassen müssen, nachdem eine Liaison mit der ehemaligen Schauspielerin Fisher ans Licht gekommen war. Sie bezichtigte ihn im Nachhinein der sexuellen Belästigung. Hurd widersprach und Ermittlungen von HP brachten keine Verfehlungen ans Tageslicht.
Es sei unklar, ob die SEC am Ende ein Verfahren eröffne, schrieb das «Wall Street Journal». Auch die «Financial Times» (beide Dienstag) zweifelte daran. Die Zeitung gab Passagen aus einem Brief Fishers an den HP-Verwaltungsrat wieder, in dem die Ex-Mitarbeiterin schrieb, sie habe einzig mit ihrer Mutter über den geplanten EDS-Kauf gesprochen. Gleichzeitig beteuerte sie, dass sie keinen Nutzen aus ihrem Wissensvorsprung gezogen habe - erst das wäre strafbar gewesen.
Die SEC schaut sich laut «Wall Street Journal» allerdings zwei weitere Aspekte von Hurds Ausscheiden an: Zum einen geht sie den von HP selbst erhobenen Vorwürfen des Spesenbetrugs auf den Grund. Hurd soll Fisher mehrfach auf Firmenkosten zum Essen eingeladen haben. Zum anderen prüft die Behörde, ob Hurd Material zu seinem Abgang vernichtet hat.
«Es ist klar, dass sich die SEC die Umstände von Marks Weggang anschaut», sagte sein Sprecher. Schließlich sei der Aktienkurs abgestürzt. Hurd hatte HP mit Kosteneinsparungen zu Milliardengewinnen getrieben und den Konzern gleichzeitig durch Zukäufe kräftig ausgebaut. Der Schock bei den Investoren über sein Ausscheiden sitzt so tief, dass sich der Kurs bis heute nicht wieder voll erholt hat - derzeit erreicht er zwar wieder an die 42 Dollar, im früheren Jahresverlauf waren es schon um die 47 Dollar.
Hurds Rausschmiss hatte die ganze Branche bewegt und sorgte für kräftige Verstimmungen zwischen HP und dem Software-Konzern Oracle, der von Hurds Freund Larry Ellison gelenkt wird. Ellison holte Hurd schließlich ins eigene Unternehmen. An der Spitze von HP steht nun der ehemalige SAP-Chef Léo Apotheker.

description.hltext_display: 《營建股》中工標得聯合大學工程，金額3.88億元
Groei Japanse economie zwakt volgend jaar af
description.content:
TOKIO (ANP) - De groei van de Japanse economie zal in het komende gebroken boekjaar 2011/2012 afzwakken tot 1,5 procent. Voor het lopende boekjaar wordt nog gerekend op een economische groei van 3,1 procent. Dat liet de Japanse overheid woensdag weten.
Daarmee groeit de Japanse economie dit lopende boekjaar, dat eind maart afloopt, wel sterker dan eerder werd gedacht. De regering rekende oorspronkelijk voor het boekjaar 2010/2011 op een groei van 2,6 procent.
De afzwakkende economische groei in 2011 houdt vooral verband met de zwakke binnenlandse bestedingen in Japan en het wegebbende effect van de steunmaatregelen. Ook zet de sterke yen de export onder druk. De regering verwacht dat de werkloosheid in Japan volgend jaar zal dalen tot 4,7 procent van de huidige 5 procent.
De Japanse export
Woensdag werd verder bekendgemaakt dat de Japanse export in november voor het eerst in negen maanden weer sterker is toegenomen. De uitvoer klom met 9,1 procent vergeleken met een jaar eerder. In oktober steeg de export nog met 7,8 procent.
Vooral de Japanse export naar andere delen van Azië zat in de lift. De export naar Aziatische landen klom met 13 procent, geleid door China met een exportgroei van 18,3 procent.
De uitvoer
De uitvoer van Japanse producten naar de Europese Unie steeg vorige maand met 10,1 procent. De export richting de Verenigde Staten zwakte in november af tot 1,2 procent. In oktober steeg de Japanse export naar de VS nog met 4,7 procent.
De Japanse import klom in november met 14,2 procent. Het handelsoverschot van Japan bedroeg vorige maand 162,8 miljard yen (1,48 miljard euro).

description.hltext_display: 周杰伦新任绯闻女友一夕暴红 过往情事遭曝光(图)(3)
Strong economic fundamentals, reasonable earnings and lower valuations may support markets in 2011: Sandeep Kothari
description.content:
Source: IRIS (22-DEC-10)
Comments | Post Comment
The strong economic fundamentals, reasonable earnings outlook and lower valuations are likely to provide support to the Indian equity markets in 2011 despite the high volatility, according to Sandeep Kothari, Fund Manager, Fidelity Equity Fund, Fidelity Tax Advantage Fund and Fidelity India Growth Fund.
``As we move into 2011, the fundamentals of the Indian economy remain strong while the capex cycle is yet to pick up substantially,`` said Kothari.
``The outlook for growth in earnings remains reasonable and the recent market corrections have made valuations a bit more reasonable. We remain constructive on the market for 2011, but believe that it will continue to be volatile,`` he said.
``The key concern areas in my view would be any shocks emanating from the developed world or the high domestic inflation. There are some positive signs on the economic front in the western world, however, the debt levels remain high. On the domestic side, while inflation is expected to come down over the next 3-4 months, higher commodity prices or sticky manufacturing prices would be an area to watch out for,`` he added.
``Overall, notwithstanding the near-term market volatility, the longer-term picture for India remains positive,`` he opined.
Disclaimer: IRIS has taken due care and caution in compilation of data for its web site. Information has been obtained by IRIS from sources which it considers reliable. However, IRIS does not guarantee the accuracy, adequacy or completeness of any information and is not responsible for any errors or omissions or for the results obtained from the use of such information. IRIS especially states that it has no financial liability whatsoever to any user on account of the use of information provided on its website.

description.hltext_display: HOUSING MINISTER HAILS GHA STAFF SNOW HEROES
Premafin: Unicredit esposta per 300 mln (Rep)
description.content:
ROMA (MF-DJ)--Proprio all'ultimo momento utile (la deadline scade oggi)
Ligresti ce l'ha fatta e stamane a Lugano le banche creditrici di Premafin
(Unicredit la piu' esposta, insieme a Mediobanca, Cariparma, Interbanca,
Intesa, Banco Popolare e Bpm) firmeranno l'accordo di riscadenziamento del
debito per 322 milioni.
E sarebbe stato raggiunto l'accordo, secondo quanto riportato da
Repubblica, anche su un altro debito in scadenza sulle holding
Sinergia-Imco. A quel livello, infatti, stanno per scadere rate per alcune
decine di milioni, e su questa parte, il creditore - Unicredit - avrebbe
gia' raggiunto l'accordo e la firma e' attesa nei prossimi giorni. Facendo
i conti, dunque, Unicredit risulta molto esposta nei confronti del gruppo
Ligresti: almeno 300 milioni, considerando la filiera
Sinegia-Imco-Premafin; una settantina di milioni in piu' con le linee di
credito operative su Fonsai. Forse e' anche per questo motivo che
Unicredit si e' tenuta alla larga dal consorzio di garanzia per l'aumento
di capitale.
red/fra
(fine)
MF-DJ NEWS

description.hltext_display: 孙金龙：围绕“区域性特大城市”科学规划
description.content:
2010年12月11日05时48分 中安在线-安徽日报
“制定规划，务必要研究未来人口边界问题。 ”12月10日，在合肥市委九届十一次全体会议上，省委常委、合肥市委书记孙金龙说，未来五年要把合肥加快建设成充满活力、独具魅力、创新发展、宜居宜业的现代化滨湖大城市和现代产业基地，努力成为在全国有较大影响力的区域性特大城市。因此，一定要围绕省委确立的区域性特大城市目标科学规划。
孙金龙指出，中共中央和省委关于制定国民经济和社会发展第十二个五年规划的建议，为合肥更好地谋划“十二五”发展和为继续推进合肥崛起大业提供了基本遵循，要以此为新的契机和指导，创造性地开展工作，在新的起点上加速合肥跨越赶超步伐。孙金龙认为，贯彻和落实好省委精神，关键是要利用好发展的重要战略机遇，坚定不移地推进科学发展、跨越发展、和谐发展，按照省委的要求努力把合肥建设成为在全国有较大影响力的区域性特大城市。因此，“十二五”规划要围绕“奠定区域性特大城市基础骨架”这一总体目标来展开，在落实规划的实践中始终实现又好又快发展。为此，孙金龙强调，要坚持以前瞻性的规划引领城市发展，积极构建合肥的城市形态布局，加快建设较为完备的基础设施体系，着力打造现代产业基地，不断完善城市服务功能，下大力气提高综合保障能力，造就引领发展的骨干力量。孙金龙还特别强调，针对眼下“十二五”规划《纲要》的编制，一定要确立更高的标杆，保持政策思路的连续性和突出民生至上的导向，真正建设好区域性特大城市。 (记者许根宏)

description.hltext_display: Barbour's Memory Of '60s Draws Criticism
description.content:
(iWireNews ™ and OfficialWire)
JACKSON, MS
Share
Mississippi Gov. Haley Barbour stirred up a hornet's nest of controversy by saying he doesn't recall the Civil Rights era as being "that bad."
Barbour, considered a possible Republican presidential candidate in 2012, told the conservative Weekly Standard he didn't remember the '60s in Yazoo City, Miss., his home town, as being turbulent.
"I just don't remember it as being that bad," Barbour said. "I remember Martin Luther King came to town, in '62. He spoke out at the old fairground and it was full of people, black and white."
Democrats seized on his comments, saying they disqualified Barbour from consideration as a presidential candidate, The Hill reported Monday.
On his Twitter page, Democratic National Committee spokesman Haru Sevugan said the comment shows Barbour isn't ready to run the nation.
"Re Barbour's 'not that bad' comment: He's not ready for prime time or not ready for the 21st century - either way it's disqualifying," Sevugan posted.
In the profile published Monday, Barbour also discussed the White Citizens' Councils, which opposed racial integration, The New York Times reported. In Yazoo City, Barbour said, the councils were a positive force, and "an organization of town leaders" who didn't tolerate racist attitudes of the Ku Klux Klan.
"In Yazoo City they passed a resolution that said anybody who started a chapter of the Klan" would be "run out of town," Mr. Barbour said. "If you had a job, you'd lose it. If you had a store, they'd see nobody shopped there. We didn't have a problem with the Klan in Yazoo City."
Derrick Johnson, president of the Mississippi NAACP, told The Huffington Post, "It's beyond disturbing -- it's offensive that he would take that approach to the history of this state to many African-Americans who had to suffer as a result of the policies and practices of the Citizens Council."
A spokesman for Barbour did not return calls and e-mail messages from the Times Monday. Dan Turner, Barbour's press secretary, told Talking Points Memo, "You're trying to paint the governor as a racist and nothing could be further from the truth."
The Web site quoted Turner as saying, "There's nothing in his past that shows that. If you pick out a sentence or a paragraph out of a fairly long article and harp on it, you can manipulate it."
iWireNews ™
NewsDesk - iWireNews ™

description.hltext_display: 管制形虛設 診所非法賣管制藥
description.content:
刑事警察局中部犯罪打擊中心今天查獲彰化縣花壇鄉1家診所涉嫌非法販賣管制藥品，彰化縣衛生局表示，診所沒有不良紀錄，將等到檢警偵查告一段落後，再作出行政處分。
刑事警察局中部打擊犯罪中心指出，彰化縣1家診所以解除毒癮為名，非法販賣第3級以及第4級管制藥品，診所會事先準備好藥品，購買者只要繳費就能領藥，讓藥品管制形同虛設。
涉嫌非法販賣藥品的診所今天上午大門緊閉，還有不知情的患者要去求診被擋在門外；據患者表示，這家診所醫術還不錯，醫師也熱心公益，聽到醫師非法販賣管制藥品，覺得很意外。
彰化縣衛生局局長葉彥伯說，出事診所沒有參加任何戒毒醫療計畫，也無不良違規紀錄，不過診所有藥師的話可以直接販賣管制藥品，他們將等到檢警調查告一段落後，再依藥師法及醫療法作出行政處分。

description.hltext_display: 香港恒指收升0.22% 靠穩23,000點水平
description.content:
港股22日收升0.22%，� 穩23,000點水平；分析師表示，雖然恒指早段承接昨日反彈走勢，但內地A股由升轉跌，拖累大市迅速回落，隨著聖誕節長假臨近，投資者投資意欲不大，料港股短期上漲動力不足，恒指或將繼續於22,800-23,500點區間波動。港股12月22日沖高回� �，恒指高開45點升越23,000點后，升勢逐步擴大，最多升166.6點高見23,160.44點，但在內地A股轉跌拖累下，恒指午后一度倒跌至22,990.69點，之后於23,000點大關爭持，全日收� �23,045.19點，升51.33點或0.22%，國企指數收� �12,611.3點，升3.87點或0.03%，紅籌指數收� �4,176.3點，升22.13點或0.53%，大市成交繼續淡靜，全日成交額萎縮至541.99億港元。(李姝嬋 撰稿)免責聲明：本文所載資料僅供參考，并不構成投資建議，世華財訊對該資料或使用該資料所導致的結果概不承擔任何責任。若資料與原文有異，概以原文為準。

description.hltext_display: Obama to celebrate pre-Christmas wins
description.content:
President Barack Obama is poised to cheer a new START and end an era of military discrimination, in a sweet coda to a year marked by anemic economic growth and a Republican revival.
Obama will sign into law a repeal of a ban on gays serving openly in the military - a long-held liberal dream - while the Senate is expected to ratify a new START nuclear arms deal with Russia, a cornerstone of his foreign policy.
He will travel to the Interior Department in Washington early on Wednesday to sign the law overturning the "Don't Ask, Don't Tell" policy on gay soldiers, amid likely scenes of jubilation from rights activists.
Obama promised to overturn the ban as he vowed to deliver "Change You Can Believe In" during his 2008 campaign, and the new law passed by Congress over the weekend will repair tattered ties with liberal grass-roots activists.
The US Senate meanwhile is expected to reach the end of a tortuous slog and finally ratify the new Strategic Arms Reduction Treaty (START) with Russia, which Obama has billed as vital to his "reset" of ties with Moscow.
After a fierce Senate battle, 11 Republicans broke with party leaders eager to hand Obama a crushing defeat, rallying more than the two-thirds majority - 60 votes - needed to ratify the pact.
A final vote on the treaty is expected by Wednesday afternoon.
The pact restricts each nation to a maximum of 1550 deployed warheads, a cut of about 30 per cent from a limit set in 2002, and 800 launchers and bombers.
The accord would also grant access to US inspectors who have been unable to monitor Russia's arsenal since the treaty's predecessor lapsed in December 2009.
It will mark a personal milestone for Obama, who turned to arms control issues even before he entered the Senate in 2005, and made a call as president for the eventual elimination of all nuclear weapons from the planet.
The White House has also delivered broad hints that Obama will hold an end-of-year press conference to frame thepolitical mood and position himself for the new realities in a divided Washington next year.
He is expected to then leave to join his family for his annual Christmas vacation in his native Hawaii, either Wednesday or Thursday.
Both legislative wins emerged from a surprisingly productive "lame duck" session of Congress that helped reinvigorate Obama's political fortunes after a humiliating reverse for his Democrats in November's mid-term elections.
The late-year session also included a deal with Republicans to extend tax cuts passed under former president George W. Bush that infuriated liberals because they included a break for the wealthiest Americans.
But Obama, noting the bill included extra unemployment benefits and arguing it will boost the economy, says the legislation was the kind of painful bipartisan compromise needed to get the people's work done in Washington.
The much-needed victories will also mark the end of an era of sorts for Obama as the new Republican-led House of Representatives will block the kind of sweeping social and economic reform legislation that has characterised his presidency.
Instead, Obama will have to fight a fierce battle on the budget and protect his signature political victories, like the healthcare reform and regulatory reform bills passed earlier this year.
The focus will inexorably turn to the 2012 elections as Republicans seek to thwart his campaign for a second term while the president hopes for a political payoff from a revived economy and a fall in unemployment, currently at 9.8 per cent.
Obama's approval ratings have held remarkably steady this year - between 45 and 50 per cent in most polls - hardly terminal for a first-term president.
But without a substantial fall in unemployment, the president will be hard pressed to make the case to voters that he deserves another two years in the White House.
Obama's aides argue that the recent legislation could provide a template for future work across the aisle.
"I think there is a lesson of the importance that these issues have with not just those on Capitol Hill but with the American people," White House spokesman Robert Gibbs said.
But given the recent history of gridlock, anger and fierce partisanship on Capitol Hill, few observers expected a new era of compromise.

description.hltext_display: dEVCOR Innovations Introduces “The Opener,” A Protective Case for the iPhone with an Integrated Bottle Opener
description.content:
dEVCOR Innovations introduces “The Opener”, a protective case for the iPhone with a built in bottle opener. dEVCOR’s thought was why just have a protective case for your phone when you can have a protective case with a handy integrated bottle opener, that still has a stylish look, and fits easily in your pocket?
Athens, GA (PRWEB) December 21, 2010
dEVCOR Innovations introduces “The Opener”, a protective case for the iPhone with a built in bottle opener. dEVCOR’s thought was why just have a protective case for your phone when you can have a protective case with a handy integrated bottle opener, that still has a stylish look, and fits easily in your pocket? The opener was designed around this concept where protection, functionality, and style were all key elements to the overall design of the case and it shows in the finished product. The Opener is sure to be a conversation starter.
The Opener has a hard, impact resistant outer shell and soft shock absorbing inner lining to grip around the phone. This design creates optimum protection for the phone. The stainless steel bottle opener is molded into the back of the case just above a small sunken area, which acts as a simple guide for placing the bottle in the correct place to be opened. The Opener is reinforced with inner ribbings that make the case extremely strong and durable specifically around the bottle opener.
A lot of effort went into the design of The Opener and finding a way to create an iPhone case with a bottle opener that is sleek, slim, and attractive so it could be used as an everyday case. To achieve this the bottle opener was positioned on the top rear of the case resulting in the case tilting forward at a slight angle when it is lying on it’s back. This feature scored very well with focus groups as it cuts screen glare and allows for easy viewing of the iPhone screen while it is laying on a flat surface. This design also allowed for the case depth to be kept at a minimum so that The Opener will fit comfortably in your pocket.
dEVCOR Innovations is focused on providing innovative and exciting new products to enhance the iPhone experience. The Opener is being marketed nation wide to specialty stores and online retailers and is also available online at http://www.devcorproducts.com . For the latest dEVCOR Innovations updates on The Opener and other products, visit the dEVCOR Facebook page at http://www.facebook.com/pages/dEVCOR-INNOVATIONS/121092477905882 .
###
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prwebiPhone/devcor/prweb4916274.htm

description.hltext_display: Parlament in Athen stimmt über Sparhaushalt ab
description.content: Athen (dpa) - Im griechischen Parlament geht die Debatte über den umstrittenen Sparhaushalt in die letzte Runde. Nach fünf Tagen hitziger Kontroversen soll unmittelbar nach Mitternacht die Abstimmung über den Haushalt 2011 beginnen. Das neue Budget sieht massive Sparmaßnahmen und Mehrbelastungen für die Bürger vor. Damit will die sozialistische Regierung über sechs Milliarden Euro zusätzlich aufbringen. Aus Protest gegen die harten Sparmaßnahmen legten Busfahrer und Zugführer in Athen heute erneut für 24 Stunden die Arbeit nieder.

description.hltext_display: 徐立全：探索用群众工作统揽信访新机制
description.content:
2010年12月11日05时48分 中安在线-安徽日报
近日，省委常委、政法委书记徐立全出席全省信访工作座谈会并讲话，强调探索实践用群众工作统揽信访工作新机制，使信访工作更加适应新形势新任务的需要，更加符合科学发展的要求。副省长唐承沛主持会议。
徐立全要求，各地各部门要认真贯彻中央精神和省委要求，切实提高对新形势下群众工作重要性的认识，牢固树立群众观点，密切联系群众，坚持思想上尊重群众、感情上贴近群众、工作上依靠群众，想问题、作决策、做工作都要从群众利益出发。政法部门和信访部门，是维护群众、服务群众的重要部门，政法系统和信访系统的领导干部要身体力行，带头做好群众工作。要着力保障和改善民生，在推进发展的过程中，必须始终注意维护好群众的利益，着力解决好群众反映强烈的农村土地征用、城镇房屋拆迁、国有企业改制、劳动社保和就业、环境保护、医疗教育等问题，使改革发展的成果更多地惠及群众。要探索实践用群众工作统揽信访工作的新路子，核心是解决群众信访问题，重点是完善群众工作载体，关键是创新信访工作思路。要加强用群众工作统揽信访工作平台建设，将信访工作纳入社会管理新体系，在观念、体制、机制上有所突破。
徐立全强调，各地各部门要准确把握当前信访形势，明确工作重点，强化督查督办，严格落实责任。要加快涉法涉诉信访积案清理评查进度，逐案落实领导包案责任、案件承办责任和督办责任，以责任落实推动积案化解，通过解决问题、钝化矛盾，促进案结事了、息诉息访。
唐承沛要求各地各有关部门深化矛盾纠纷排查化解工作，下大力气再化解一批重信重访、涉法涉诉等疑难复杂信访问题。(记者李晓群)

description.hltext_display: Zweite Apple-TV-Generation eine Million mal verkauft
description.content:
Die Fernseh-Settopbox Apple-TV ist für Apple-Chef Steve Jobs nicht länger mehr nur ein «Hobby». Im Laufe dieser Woche werde man von der zweiten Apple-TV-Generation über eine Million Geräte verkauft haben.
Berlin/Cupertino (dpa)
Das teilte der kalifornische Elektronikkonzern am Dienstag mit. «Apple hat den möglichen Absatz von Apple TV insbesondere in Europa deutlich unterschätzt», sagte Archibald Horlitz, Chef der Fachhandelskette Gravis, der dpa in Berlin. In seinen Läden hätte er die dreifache Menge der kleinen schwarzen Boxen absetzen können. Leider habe es an Nachschub gemangelt.
Im Gegensatz zur ersten Generation verfügt das neue Apple TV nicht mehr über eine eingebaute Festplatte, sondern streamt die Inhalte aus dem Internet oder von einem Rechner aus dem lokalen Netzwerk. Aus dem Internet können die Videos von Diensten wie iTunes und YouTube - oder in den USA von Netflix via Apple TV auf den Fernseher übertragen werden.
Außerdem kann man Fotos und Videos von Diensten wie Flickr und MobileMe darstellen. «Aktuell leihen und kaufen iTunes Anwender jeden Tag mehr als 400 000 TV-Folgen und über 150 000 Filme.»
In Europa habe Apple den Absatzerfolg der zweiten Settop-Generation deutlich zu niedrig eingeschätzt, sagte Horlitz. «Ein Gerät für 120 Euro nehmen viele Kunden spontan mit, auch wenn in Europa noch nicht so viele Anwendungen verfügbar sind wie in den USA.» Apple-Chef Steve Jobs hatte die erste Generation von Apple TV lange als sein «Hobby» bezeichnet, weil der Absatz der Settop-Boxen zunächst nur schleppend anlief.

description.hltext_display: 恒生指數及期貨指數12月22日收盤報價
STATS SHED LIGHT ON SCOTTISH HOUSING LISTS
description.content:
Fife’s housing association partnership, which has built more than 1,200 new affordable homes across the region, has been reappointed as Fife Council's preferred developer for another term.
The Fife Alliance, which comprises Kingdom, Fife, Glen, and Ore Valley housing associations, has led the delivery of the Fife Affordable Housing Investment Programme since its inception in April 2006.
Earlier this year, Fife Council and the Scottish Government re-tendered for their preferred partner and the Fife Alliance has now been selected as the sole Lead Developer in Fife for a further three years (April 2011 - March 2014).
The award-winning Fife Alliance has built 1,287 new homes over the last four years, covering a variety of needs, including developments in most of the housing market areas of Fife, and has proved to be a successful model for affordable house building across Scotland.
Bill Banks, for Fife Alliance, said: “The alliance has successfully worked with Fife Council, the Scottish Government and a range of other partners over the years delivering a full range of affordable housing projects and other initiatives and we hope to build on this success in the future, with the aim of delivering for people and communities in Fife.
“The partnership working extends beyond the development of new projects. We jointly deliver a Wider Role Community Programme and are developing proposals based on closer working to deliver services to our existing tenants.”
He added: “Although we can demonstrate significant achievements to date, we also recognise the funding pressures and the changes to funding arrangements will create challenges for all affordable housing providers.
“However there continues to be a growing need in Fife for affordable housing and the Alliance intend to try and address these challenges through even closer collaboration to deliver innovative projects.”
The alliance has invested over £113m in the delivery of affordable housing in Fife, which has made a significant contribution to the construction industry, particularly during the current difficult housing market conditions.
Other achievements during this period, include, a 100% record in achieving the Secured by Design accreditation standard for all the alliance projects, while over 30% of the housing provided has been designed to meet the particular needs of older people or people with mobility problems.
The partnership has also built the UK’s first affordable house for rent built to Passive House standards in Pittenweem.
As part of the added value that can be gained from the affordable housing programme, various training and employment initiatives have also been developed by the alliance and this has assisted over 350 people with training and placement opportunities which will assist them to secure future employment.
As part of the Fife Alliance model, Kingdom develops the projects and transfer some pre-agreed projects to one of the other alliance housing associations. It also acts as project managers for the council’s New Build Housing Programme, having already completed one project in Dunfermline, another has recently started on site in Rosyth and the third is due to start soon in Ladybank. Funding has also been agreed for two more projects, which are due to start on site in 2011, in Kirkcaldy and Dunfermline.

description.hltext_display: 廈門攜手溫嶺開展旅遊慈善複明行動
description.content:
日前，由福建廈門旅遊集團國旅攜手溫嶺市旅遊局、中國光大銀行開展的“我把太陽迎進祖國”大型旅遊慈善活動在廈門正式啟動。
在此次活動中，廈門旅遊集團國旅推出以“溫嶺—橫店—溫州三/四日遊”的行程為依託，將在2011年1月1日帶領遊客前往溫嶺石塘這個中國大陸第一縷陽光照耀地迎接新年。據介紹，每有一位客人報名，主辦方就向廈門市慈善總會捐款100元，幫助貧苦白內障患者恢復光明，讓他們和正常人一樣，看到陽光照耀下的美好世界。

description.hltext_display: Tu de Tuenti: el operador móvil virtual de Telefónica
description.author: R. Arranz
description.content:
La red social Tuenti , cuyo principal propietario es Telefónica desde el pasado mes de agosto, ya le ha puesto nombre a su operador móvil virtual (OMV). Su nombre va a ser “Tu” , según informó a través de su blog el consejero delegado de Tuenti , Zaryn Dentzel .
No es la primera vez que damos noticia de la creación de este operador “low cost” . Desde hace algunos meses se esperaba que Tuenti creara su propio operador virtual , sobre todo después de que Telefónica adquiriera la mayor parte de Tuenti en pasado mes de agosto. Así, el principal operador español entra en el mercado de la telefonía “low cost” sin modificar la imagen de Movistar .
Cómo funciona
Tuenti ha decidido que su OMV funcione de forma parecida a su propia red, es decir, los usuarios del servicio de telefonía lo harán mediante invitación . Este será su sistema de distribución. Según declaraciones de Zaryn Dentzel , “siempre hemos considerado Tuenti como un movimiento social , como una comunidad poderosa por la unión de sus miembros. Cada paso que damos como compañía busca generar valor, apostar por la innovación y pelear por nuestros usuarios”. También dijo que la aparición de “Tu” “marca un hito en nuestra historia” y que “revolucionará” el panorama de la telefonía móvil en España. Otras compañías de “low cost” pensaban lo mismo cuando aparecieron y aquí no se ha revolucionado nada, porque la estructura de operadores en España ha variado poco en los últimos tiempos. Sí es cierto que nunca hemos tenido un OMV a través de una red social y que el sistema de “invitación” no se ha utilizado hasta la fecha. Veremos que ocurre porque Zaryn Dentzel también dijo que Tuenti, que en realidad es Telefónica, pretende con este operador móvil virtual “ayudar a cambiar las malas inercias” acercando su experiencia en el mundo de Internet al sector de las telecomunicaciones.
El que manda
En “Tu” el que manda es el usuario porque la operadora no exige un consumo mínimo ni impone ningún tipo de permanencia y además ofrece de manera gratuita el sistema de mensajería integrado de Tuenti para todos los miembros del servicio. El “papeleo” será virtual a través de su web, lo único que tendrás que estar registrado en la red social . Recordemos que las tarifas básicas entre usuarios Tuenti tendrán un precio de 4 céntimos de euros por minuto , y las llamadas a otros destinos tendrán un precio por minuto de 8 céntimos de euro . Añade el establecimiento de llamada, 15 céntimos por conexión , y el IVA.
+ Foro Movistar

description.hltext_display: 周杰伦新任绯闻女友一夕暴红 过往情事遭曝光(图)
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 据台湾“苹果日报”消息，周杰伦上周六与女模罗康妮一起用餐而传绯闻，新任“J女郎”一夕暴红，过往情事成为焦点，昨传罗康妮多年前曾跟“小旺福”鼓手肚皮交往，同时间劈腿另一乐团“橙草”主唱克拉克。 报道称，周杰伦上周六跟妈妈叶惠美与罗康妮一起用餐，他跟罗康妮并肩而坐，女生甚至帮他夹菜，餐毕罗康妮还贴心搀扶周妈走路。罗康妮拥有性感好身材，拍过些许广告，也曾在电视台演出。正式就任J女郎才3天，立刻成为各大网站人气搜寻焦点，人气伴随爆料，继日前被爆谎报年龄；昨又被爆她多年前因组乐团表演关系，传出曾跟“小旺福”乐团鼓手肚皮交往过，同时间还传她劈腿另1名乐团“橙草”主唱克拉克。
克拉克长相俊美帅气，被乐迷称是乐团界的“千秋王子”玉木宏，曾在出演过电影《眼泪》，他的乐团“橙草”属人气乐团。当有媒体询问克拉克经纪人托马斯2人是否曾交往时，他说：“没有这回事！”再追问2人是否认识时，经纪人随即挂上电话不愿响应。肚皮则透过相信音乐表示：“只是好朋友，那阵子比较好，常出去吃饭，没有在一起，现在已经很久没联络了。”对于劈腿2乐团乐手传闻，罗康妮的经纪人Monica称她昨在拍片联络不到，仅表示：“艺人感情的事，我们不太会过问。”
罗康妮友人昨透露：“她是文艺女青年，很喜欢看各种展览，曾组团、爱玩音乐，也导过短片。”她一夕间从默默无闻的小模变成新J女郎，周遭朋友不断亏她，她说从没想过会上这么大娱乐版面，她这2天还比照周杰伦模式戴口罩出门。

description.hltext_display: 詹夏来会见台湾云林县议员参访团
description.content:
2010年12月14日06时33分 中安在线-安徽日报
台湾云林县议长苏金煌率台湾云林县议员参访团一行，于12月13日至18日来我省进行交流并参访。12月13日，省委常委、秘书长詹夏来在合肥稻香楼宾馆亲切会见参访团。省人大常委会副主任文海英、省政协副主席郑牧民一同参加会见。
詹夏来首先代表省委、省人大、省政府、省政协对参访团的来访表示热烈欢迎，并向客人简要介绍了安徽省情和经济社会发展情况。他说，安徽历史悠久，文化灿烂，山川秀美，资源丰富，区位优越，经过多年的建设和发展，目前正处在全面转型、加速崛起、兴皖富民的关键阶段。特别是随着皖江城市带承接产业转移示范区、国家技术创新工程试点省、加快皖北发展等重大战略深入推进，发展机遇前所未有，发展空间十分广阔。他指出，近年来皖台人员往来日益频繁，交流合作日趋深化，希望以此次参访团来访为契机，进一步促进双方常来常往，增进了解，扩大合作，不断提高皖台交流合作水平。
苏金煌对安徽省委、省政府的热情接待表示感谢，对安徽经济社会发展取得的成绩给予积极评价，并表示愿意积极促进台湾与安徽的交流与合作。
参访团在皖期间将先后赴合肥、芜湖、黄山等地进行参观访问。(裔淳、聂扬飞)
编辑: 曹飞翔

description.hltext_display: 《通信網路》布局通網市場，訊舟吃下康全電訊43%股權
description.content:
訊舟科技(3047)為擴大營業規模，提升經營績效，擬與康全電訊(股)公司進行策略聯盟、業務合作，以強化雙方之競爭力、強化研發動能及布局電信、通訊、網路等產品市場。董事會通過股份交換及現金購買康全電訊部分股東持股。
協議依公司法第156條第6項之規定，由訊舟增資發行普通股998萬9130股，受讓康全公司股東張怡慶等股東所持有之康全公司普通股1638萬2174股；換股比例為康全公司普通股1.64股換發訊舟普通股1股。
此外訊舟將以每股現金新台幣12.23元購買張怡慶等股東所持有之康全公司普通股1092萬1449股；經由上述股份交換及現金購買後，訊舟將持有康全公司普通股2730萬3623股，占康全公司已發行股份總數之43.66%。
股份交換基準日及股份買賣交割日暫定為100年2月25日。(編輯整理:張嘉倚)

description.hltext_display: UCB bouwt nieuwe fabriek in Zwitserland
description.content:
Farmabedrijf UCB gaat een nieuwe productie-eenheid bouwen op de bedrijfssite in het Zwitserse Bulle. Het project is goed voor een investering in twee stappen van 250 miljoen euro, zo meldt het bedrijf vandaag voorbeurs.
Het gaat om een zogenaamde biotechnologische-bacteriologische productiefaciliteit. De site moet in 2015 operationeel zijn om te kunnen voldoen aan de vraag naar Cimzia, een geneesmiddel dat in Europa goedgekeurd is voor de behandeling van reumatoïde artritis. De nieuwe productie-eenheid moet interne capaciteit toevoegen aan de bestaande capaciteit bij externe partners.
"De nieuwe eenheid zal, samen met de biotechnologische proeffabriek die in Eigenbrakel wordt gebouwd, onze capaciteit om onze toekomstige biologische producten te leveren, versterken", zegt Michele Antonelli, een van de adjunct-topmannen van het bedrijf. (belga/adv)

description.hltext_display: Indien testet atomwaffenfähige Rakete
description.content: Neu Delhi (dpa) - Einen Tag nach Pakistan hat auch Erzrivale Indien wieder atomwaffenfähige Raketen getestet. Die Starts seien erfolgreich verlaufen, sagte ein Sprecher des Verteidigungsministeriums in Neu Delhi. Zwei Boden-Boden-Raketen mit einer Reichweite von 350 Kilometern seien von einem Testgelände an Küste des ostindischen Bundesstaats Orissa abgefeuert worden. Pakistan hatte erst gestern eine atomwaffenfähige Rakete getestet.

description.hltext_display: The Best Things About Whistling Kettles
description.content: A number of amongst us remember growing up inside a household where the noise of whistling tea kettles was the summons to rise and shine and to enjoy a lovely afternoon break with cookies. Of these modern days, each time a stainless electric kettle often replaces the old-fashioned copper one atop the fireplace or stove, many youngsters have never known the delight of hearing the stainless steel tea kettle whistle.In prior decades, whistling tea kettles were an icon from the kitchen. Every kitchen had one, and it was used each day. It took pride of place atop the stove, whether or not this was one fuelled by wood logs or simply a easier gas or electric model. The kettle was used until it may possibly no longer function.Back in those times, inferior welds often caused the spout to leak or become unattached from the body. Tea didn't consist of pre-packaged bags; you merely tossed a couple of leaves into the bottom of an cup or used a bit of cheesecloth to tie them in to a neat little package.Obviously products have changed a good deal. Today, tea kettles are produced with superior technology. They use modern materials, for example stainless or an enamel coating that may be meant to be incredibly durable as well as beautiful. Many of them are made in an piece, eliminating the weld in the spout and making it simpler and keep clean.The tea itself is now purchased from lots of flavours and types. Everything from white tea to fruit-infused or decaffeinated is instantly available through the local market.But simply because you go searching for a more modern item of cookware does not necessarily mean you need to forget the pleasure of hearing the kettle whistle. Beautifully-designed and high-quality kettles can be purchased in models that incorporate that familiar whistle from days past.But if your children have not had the pleasure of getting out of bed for the tea kettle's insistent, high-pitched whistle why don't you provide them with an opportunity now? Whistling tea kettles will certainly reestablish pleasant memories of your respective past and likewise introduce your special children on the lovely song signalling water is ready to use to get a delicious cup of tea. So pass on the tradition to your children and be proud !

description.hltext_display: Mercury To Support Counter-IED Program
description.content:
A subcontract related to products and services for the U.S. Navy's JCREW 3.3 Phase III Counter-IED Program has been given to Mercury Computer Systems.
Mercury, which has headquarters in Massachusetts, said the award for work on the Joint Counter-Radio Controlled Improvised Explosive Device 3.3 program came from ITT Electronic Systems.
"Mercury is very excited to be an integral part of the JCREW program with ITT, a leading supplier of electronic warfare technologies, to help provide counter-IED sub-system solutions," said Randy Dean, vice president of Product Line Management at Mercury. "The unique electronic warfare capabilities that we are providing to ITT will ensure a technically superior and timely counter-IED implementation."
The counter-IED technology that Mercury will supply to ITT is based on the previously announced active electronic warfare solutions. Mercury offers 3U and 6U OpenVPX product lines specifically designed and optimized for high-density processing, high-memory bandwidth, and I/O, key features required for active electronic warfare.

description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content: اسلام آباد (مانیٹرنگ ڈیسک) انیسویں آئینی ترمیم کا بل قومی اسمبلی نے اتفاق رائے سے منظور کر لیا ہے۔ تفصیلات کے مطابق چیئرمین آئینی کمیٹی سینیٹر رضا ربانی نے بل اسمبلی میں پیش کیا جس کے بعد سپیکر قومی اسمبلی فہمیدہ مرزا نے اس پر رائے دہی کے لیے فلور اوپن کر دیا ۔ اسمبلی میں موجود اراکین نے کھڑے ہو کر اِس پر اپنا حق رائے دہی استعمال کیا۔ اسمبلی کے 239اراکین نے اِس کے حق میں ووٹ دیا جبکہ صرف ایک ووٹ اس کے خلاف آیا جس کے بعد سپیکر قومی اسمبلی نے اس بل کو منظور قرار دیتے ہوئے اس پر شق وار منظوری کا مرحلہ شروع کرا دیا۔ یاد رہے کہ یہ بل اب سینیٹ مین منظوری کے لیے پیش کیا جائے گا۔ واضح رہے کہ وفاقی کابینہ نے وزیر اعظم پاکستان کی زیر صدارت آج صبح ہونے والے اجلاس میں انیسویں ترمیم کے مسودے کی منطوری دی تھی ۔ وزیر اعظم نے مسودے کی تیاری پر کمیٹی کی تعریف کی ۔ اُن کا کہنا تھا کہ پارلیمنٹ کی خودمختاری سے اداروں کا وقار بلند ہوا ہے۔

description.hltext_display: 赵树丛：奋力实现“十二五”农业发展新跨越
description.content:
2010年12月15日03时52分 中安在线-安徽日报
12月13日，省委常委、副省长赵树丛带领省直有关部门负责人先后深入到黄山市休宁县松萝茶叶有限公司、黄山百大商厦等企业进行调研，并召开座谈会听取省人大代表的意见和建议。他强调，要认真贯彻落实十七届五中全会和中央经济工作会议精神，进一步加快农业发展方式转变，稳定发展粮食生产，调整优化农村经济结构，促进农业增效、农民增收，奋力实现“十二五”农业农村经济发展的新跨越。
赵树丛指出，“十一五”期间，是党的惠农政策全面落实的五年，是安徽农村生产力大幅提升的五年，是农业发展支撑条件明显改善的五年，也是农民生活水平显著提高的五年。
赵树丛强调，“十二五”时期，要紧紧抓住一条主线、落实两个任务、依托三个载体、构筑四个体系，加快实现由农业大省向农业强省跨越。一条主线，就是推进农业转型升级，加速实现由传统农业向现代农业转变，由依靠资源向依靠劳动力素质和科技水平提高转变，由粗放式经营向提高集约化生产水平转变。两个任务，就是提高农业综合竞争能力，增加农民收入。三个载体，就是继续推进粮食生产“三大行动”、实施农业产业化转型倍增计划、推进社会主义新农村建设。四个体系，就是不断完善农村基本经营体系、农业基础设施和生态体系、农业科技服务体系、“三农”政策支持保护体系，加快形成城乡经济社会一体化发展的新格局。各地、各有关部门要切实加强对“三农”工作的组织领导，强化政策扶持，夯实基层基础，推进资源保护和机制创新，为实现全面转型、加速崛起、兴皖富民目标作出新的贡献。(尔实)

description.hltext_display: GHA SHOULD BE SUBJECT TO FOI LAWS, SAYS LAW CENTRE
滬指放量跳水 韓國將再舉行射擊演習
description.content:
滬指午后快速跳水，成交量放大，金融地產有色等權重股帶� �� �盤，而軍工股出現一定反彈，部分個股股價已翻紅。據� �導韓國將再度舉行射擊演習，這或許是� 成滬指午后跳水的主要原� 。據韓聯社� �導，韓國方面表示，計劃從本周三(12月22日)至周五(12月24日)舉行海軍射擊演習，出動海軍艦艇及反潛直升機。CNN� �導稱，韓國將於明天舉行最大規模的實彈射擊演習，地點在朝鮮附近。路透社稱，這次陸空演習參演人數為和平時期“史上最大規模。”這一演習有可能“激怒”朝鮮。中金公司最新� �� �表示，雖然短期股指存在反復的可能，但系統風險較小，隨著市� �對政策、經濟、流動性層面� �期的逐步改善，明年初市� �機會大於風險。中金公司稱，本次地產股上漲僅僅是超跌反彈的交易機會概率較大，手中未持有地產股的投資者目前不建議追高。長江證券認為，地產股異動的深層次來源於市� �對於通脹的� �期的變化，一方面市� �對明年通脹� �期的降低，另一方面地產股較低的估值，且相對確定的業績使得板塊存在機會。
亞太主要股指午盤全線上漲，日本東京日經指數微漲5.95點，韓國綜合指數漲4.24點盤中再創新高，澳大利亞普通股指數漲4.40點，新西蘭NZ50指數漲7.64點，台灣� 權指數漲21.59點；周二美股收高，道指漲55點漲幅0.48%，至此三大股指均創下兩年多以來最高收盤價；原油期貨上漲45美分逼近每桶90美元，黃金期貨漲0.2%� �收於每盎司1,388.8美元。 機構分析今日大盤走勢湘財證券：市� �經過6小時的大幅反彈之后，做多動能得到一定程度的釋放。昨日帶� �市� �大漲的房地產板塊市� �分歧依然較大，導致股指在早盤震蕩走低。� �計下午股指維持低位震蕩的概率較大，投資者仍然要注意倉位的控制，業績確定性強的水泥、機械等板塊依然建議關注。
五礦證券：從早盤盤面看，昨日大幅上漲的地產板塊出現沖高回落走勢，成交量大幅萎縮，表明市� �心態還相對謹慎，下午指數可能延續區間震蕩� �局，建議關注地產股的動向，而成品油價� �的上調，對石油、煤炭以及間接受益的其它資源類板塊形成利好，短期來看煤炭等資源股還有進一步上行的動能。操作上，建議可繼續關注煤炭等資源股，激進者逢低關注龍� �地產股的超跌反彈行情。平安證券：市� �需震蕩整理消化浮籌金融地產是前期遭受飽受壓抑的板塊，所以爆發力較大，房地產市� �量價齊升印證通脹� �期仍然強烈。這兩個板塊在市� �平淡之際突然崛起，或許意味著資金的關注重點將逐步轉移到具有估值優勢的權重股上來。周二市� �的特點是攻其一點，不及其余。由於投資者集中資金主攻地產、煤炭等權重股，故大盤能� 縮量上漲。不過，部分權重股的拉升有點過於迅猛，換手不充分。這也就意味著地產、煤炭等權重股的升勢可能并不是非常牢固。� 此，接下來市� �可能需要通過震蕩整理的形式消化浮籌，鞏固基礎。所以，市� �延續震蕩� �局的概率最大。中證期貨：期指震蕩難改 保持觀望
早盤股指期貨呈現對昨日大幅反彈走勢的修正，不過回吐力度并不大，主力合約1101開盤圍繞3300點窄幅波動，盤中表現弱於現指市� �，并對現指形成一定拖累，盡管有色股一度代替地產股提振大盤，但最終還是受累期指回調出現回落，不過由於昨日漲幅落后於期指，� 此現指總體表現略微抗跌；技術上看，期指1101合約昨日大幅反彈穩住了市� �情緒，但向上推動力還是不足，3300點成為新的爭奪焦點，不過上證綜指能收復年線，重新回到2900點附近，而且期指� 月合約同樣抗跌，顯示市� �還是并不悲觀，只是目前缺乏提振� � ，導致走勢仍然糾結。� �計午后期指仍將受阻於3300點，但繼續回落空間也有限，操作上建議暫時觀望，如果能有效站穩3300，則可嘗試輕倉多單介入。
興業證券：本周后半段資金面壓力有望緩解興業證券此前曾表示，周一市� �大幅震蕩，是機構調倉、為明年布局的開始，后續行情不必恐慌，一方面，權重股制約了大盤下行空間，另一方面，基於準備金率上調的時點，本周后半段資金面壓力有望出現邊際上的緩解。另外，A股交易賬戶� 比2010年12月10日為9.68%，進入5%-10%的中低風險區域。雖然對明年的行情只是謹慎樂觀，但是，看好明年前幾個月A股市� �影響� � 的邊際改善，及引發的反彈行情。� 此，建議布局明年春季行情。中金公司：調價提升石化雙雄盈利� �期� �計成品油定價機制改革可能在明年上半年完成。這次成品油調價，能� 很大程度上提升投資者對中國成品油定價機制改革的信心，從而提升市� �對“石化雙雄”未來盈利的� �期。自上次調價以來，國內煉� 以人民幣計價的原油成本上升了300元/噸，和本次成品油漲價幅度一致，說明石油公司完全轉嫁了原油進口成本的增� 。如果原油成本超過每桶90美元后，中國政府仍能� �持調價，并允許石油企業把大部分成本上升轉嫁出去，石化雙雄就可能有較大的可能性維持目前較高的下游一體化毛利不變。如果原油價� �上漲至每桶120美元以上時，這種樂觀情況仍能維持，� �告� �計中石油的盈利有提升約50%的可能，而以下游為主的一體化公司盈利提升幅達也可能高達40%。
平安證券：地產板塊迎來估值修復與提升雙重利好
周二（12月21日）地產板塊漲幅高達6.14%，實現了年初以來最大單日漲幅。說明房價、地價關系趨於正常，地價漲幅快過房價漲幅的� 壓性行業生態得以改善，以上市公司代表的大中型房地產企業市� �空間和市� �份額處在� 速提升中。� �計未來一年，行業將迎來估值修復和估值提升的雙重利好，市� �將逐步認同以上市公司為代表的大中型房地產企業經營生態的改善。明年行業� �計會普漲，跟2009年一致，� �計不同的品種會有較大的表現差異，短期推薦萬科、保利地產、金地集團、北京城建、福星股份等品種，中長期看，華業地產� 為通州� �目一季度開盤，在明年一季度有突出表現；進入二季度后金地集團在銷售規模的爆發性上將會逐步體現，重點看好金地集團在2011年全年的表現。
(楊磊 編輯)

description.hltext_display: Vigilance orange pour 20 départements en prévision de nouvelles chutes de neige
description.content:
La RN 52 sous la neige le 20 décembre 2010 dans l'est de la France Jean-Christophe Verhaegen AFP/Archives
Vingt départements de la moitié nord de la France, de la Loire-Atlantique aux Ardennes, ont été placés en vigilance orange par Météo France en raison de chutes de neige attendues mercredi en fin de journée.Evènement
Par ailleurs, la vigilance orange est décrétée pour la Moselle et le Bas-Rhin en raison de risques de crue.
Les chutes de neige atteindront de 5 à 10 cm sur les départements de l'Ile-de-France, sur l'Aisne (02), les Ardennes (08), l'Eure (27), l'Eure-et-Loir (28), l'Ille-et-Vilaine (35), la Loire-Atlantique (44), le Maine-et-Loire (49), la Mayenne (53), le Morbihan (56), l'Oise (60), l'Orne (61) et la Sarthe (72).
La pluie traversera dans la matinée l'Aquitaine et les Charentes avant de remonter vers le nord où, en butant sur l'air froid, elle se transformera en neige sur le nord des Pays de la Loire et les collines normandes.
"Ces chutes de neige s'étendront en soirée et la nuit suivante au bassin parisien et aux Ardennes et pourraient être précédées d'un peu de verglas", prévient Météo France.
"Cet épisode neigeux débutera vers 18h00 sur le Pays de Loire, 19h00 sur l'Ile-de-France, 20h00 sur la Bretagne, le sud de Normandie et la Picardie", selon les prévisionnistes de Météo France.

description.hltext_display: 花建慧会见希腊驻沪总领事
description.content:
2010年12月15日03时55分 中安在线-安徽日报
12月14日，副省长花建慧在合肥稻香楼宾馆会见了希腊驻上海总领事玛利亚・萨兰蒂女士一行。
花建慧首先对玛利亚・萨兰蒂总领事来安徽访问表示欢迎，并简要介绍了我省经济社会发展情况。她说，安徽历史悠久，文化灿烂，人文底蕴深厚，居中靠东，通江达海，战略位置突出，区位优势明显。当前皖江城市带承接产业转移示范区建设正加速推进，国家技术创新工程试点省建设已全面启动。这两个重要战略平台的推进，使得安徽迈入了全面转型、加速崛起、兴皖富民的新阶段。近年来，安徽与希腊的友好往来十分密切，双方在经贸、文化、教育等领域的合作不断扩大和深化，相信在总领事的积极推动下，我省与希腊的交流合作一定能在新的发展机遇中取得新突破，迈上新台阶。
玛利亚・萨兰蒂表示，安徽在希腊与中国的友好交往中起到了十分重要的作用，愿意为双方进一步交流合作牵线搭桥，建立更加紧密的合作关系。(聂扬飞)
编辑: 曹飞翔

description.hltext_display: Residential Teen Treatment
description.content:
. Addiction is to be considered a disease which will eat someone's life away and it creates a lot of hurt and pain in the entire family. When someone is addicted to drugs or alcohol, it is a lonely place to be. The teens don't know who to trust enough to discuss their problems except a residential teen treatment program.
Addicts face devastation and destruction in their lives and are frustrated when it comes to facing their addiction. Teenagers with addiction of drugs and alcohol have a distinctive set of conditions as because of that, they continue to need treatment and special care to attend to their problems. Teenagers choose drugs and alcohol abuse for various different reasons and sometimes the adult are not able to come to grips to the situation. Parents are at odds with the idea of drug and alcohol abuse. They are in a frightening situation because they don't know what to do when their child goes deeper and deeper into addiction.
They feel hopeless and lost when they don't know where to find the help that they need for residential teen treatment. These programs offer the parents a variety of options for their teens, but it is for the parents to find the best help for their children. During the treatment process, teens have to deal with emotional and behavioral problems. The therapist in the residential teen treatment programs offer specialized help to the teens to change these behaviors and treat their emotional problems.
Offered in various setting, these programs set out to get the teenagers from the home and into a more structured and disciplined environment where they will be adequately supervised and provide with aggressive therapy. The teen will be able to meet with their individual therapist and counselor to find out the reason for their abuse and find solutions to fix it. They will learn how to function in the real world once they graduate from the program.
Of course, their education is still important while in the residential teen treatment program so the program will consist of academic training and support as well as physical activities. It will be comparable to being in a boarding school where family can come to visit and the teen can get supervised visitation by their parents.
These treatment programs usually last for up to eighteen months depending on the extent of the person's condition and how long they have been using and abusing drugs and alcohol. Teens who display suicidal tendencies may have to stay much longer in the program. It is up to the parents and the recommendation of the counselor or therapist to determine the next step once the teen has those problems.
Teens that don't have a severe problem of drug and alcohol abuse may stay in the center no longer than six months or at least up to three months.

description.hltext_display: 【物價信息】農業部︰上周農產品批發市場量價齊升
description.content:
據中國農業部農產品批發市� �信息網監測，上周(2010年12月13日-12月19日，下同)全國“菜籃子產品批發價� �指數”為173.36，比前一周上升1.33個點。重點監測的50家批發市� �60個品種交易總量為54.32萬噸，比前一周上升2.7%。
數據顯示，重點監測的28種蔬菜均價連續5周下跌，上周每公斤為3.09元(人民幣，下同)，環比下降0.3%。其中，生姜和洋白菜價� �下降6%左右；芹菜、青椒、大蔥、西葫蘆、大蒜、白蘿卜和西紅柿價� �下降3%左右；黃瓜、蓮藕、南瓜、土豆和胡蘿卜價� �下降1%左右；� 菜、平菇和油菜價� �上升5%左右；其余品種價� �小幅波動。28種蔬菜交易量(50家重點批發市� �交易量合計，下同)為42.66萬噸，環比增3.4%。數據顯示，羊肉每公斤為35.45元，環比上漲1.4%；白條雞和牛肉每公斤分別為13.52元和30.62元，環比分別上漲0.8%和0.4%；雞蛋每公斤為8.64元，環比持平；豬肉每公斤為18.66元，環比下降0.6%。重點監測的以上5種畜產品交易量為2.07萬噸，環比增2.5%。
數據顯示，大帶魚每公斤為20.56元，環比上漲1.1%；鯉魚、白鰱魚和草魚每公斤分別為10.74元、6.57元和11.93元，環比分別上漲0.8%、0.6%和0.4%；大黃花魚、花鰱魚和鯽魚每公斤分別為25.44元、10.24元和11.55元，環比分別下降2.0%、1.0%和0.4%。重點監測的以上7種魚類產品交易量為1.40萬噸，環比降2.1%。
數據顯示，重點監測的11種水果均價每公斤為4.55元，環比上漲1.1%。其中，甜橙每公斤4.86元，環比上漲3.3%；西瓜、鴨梨、蜜桔和富士蘋果價� �上漲2%左右；巨峰葡萄和香蕉價� �下降1%左右。11種水果交易量為8.20萬噸，環比降0.1%。

description.hltext_display: Le Mans : Inauguration du MMA le 29/01
description.author: Rédaction Football
description.content:
Le stade du Mans, le MMArena, sera inauguré le 29 janvier prochain et sera marqué par un certain nombre de festivités précédant la rencontre Le Mans-Ajaccio, annonce Ouest-France. En janvier, Le Mans changera de stade. Adieu Léon-Bollée et bonjour le MMArena. L'inauguration du nouveau stade aura lieu le 29 janvier lors de la rencontre opposant les Manceaux à Ajaccio, annonce mardi Ouest-France. Des festivités seront prévues à partir de 15 heures.
C.B (Rédaction Football365.fr)

description.hltext_display: 该出手时就出手，看中荣威550贺岁超值版
description.author: sohu.com
description.content: 白驹过隙，2010年已近岁末，荣威550在此时将给广大消费者奉上一份特别的新年“礼物”——贺岁超值版车型。那么，在这个年底，荣威550的贺岁版车型究竟会带来哪些“惊喜”呢？让我们一起来揭开它的神秘面纱。荣威550打造车市“限量版”车型荣威550的外观设计抓住了当代年轻消费者的潮流脉搏，英伦风格的融合...

description.hltext_display: World Fuel Buying Danish Concern
description.content:
A Danish supplier of fuel and related logistic services to international forces in Afghanistan is being bought by World Fuel Services Corp. of Florida. World Fuel Services said that under the definitive acquisition agreement, the purchase price for Nordic Camp Supply ApS will be $68.5 million, which may be increased if NCS net assets exceed an agreed amount at closing.
Up to $10 million of the purchase price and all or a portion of any increase in the purchase price more than $68.5 million may be paid in the form of World Fuel Services common stock, valued based on an agreed trailing average price formula.
The balance of the purchase price will be funded through cash-on-hand, it said.
"We are excited to welcome such an established and well-respected team as NCS to World Fuel," said Michael J. Kasbar, president and chief operating officer of World Fuel Services. "Their experience in managing fuel logistics in challenging environments will complement our existing government-related activities and provide a solid platform for further growth in the fuel logistics market."
NCS is a full-service supplier of aviation, gasoline, diesel fuels.

event_or_fact.property: We are excited to welcome such an established and well-respected team as NCS to World Fuel; Their experience in managing fuel logistics in challenging environments will complement our existing government-related activities and provide a solid platform for
president and chief operating officer, World Fuel Services Corp.

description.hltext_display: CanRobeco FORCE: Hold
description.content:
Source: BUSINESS LINE (22-DEC-10)
Comments | Post Comment
Attribute it to astute timing or simple luck, Canara Robeco`s FORCE Fund (short for Financial Opportunities, Retail Consumption and Entertainment) has turned out to be the best new fund to get off the block last year, as the sectors and stocks it bet on simply took off in the market rally.
With a 33% return over one year, the fund has not only trounced the older diversified equity funds which gained 18.3% on an average, but also all other new funds that were launched in 2009 (return of 19%).
Favoured themes
The fund`s focus on the finance, retail and entertainment sectors, all riding the much-fancied consumption theme, led to its exceptional performance. Investors in the fund can retain their units, though fresh investments can be held off until the fund proves itself over a three-year market cycle. While the fund may record steady returns by churning its portfolio, a repeat of these returns may prove challenging, given that the consumption stocks the fund favours already trade at premium valuations. The fund`s flexible mandate may allow it to shield against falling markets by shifting to larger cash and debt positions.
Risk tempered by allocation
As a thematic fund, FORCE Fund is suitable only for risk-takers owing to its concentrated exposure to its top one or two sectors. For instance, in the last year, bank stocks accounted for 32-45% of the fund`s portfolio.
The overweight position helped the fund`s performance, as banking stocks were re-rated rapidly in the last leg of the recent bull market, but it does expose the fund to any sector-specific risk that unfolds (such as the `loan scam` or pressure on margins).
The other key risk that all thematic funds face is that of market interest in a particular theme petering out after a very sharp rally. However, the FORCE fund`s unusual mandate of investing up to 35% of its portfolio in debt instruments and another 35% in stocks outside of the chosen theme, may cushion investors against this risk to some extent.
Quality control
Apart from its focus on just the right sectors during this period, FORCE Fund`s returns are also a function of its good stock selection. Though the sectors that the fund bets on are inherently risky, the fund consciously minimises risk through stock selection.
The focus on companies with good fundamentals is evident from the fund`s choice of attractively valued PSU banks and retail and media stocks with positive cash flows. In media, the fund holds Sun TV, Hindustan Media Ventures and Jagran Prakashan rather than Television Eighteen or Dish TV. About 30% of the portfolio is invested in mid-caps (below Rs 75 billion market cap), which is not too high for a thematic fund.
In recent months, the fund has also used its flexible mandate to reduce its banking exposures and build out its cash and debt positions. While exposure to bank stocks fell from 45 to 39% between April and November 2010, debt and cash levels have crept up from 13 to 18% by November 2010.
This, along with contained mid-cap exposures, should protect a portion of the portfolio from any steep market fall.

description.content:
點，收盤於4,643.95點，跌0.58%；深基指開盤於5,684.41點，收盤於5,706.40點，漲0.36%；兩市基金全天成交金額18.26億元，成交量為1,599萬手。
滬深基指12月22日早盤窄幅震蕩，午后走勢出現分化，滬基指走低，深基指震蕩上漲。滬基指開盤於4,671.07點，最高探至4,680.48點，最低探至4,627.76點，收盤於4,643.95點，跌0.58%；深基指開盤於5,684.41點，最高探至5,709.88點，最低探至5,657.95點，收盤於5,706.40點，漲0.36%。股市方面，上證指數下跌0.90%，深證成指下跌0.82%。
封閉式基金方面，開盤交易的53只基金中，22只上漲，6只持平，25只下跌。基金泰和（500002）、基金普� （184689）、基金豐和（184721）位於漲幅前三位，分別漲2.15%、1.83%、1.07%，� �1.237元、1.332元、1.133元；雙禧B（150013）、瑞和小康（150008）、申萬進取（150023）位於跌幅前三位，分別跌2.06%、1.67%、1.65%，� �1.187元、0.941元、0.952元。
LOF基金方面，開盤交易的47只基金中（信� 深度未交易），6只上漲，3只持平，38只下跌。天弘深證（164205）、融通巨潮（161607）、銀華通脹（161815）位於漲幅前三位，分別漲1.13%、0.65%、0.49%，� �0.986元、0.928元、1.026元；長城久富（162006）、中歐趨勢（166001）、大成創新（160910）位於跌幅前三位，分別跌2.00%、1.69%、1.58%，� �1.470元、0.872元、0.995元。
ETF方面，開盤交易的15只基金收盤全線下跌，其中小康ETF（510160）、中盤ETF（510130）、周期ETF（510110）跌幅較小。責任ETF（510090）、180ETF（510180）、50ETF（510050）位於跌幅前三位，分別下跌2.06%、1.48%、1.42%，� �0.952元、0.667元、2.015元。

description.hltext_display: 滬深300指數12月22日收盤跌1.05%
description.content:
。滬深300指數早盤以3,253.82點高開后震蕩下跌，收盤� �3,215.45點，跌1.05%。昨日大幅走強的房地產、券商等權重板塊今日回調，帶動股指午后� 速回落。從盤面看，近期市� �波動� 劇，多空雙方對於后市分歧� 大，但總體而言，隨著市� �交易氛圍明顯改善，� 上目前權重股的估值處於相對安全邊際，對於后市繼續持樂觀態度。
滬深300指數走勢回顧：
滬深300指數12月22日以3,253.82點高開后震蕩下跌，收盤� �3,215.45點，跌1.05%；共成交約70億股 ，成交金額約983億元，較上一交易日有所萎縮。鋼鐵、有色金屬、石油等個股有所回落，中國石化跌 0.36%、江西銅業漲0.10%、寶鋼股份跌0.30%；金融地產個股走勢較弱，中國太保跌3.23%、中信銀行 跌2.22%、萬科A跌1.42%。前20大權重股拖累指數為16.7點，金融地產股拖累指數為13.2點，能源股拖 累指數為1點。
有色金屬板塊走勢較強，豫光金鉛(600531)收盤漲1.57%，中色股份(000758)漲1.85%，江西銅業(600362)漲0.10%。截至12月21日收盤，LME基本金屬幾乎全線上漲，期銅盤中大漲191美元，觸及紀錄高位9392美元/噸，最後� �9365/9370美元/噸，高於20日收盤價9201美元/噸。今日國內商品期貨早盤普漲。受成品油價� �上調刺激，今日石油板塊盤沖高回落，中國石化(600028)收盤跌0.36%，淮油股份(002207)漲0.26%，廣聚能源(000096)漲3.77%。國家發展和改革委員會21日宣布，自22日零時起將汽油、柴油價� �分別提高每噸310元、300元，相當於90號汽油全國平均零售價每升上調0.23元，0號柴油每升上調0.26元。發改委稱，這次成品油價� �調整有利於保障國內市� �供應，同時抑制不合理消費，促進節能減排和經濟結構調整。分析師表示，油價上調直致石油公司產品價� �的上漲，將直接帶來利潤。從這個角度而言，油價的上漲對石油企業的業績及股價表現，都會形成絕對的支撐作用。此外，原油期貨周二創下兩年結算價新高，受股市走強和市� �對美國經濟的樂觀情緒提振。紐約商交所一月原油期貨合約結算價漲45美分，至2008年10月份以來最高結算價水平每桶89.82美元，漲幅0.5%。ICE布倫特原油期貨合約漲46美分，至每桶93.20美元，漲幅0.5%。紐約商交所原油期貨合約的盤中高點為89.97美元，但未能觸及90美元這一被許多投資者視為重要關口的水平。
(李青 撰稿)

description.hltext_display: 赵树丛要求掀起农田水利基本建设热潮
description.content:
2010年12月16日04时49分 中安在线-安徽日报
12月13日至14日，全省农田水利基本建设现场会在芜湖县召开，省委常委、副省长赵树丛出席并讲话。
赵树丛指出，当前，我省正处在全面转型、加速崛起的关键时期，我们要进一步认清省情、水情，始终牢记胡锦涛总书记视察安徽时的重要指示，真正做到防治水患任何时候都不松懈，兴修水利任何时候都不松劲。
赵树丛强调，兴修水利的责任在政府，力量在基层。以农田水利为重点的基础设施始终是农业发展的最基本条件。农田水利基本建设是公共事业、公共产品、公共服务，各级政府要切实承担起搞好农田水利建设的责任。要抓规划，立足高起点、高标准推动，高质量建设，使农田水利设施的功能符合可持续发展要求；要抓投入，按照形成城乡发展一体化新格局的要求，进一步加大对农田水利建设的投入。省、市、县财政都要安排农田水利建设专项资金，并随着财力增长而增长，通过民办公助、以奖代补等形式，多干多补，发挥引导作用；要抓协调，建立农田水利工程实施的政府协调机制，实现统一规划、统筹安排、集中使用，共同解决好水利问题。
赵树丛特别强调，抓水利就是抓民生，抓工程就是抓落实，兴修水利的载体在工程项目，效果在抓落实。各地要认真学习、借鉴芜湖市的经验，不断创新工作机制，强化项目建设管理，确保建一片、成一片、发挥效益一片。要抓紧时机，加强组织领导，广泛发动群众，迅速掀起水利兴修高潮，全力以赴抓好农田水利基本建设，为实现“十二五”经济社会发展良好开局，促进全面转型、加速崛起、兴皖富民作出新的更大贡献。(王恺、赵梅)

description.hltext_display: 歐洲大雪 港接回滯英學生
description.content:
（中央社記者王曼娜香港22日電）受歐洲大風雪影響，香港多個來往歐洲的班機被迫取消或延誤，不少港人滯留當地。國泰航空公司今天安排4個班機，優先接回滯留英國的400名香港學生。
香港機場管理局表示，由於歐洲大風雪，香港今天有3班來往英國倫敦班機被取消，另有4班來往英國及德國的班機延誤。
國泰航空表示，倫敦機場受到暴風雪影響，運輸量大減，從18日至今，共有15班國泰班機被迫取消，目前約2800名乘客滯留倫敦機場，但因部份乘客已取消或更改行程，還要進一步確認實際滯留人數。
另外，在香港政府協調下，國泰今天安排4個班機從倫敦返港，優先接回滯留倫敦機場的400多名香港學生，他們大多數是在英國讀書的中學生，首批返港的是年紀較小、沒有人同行的13至16歲學童。
香港旅遊業議會表示，香港至今仍有9個旅行團滯留在歐洲，涉及人數170人，其中4個團約100人滯留在倫敦，其餘5個團分別滯留在布拉格及巴塞隆納等城市。991222

description.hltext_display: Det tjener Bendtner i Arsenal
description.author: Ritzau
description.content:
Hvis du har talent for at spille fodbold, så er der gode økonomiske grunde til at forfølge det.
Ifølge formiddagsbladet B.T. hæver den danske angriber Nicklas Bendtner i hvert fald en årsløn på ikke færre end 23 millioner danske kroner hos London-klubben Arsenal.
Og selvom hovedpersonen selv ikke vil kommentere størrelsen af sin gage, så er Bendtner dog ikke i tvivl om, at han har fortjent, hvad der havner i lønposen.
Det er fortjent- Man kan altid spørge, hvad der er rimeligt at få i løn, og om vi tjener for meget. Jeg tror lidt på, at hvis vi tjener meget, så må det et eller andet sted jo være fordi vi er pengene værd. Sådan er mekanismerne vel?, siger Bendtner til avisen.
- Og så længe jeg arbejder hårdt, så tror jeg også på, at jeg fortjener det, der kommer til mig, siger Nicklas Bendtner, der dog som ung fodboldspiller aldrig tænkte på pengene som målet med sporten.
- Drømmen var at spille fodbold, vinde kampe og score mål - ikke at score de store penge, siger Bendtner.

description.hltext_display: Mortgage Refinancing: When Would be the Time To generate A Transfer?
description.content: Right after listening to information in regards to the Federal Reserve cutting down on rates or right after recognizing the rates are considerably lower in contrast towards the time you bought your home, it really is actually tempting to contemplate mortgage refinancing. At initial search, it genuinely is sensible. After all, who would not desire to take benefit of minimal rates that imply a lot of cash saved on monthly costs?However, the simple fact of your issue isn't all house owners is going to be capable to conserve by simply taking a fresh loan simply because the rates are minimal. It's vital to understand when to refinance your mortgage so as to know if the transfer is correct for you personally.Houston Mortgage In practical terms, you happen to be refinancing only since you want to conserve. But you don't usually see your financial savings right away. This can be because you will discover fees concerned when taking a new mortgage and penalties to pay for obtaining from the old a single. Here are the concerns it is best to consider when determining if it is the proper time to get refinancing:The level of time you strategy to stay in your homeIf 30 of staying in a single residence is extended ample, extending it for handful of a lot more many years by taking yet another mortgage may not be that appealing. So, in the event you prepare to move for the subsequent couple of many years or so, then, it can be actually not a fantastic concept to take one more loan. Bear in mind the only approach to recoup the price you compensated for that new loan is by staying in your house for as long as possible. And in case you will not have any plan on undertaking this, let the present minimal rate pass. The cost of terminating your recent home loan. Paying off your home loan early may possibly carry penalty. This will likely contain a smaller proportion of your respective exceptional stability, or several months' value of curiosity payments. Though this will likely not be a large, it nevertheless adds up to the cost which you need to recoup later on. The costs of your new mortgage loan. The sound of "low rates equal savings" is very appealing, but on paper, it is a fully diverse story. Taking new home loan means you might have to shell out various charges like appraisal, application, insurance coverage and origination charges, and also authorized expense, yet another insurance coverage, and title search which may all up to thousands of dollar. Securing a lower price would also suggest paying upfront for factors. Don't forget that financial savings will not come no cost when refinancing. You might have to take the primary blows so as to reap the rewards later. The cost of borrowingTake be aware that lower rates doesn't necessarily mean you'll routinely get lower month to month payments, and therefore, financial savings. Apart from rates, other variables that affect the amount of your mortgage loan are the length of loan, the type of mortgage (adjustable or fixed) the level of points you've to spend upfront, and also other charges included in the phrase. So will not be surprised should you do not get the savings you've initially anticipated. Financial savings on tax deductionLower rate means lower mortgage loan curiosity. And lower mortgage loan interest means lower tax deduction. So financial savings right after refinancing might not be as massive as you consider it truly is. If you're considering refinancing your mortgage loan, think of these things and consult your financing and tax advisor through these matters to help you fully grasp if it is truly right for you.

description.hltext_display: 4G网络测试全球范围起步
description.author: DoNews
description.content:
4G即第四代移动通信技术，与目前商用已相当成熟的3G相比，其发展在全球范围内也才算刚刚起步。《每日经济新闻》记者从业内了解到，同3G有TD、WCDMA、CDMA2000等制式之分一样，4G也有数种技术路线。即长期演进(LongTermEvolution，缩写即为LTE)技术已成为全球范围内，电信运营商们从现有3G网络过渡到4G的主流选择。
相比3G，4G意味着更高的网络上行下载速度。其4G的基础通信功能如通话、短信等与3G相比没有明显区别，变化在于访问网络速度更快、带宽更高，能够承载更大容量的数据业务。
从全球范围4G网络测试和运行的结果看，4G网络速度大致可比3G网络快10倍。之前美国电信运营商Verizon在美国38个城市以及超过60个商用机场开通了4G网络，实际运营结果显示，其网络访问速度是Verizon现有3G网络的10倍。
由全球七大运营商中国移动、Vodafone、T-Mobile、Orange、KPN、Sprint、NTTDoCoMo发起成立的全球运营商组织NGMN，2010年召开了全球产业大会。会上中国移动董事长王建宙曾形象描绘过TD—LTE在网络传输速度和容量上的领先：他举例说，3G时代支持用户之间点对点的可视电话，但演进到TD—LTE时代之后，用户“可以在飞驰的汽车上开高清视频会议。”
中新

description.hltext_display: AL DISAGIO DEI GIOVANI
description.content:
Rai GELMINI: RISPONDERE
Lettera aperta ai giovani del ministro Gelmini sul "Corriere della Sera", nel giorno in cui si va verso l'approvazione della riforma e in quello dei cortei di protesta di studenti e ricercatori. "Il disagio del mondo giovanile-scrivemerita adeguate risposte da chi ha responsabilità di governo"."E' innegabile che le aspettative dei giovani siano peggiori di quelle dei padri.Continuare a rimandare delle decisioni significa lasciar persistere un vuoto".E sottolinea che istruzione, lavoro e welfare sono punti fondamentali per i giovani.

description.hltext_display: Zaida Catalán: Det blir svårt att uträtta något bra"
description.author: Marieke Johnson
description.content:
Miljöpartisten och juristen Zaida Catalán lämnar partiet för att jobba åt EUs polisinsats i krigsdrabbade Kongo.
– Jag har kommit till vägs ände i partiet och vill gå vidare där jag kan utvecklas, säger hon till Jusektidningen.
Foto: Privat
Du ska jobba som expert på sexuellt våld för EUs polisinsats EUPOL i Goma, Kongo, i januari. Hur fick du tjänsten?
– Jag sökte det via Folke Bernadotteakademin. Eftersom jag har jobbat med liknande frågor länge tyckte jag att det läst intressant, inte minst för att jag pratar franska.
Vad ska du göra?
– Jag har till uppgift att dels rapportera det som händer, dels att vara folks ögon på plats i frågor om gender och sexuellt våld. Sen ska jag också driva projekt med mina kollegor inom EUPOL på plats. Just nu är vi cirka sex personer från bland annat Frankrike och Italien.
Vad är du mest nervös för?
– Att jag inte ska göra ett bra jobb. Jag förstår att det är tuffa omständigheter som råder där nere för alla, det kommer att vara tufft att få uträtta något bra, så är det i konfliktområden.
Du lämnar ditt jobb som jurist i Miljöpartiets riksdagsgrupp. Hur resonerade du?
– Jag vill jobba med saker där jag känner att jag kan göra skillnad och där jag växer, just nu är det den här tjänsten i Kongo. Vad det är om några år vet jag inte, hoppas att det är något annat spännande.
Det låter som om du har andra planer än politiken?
– Jag vet inte alls om jag kommer tillbaka till Miljöpartiet ärligt talat. Jag har gjort det mesta förutom att vara EU-parlamentariker eller ha en riksdagsplats. Jag har varit språkrör för Grön ungdom, ledamot i fullmäktige i Stockholm och suttit med i den grupp som reviderade det förra partiprogrammet. Jag har haft uppdrag för partiet i bostadsbolag, Polisnämnden i Stockholm med mera. Jag vill inte uppfinna hjulet igen utan har funderat i andra banor, kanske att starta en byrå med några kompisar.

description.hltext_display: 【部委資訊】商務部︰2011年鋸材出口配額總量同比下降1.89%

description.hltext_display: Old School: Truman High students host 1700s-style dancing and music
description.author: TRACI ANGEL
description.content:
A hallway adorned with sky-blue gossamer floating from the ceiling emptied into a pool of girls in colorful gowns ? and boys in long coats, tights and white wigs.
The costumed lot greeted guests to Truman High School cafeteria Friday evening for a 1700s-era cotillion.
Time fell backward 300 years as more than 60 students became period dancers in costume, orchestra members or servers for the event, which raised money for the school orchestra.
For those attending, it was a chance to dance the waltz and polka with a live orchestra. For orchestra students, it was a history and music lesson of the era when stringed instruments, rather than the brass, were the popular source of entertainment.
Front, side, together. Back, side, together.
Truman orchestra director Allison Ross called out directions for a box square to couples braving a waltz lesson. Soon the even lines began to zigzag across the maroon and dusty blue-colored cafeteria tiles as couples practiced. A dance floor of waistcoats and breeches melded with khakis and jeans.
JoAnn McKnight scooted in a sparkly skirt, while wearing Christmas tree earrings, Christmas tree broach and candy cane socks tucked in slip-on loafers. She had asked Richard Battor at a nearby table to join her.
McKnight and Battor shuffled along with the other dancers.
Her daughter, Karen, plays cello in the orchestra. ?This is wonderful,? she said after taking her seat next to a tier of iced brownies and lemon bars above the white-clothed tables. ?People get to get out and it?s a fund-raiser that is so different. I hope they keep doing it.? Battor was there for his granddaughter, Alyssa Reynolds, who also plays in the orchestra.
He knows a thing or two about waltz and polka. ?My folks were German,? he said. White lights illuminated the orchestra?s backdrop. Becca Crow, sophomore, 15, held her cello and looked on as dance instruction continued.
Students knew little about the time period before they started studying for the cotillion, she said. ?They came a long way in a short time,? Ross said. ?They?ve been working hard.? Orchestra students started preparing for cotillion last school year when they learned how to dance the waltz.
A ballet student, senior Amelia Ellsworth, helped organize the teaching of the dances for the event.
The difference between the 1700s and modern dance is the minimal physical contact involved with 18th century steps. Organizers arranged out-of-era moves, such as spinning and dips, to keep the audience engaged, Ellsworth said.
Ross made all the costumes ? colorful robe-like garments for girls and jackets for the boys.
More than 100 tickets were sold for the event and Ross estimated $1,500 was raised to go toward purchasing instrument storage units and to help finance students? travel to Wichita State University for a music festival. For the night?s final dance of ?The Blue Danube,? six couples in costume took the floor.
When the music stopped, the girls curtsied to their partners.
A final, formal announcement sent guests on their way.

event_or_fact.property: Students knew little about the time period before they started studying for the cotillion
Organizers arranged out-of-era moves, such as spinning and dips, to keep the audience engaged
after taking her seat next to a tier of iced brownies and lemon bars above the white-clothed tables

description.hltext_display: 赵树丛会见泰国客人
description.content:
2010年12月17日05时37分 中安在线-安徽日报
12月15日，省委常委、副省长赵树丛在合肥稻香楼宾馆会见了泰国正大集团副董事长李绍祝一行。
赵树丛首先对李绍祝一行来安徽访问表示欢迎，并简要介绍了安徽省情及经济社会发展情况。他说，安徽区位优势明显，产业基础良好，经过多年的发展，目前已步入了全面转型、加速崛起、兴皖富民的新阶段。皖江城市带承接产业转移示范区和国家技术创新工程试点省建设不断推进，为海外企业来皖投资兴业提供了难得历史机遇。泰国正大集团作为知名海外华人企业，是最早来皖投资的海外企业之一，双方拥有深厚合作基础。希望以此次访问为契机，进一步推动双方在农产品生产加工、汽车研发制造等方面开展合作，实现互利共赢、共同发展。
李绍祝感谢赵树丛的会见，表示将继续深化和落实双方在新农村建设及汽车工业方面的合作，为推动安徽企业走出国门、扩大在泰国及东盟地区影响力发挥积极作用。(记者聂扬飞)
编辑: 朱博佳
